product_name: Garnier Sleek & Shine Intensely Smooth Leave-In Conditioning Cream
product_review: Garnier Sleek & Shine Intensely Smooth Leave-In Conditioning Cream offers a comprehensive solution for those struggling with frizzy or unruly hair, combining a variety of features that make it a standout product in the hair care market. Scent: The cream boasts a delightful light fruity fragrance that features notes of citrus and apple, making it refreshing without being overpowering. Many users appreciate the pleasant scent, as it adds a sensory element to the hair care routine, allowing for a clean, fresh aroma that lingers throughout the day without clashing with other products or scents. Effectiveness: When it comes to performance, this leave-in conditioning cream excels in taming frizz and adding shine, particularly in humid environments. Users with wavy, curly, or thick hair often report significant improvements in manageability after using the product. The cream helps smooth out the hair cuticle, reducing flyaways and creating a sleek appearance that lasts throughout the day. Additionally, it acts as an effective detangler, making it easier to comb through hair after washing, which is especially beneficial for those with longer or more textured hair. Packaging: The product is packaged in a vibrant green bottle with an orange flip-top cap, reflecting Garnier’s recognizable branding. The design is practical, allowing for easy dispensing of the cream, which is particularly helpful when applying to damp or dry hair. However, some users note that the cap can become messy with use, as the cream may build up around the opening, but this is a minor inconvenience compared to the overall functionality of the packaging. Texture: The texture of the cream is another highlight; it is lightweight yet rich enough to provide ample moisture without feeling heavy or greasy. This allows for smooth application, and it absorbs quickly into the hair, leaving no sticky residue. Instead, users can expect their hair to feel soft, nourished, and manageable after use. The lightweight formula makes it suitable for various hair types, ensuring that even those with finer hair can benefit from its smoothing properties without worrying about weighing their hair down. Value: In terms of value, Garnier Sleek & Shine Leave-In Conditioning Cream is hard to beat. Priced affordably, it offers salon-quality results at a fraction of the cost. A little goes a long way, as only a small amount of the product is needed for each application, meaning a single bottle can last for several weeks or even months, depending on hair length and frequency of use. This makes it an excellent investment for anyone looking to enhance their hair care routine without straining their budget. Overall, Garnier Sleek & Shine Intensely Smooth Leave-In Conditioning Cream is a highly effective product that delivers on its promises of smoothing, shine-enhancing, and frizz control. With a pleasant scent, practical packaging, lightweight texture, and great value, it stands out as a reliable option for anyone seeking to improve the health and appearance of their hair. Whether you’re dealing with humidity, dryness, or simply looking to maintain sleekness, this leave-in conditioner is worth incorporating into your hair care regimen.

product_name: Head & Shoulders Classic Clean Anti-Dandruff Shampoo
product_review: Ich habe das Head & Shoulders Anti-Schuppen Shampoo getestet und war sehr zufrieden mit den Ergebnissen. Bereits nach wenigen Anwendungen konnte ich eine deutliche Reduzierung meiner Schuppen feststellen. Das Shampoo hat eine angenehme, cremige Textur und lässt sich gut aufschäumen. Mein Haar fühlt sich nach dem Waschen frisch und sauber an, und der leichte, frische Duft hält lange an. Zudem trocknet es meine Kopfhaut nicht aus, was für mich ein großer Pluspunkt ist. Für alle, die mit Schuppen kämpfen, ist dieses Shampoo eine zuverlässige Lösung!

product_name: Head & Shoulders Classic Clean Anti-Dandruff Shampoo
product_review: Ich habe das Head & Shoulders Shampoo getestet und bin sehr zufrieden mit den Ergebnissen. Der Duft des Shampoos ist angenehm frisch und bleibt lange im Haar, was mir besonders gut gefällt. Die Wirkung ist bemerkenswert; es reinigt das Haar gründlich und hilft effektiv gegen Schuppen, was ich sofort nach der ersten Anwendung gespürt habe. Auch die Verpackung ist praktisch und handlich gestaltet, was die Anwendung erleichtert. Die Inhaltsstoffe sind gut gewählt und enthalten pflegende Elemente, die das Haar nicht austrocknen. Im Hinblick auf das Preis-Leistungs-Verhältnis ist das Shampoo sehr fair, da es eine hohe Qualität bietet und zudem lange hält. Insgesamt kann ich Head & Shoulders nur empfehlen, da es meine Erwartungen in jeder Hinsicht erfüllt hat.

product_name: Head & Shoulders Classic Clean Anti-Dandruff Shampoo
product_review: I've struggled with dandruff for years, but Head & Shoulders Dandruff Shampoo has been a game-changer. This shampoo consistently delivers: - Fast and noticeable flake reduction - Soothing and calming scalp relief - Gentle, non-irritating formula - Fresh, clean scent - Affordable and widely available I've tried various dandruff shampoos, but Head & Shoulders outperforms them all. Its unique formula tackles the root cause of dandruff, leaving my scalp feeling healthy and flake-free. Pros: - Effective dandruff control - Gentle enough for daily use - Affordable - Wide range of products for different hair types Cons: literally None!

product_name: Head & Shoulders Classic Clean Anti-Dandruff Shampoo

product_name: Head & Shoulders Classic Clean Anti-Dandruff Shampoo
product_review: This shampoo helped me a lot during a period in which dandruff was becoming uncontrollable. It has a particularly neutral and non-annoying smell. Fair price for the product and perfect packaging.

product_name: Head & Shoulders Classic Clean Anti-Dandruff Shampoo
product_review: Das Shampoo von Head & Shoulders ist eine verlässliche Wahl, wenn es um die Pflege von Kopfhaut und Haaren geht. Die Verpackung ist praktisch und einfach zu handhaben, mit einem Klappverschluss, der sich leicht öffnen und schließen lässt. Der Duft des Shampoos ist angenehm frisch und nicht zu aufdringlich, was das Gefühl von Sauberkeit nach dem Waschen verstärkt. In der mittleren Preiskategorie angesiedelt, bietet das Shampoo ein sehr gutes Preis-Leistungs-Verhältnis. Das Design der Flasche ist modern und funktional, wobei das Markenlogo und die wichtigsten Informationen gut sichtbar platziert sind. Die Konsistenz des Shampoos ist weder zu dickflüssig noch zu wässrig, was das Auftragen und Verteilen im Haar erleichtert. Es schäumt gut auf und lässt sich auch schnell ausspülen. Besonders hervorzuheben ist, wie gut es gegen Schuppen wirkt und die Kopfhaut beruhigt, ohne sie auszutrocknen. bekämpft Schuppen gut. wirksam. Insgesamt ist Head & Shoulders eine gute Wahl für jeden, der auf der Suche nach einem zuverlässigen Shampoo ist, das sowohl die Haare reinigt als auch die Kopfhaut pflegt.

product_name: Head & Shoulders Classic Clean Anti-Dandruff Shampoo
product_review: I have been using this shampoo for years. It keeps my scalp dandruff free, stops any itching and leaves my wavy hair frizz free. Love the zingy feel and smell. I use this once a week and the bottle lasts me a long time. Great mix of value and effectiveness.

product_name: Pantene Daily Moisture Renewal Shampoo
product_review: I have repurchased this bottle multiple times because it does a great job keeping my hair conditioned and healthy. I use it every night, and my hair feels soft and smooth in the mornings. I wouldn't say that it's the best thing ever, but I do think it's really great for the price and the amount, and when I just am not sure which conditioner I'm in the mood to use/buy, this is sort of my go-to product. When applying it in the shower, I do often accidentally use too much (based on the amount I usually squeeze out), so I would say that a little goes a long way (or just longer than a lot of other conditioners). However, it is also, at the same time, kind of 'drippy,' in the sense that it can feel watery and will drip down while I'm letting it sit in my hair. For reference, a bottle lasts me about two and a half weeks max, which doesn't sound like much, but my hair is waist-length and I have plenty of it. My hair is so clean, frizz free and super soft, I don't have to wash my hair everyday now and it smells terrific. I also bought the matching conditioner. I highly recommend this set. This product is excellent! It comes in huge bottles and will pump out the amount you need. Each pump bottle is very large and lasts a long time. Leaves hair easier to manage.

product_name: Tresemme Silky & Smooth Shampoo for Frizzy Hair
product_review: I washed my hair with TRESemme shampoo. Smell: just amazing. It smells very fresh, not intrusive. I really like it. It stays on the hair for 1 day for sure. Consistency: medium. It is easily distributed over wet hair. You can see the little sparkles inside. Dispenser: not really. It is pressed easily, but when the shampoo is squeezed out, part returns back to the bottle. Do not turn the bottle over when the shampoo runs out. The lid is not very stable. An average drop is enough for my length. The shampoo foams very well and is distributed through the hair. Cleanses the hair well. It is washed off without much effort. Even if I don't use conditioner, my hair is soft and manageable. It does not cause any problems like itching or dandruff. The average price for such a volume on Amazon costs 9 dollars

product_name: Tresemme Silky & Smooth Shampoo for Frizzy Hair
product_review: Hair care enthusiasts, get ready to embark on a journey to silky, smooth, and absolutely fabulous hair with TRESemmé Smooth and Silky Shampoo. This shampoo is more than just a hair wash; it's a daily indulgence for your locks. The Good: Ultimate Smoothness: If you're battling dry, unruly hair, this shampoo is your secret weapon. It tames and moisturizes your hair, leaving it incredibly smooth and manageable. Moroccan Argan Oil: The secret sauce here is Moroccan Argan Oil. It's like a magic potion for your hair, providing intense nourishment, moisture, and a delightful, natural shine. Salon-Quality Feel: TRESemmé is renowned for its salon-quality products, and this shampoo is no exception. It gives your hair that 'just-stepped-out-of-the-salon' look and feel, every day. Affordability: You don't need to break the bank to enjoy luxurious, silky hair. This 3-pack offers great value for quality hair care. The Not-So-Good: Scent Sensitivity: While many love the shampoo's scent, some with sensitive noses might find it a tad strong. However, it dissipates after washing, leaving your hair smelling lovely and fresh. Sulfates: This shampoo contains sulfates, which some individuals prefer to avoid due to their potential drying effect on the hair. If you have sulfate-sensitive hair, this might not be your best choice. Final Verdict: TRESemmé Smooth and Silky Shampoo is a ticket to achieving that luxurious, salon-quality hair you've always dreamed of. It's more than just shampoo; it's a daily dose of pampering for your locks. The Moroccan Argan Oil infusion, combined with its exceptional ability to tame and moisturize, makes this shampoo a fantastic choice for those with dry, unruly hair. Plus, it comes in a convenient 3-pack, ensuring you never run out of the secret to smooth and silky strands. If you're ready to enjoy the feeling of stepping out of a salon every day, TRESemmé has your back. Get ready to revel in the confidence of incredibly smooth and silky hair, making every day a 'good hair day.' 🌟💆‍♀️🚿

The formulas are typically enriched with vitamins and natural ingredients that help promote smoother, shinier, and healthier-looking hair. However, some people with sensitive scalps may find certain versions too harsh or drying due to the presence of sulfates. Overall, TRESemmé provides effective hair care at a budget-friendly price.

product_name: Tresemme Silky & Smooth Shampoo for Frizzy Hair
product_review: Tresemmé Silky & Smooth Shampoo for Frizzy Hair is a noteworthy option for those seeking to manage frizz while enhancing hair’s smoothness and shine. Scent: This shampoo has a pleasant, fresh fragrance that blends floral and fruity notes, creating an inviting aroma during use. The scent is not overpowering, making it suitable for daily application, and it leaves the hair smelling clean and revitalized throughout the day. Effectiveness: Tresemmé Silky & Smooth Shampoo effectively cleanses while delivering moisture, making it ideal for frizzy and unruly hair. Users often report that it helps reduce frizz and enhances overall smoothness, providing a sleek finish. The formula works to nourish the hair without stripping natural oils, ensuring that hair remains healthy and hydrated after washing. Packaging: The shampoo comes in a sleek, professional-looking bottle that is easy to handle and dispense. The pump top allows for convenient application, and the clear design makes it easy to see how much product is left. However, some users have noted that the pump can occasionally become clogged. After rinsing, hair feels soft and clean, laying the foundation for smoother styling. Value: Tresemmé Silky & Smooth Shampoo offers excellent value, as it is both affordable and effective. With its salon-quality results at a drugstore price, it appeals to a wide range of consumers. The generous size of the bottle means it lasts a long time, making it a cost-effective choice for regular use. Overall, Tresemmé Silky & Smooth Shampoo for Frizzy Hair is a reliable option for anyone looking to tame frizz while achieving a smooth, shiny finish. product_review: This shampoo does function well. It smells great and tames frizz to get that nice sleek look. It is also very cheap and comes in a large bottle with recyclable. However, the weakest point is that it contains DMDM hydantoin, which leaches formaldehyde when it comes in contact with water. Formaldehyde is a known carcinogen and has been attributed to causing hair loss. Unilever, the manufacturer, denied claims of this being a bad ingredient during a 2020 lawsuit. Do not buy.

product_name: Pantene Pro-V Smooth & Sleek Shampoo & Conditioner
product_review: Pantene Pro-V Smooth & Sleek Shampoo and Conditioner duo is a fantastic choice for anyone looking to manage frizzy hair while achieving a sleek, polished finish. Scent: This product line features a delightful, fresh fragrance that combines floral and clean notes, providing an invigorating experience during use. The scent is not overpowering, leaving hair smelling fresh and pleasant throughout the day. Effectiveness: The Smooth & Sleek Shampoo effectively cleanses while the Conditioner deeply hydrates, working together to reduce frizz and enhance smoothness. Users frequently report that this duo helps to tame unruly hair, leaving it looking sleek and manageable without stripping away essential moisture. Packaging: Both the shampoo and conditioner come in easy-to-use bottles with a flip-top cap, making dispensing simple and convenient. The design is functional and visually appealing, though some users have noted that the bottles can be a bit slippery when wet. Texture: The shampoo has a creamy texture that lathers well, while the conditioner is rich and smooth, allowing for easy application and distribution through the hair. Together, they provide a luxurious feel, leaving hair soft and silky after rinsing. Value: Pantene Pro-V Smooth & Sleek Shampoo and Conditioner offer excellent value, combining salon-quality results with affordability. The larger sizes of the bottles mean they last a long time, making them a cost-effective option for regular use. Overall, Pantene Pro-V Smooth & Sleek Shampoo and Conditioner are highly effective products for managing frizz and achieving a polished look, featuring a pleasant scent, luxurious texture, convenient packaging, and great value, making them a solid addition to any hair care routine.

The formula deeply nourishes each strand, leaving my hair shiny, healthy, and sleek without weighing it down. I can't see any other product on the same level as this one. product_name: Garnier Sleek & Shine Shampoo
product_review: ### Garnier Sleek & Shine Shampoo Review **Fragrance:** The shampoo has a pleasant, fresh fragrance with notes of fruit and flowers that leaves hair smelling good all day long. **Texture:** The texture is smooth and creamy, making it easy to apply and spread through the hair. **Effectiveness:** It is very effective at controlling frizz and providing softness, leaving hair manageable and shiny. Ideal for unruly or frizzy hair. **Packaging:** The packaging is practical and functional, with a design that allows easy access to the product. In addition, it is attractive and colorful. **Ingredients:** It contains argan oil and other nourishing ingredients that help moisturize hair and keep it healthy. Overall, Garnier Sleek & Shine Shampoo is an excellent choice for those looking for softness and frizz control at an affordable price.

product_name: Garnier Sleek & Shine Shampoo
product_review: I have used Garnier products for years. I love the scent. It has enough foam when I used that I like. It works very well with my hair, which is the go-to product when I have the choice.

product_name: Garnier Sleek & Shine Shampoo
product_review: My fav shampoo ever! The smell is just perfect and so refreshing. I love this brand and all the hair line. The bottle is super comfy to carry around and the ingredients pretty clear. Very effective shampoo.

product_name: Garnier Sleek & Shine Shampoo
product_review: This shampoo smells amazing leaves my hair smelling so nice and shiny i love it. It’s very affordable and lasts you a long time it also just makes you feel so clean!

product_name: Garnier Sleek & Shine Shampoo
product_review: Garnier Sleek & Shine Shampoo did a fantastic job delivering on its promise of sleek, shiny hair. I also enjoyed the scent profile. However, I found that it didn't provide the level of hydration I was looking for. To achieve optimal results, I paired it with a conditioner from another brand.

product_name: Garnier Sleek & Shine Shampoo
product_review: This shampoo smelled great and lathered well, just not my personal favorite. I didn’t notice my hair looking or feeling shiny. I also used the matching conditioner and didn’t notice any difference.

product_name: Garnier Sleek & Shine Shampoo
product_review: Excelente sus ingredientes hacen su efectividad la textura suave la fragancia agradable el envase es propio y el precio es justo para el producto muy bueno

product_name: Garnier Sleek & Shine Shampoo
product_review: I like the smell of this shampoo a lot. It worked decently for my hair but only for a short time before I had to switch it out because my hair gets oily fast and it seemed to increase my oil production. I think it’s well priced and it did make my hair feel shiny and nice. The bottle is easy and didn’t experience any breaking with the lid.

product_name: Garnier Sleek & Shine Shampoo
product_review: It smells great. It really cleanses the hair and removes buildup. The price was affordable and you get a lot of bang for your buck. I would definitely buy it again.

product_name: Garnier Sleek & Shine Shampoo
product_review: The product smells well, the fragance is not agresive and its easy to use giving you a clean and shinny hair. The price is affordable and is easy to find in stores.

product_name: Garnier Sleek & Shine Shampoo
product_review: The shampoo sleek shine Garnier is good hair type, packaging enough for using 1 months. It’s have a fragrance not strong but it’s making me feel better.

product_name: Garnier Sleek & Shine Shampoo
product_review: One of my favourite shampoo. It has a great scent and the bottle is easy opening so no fuss. Leaves hair feeling refreshed and smelling amazing. Would recommend.

product_name: Garnier Sleek & Shine Shampoo
product_review: Deja el pelo espectacular, suave y con brillo , huele muy bien. No sé encrespa el pelo. Además deja el pelo limpio más días y el envase es muy bonito.

product_name: Garnier Sleek & Shine Shampoo
product_review: Use this in the shower regularly. Great shampoo. Does what it says. leaves the hair shine and sleek. Needs to be paired with the conditioner.

product_name: Garnier Sleek & Shine Shampoo
product_review: This shampoo is specifically designed for those with dry, frizzy hair. With the combined effects of vegetable keratin and argan oil, this formula works to smooth and hydrate hair, improving texture and making it more manageable. Garnier, the Sleek & Shine line has a distinctive fruity scent that is pleasant and fresh, although those sensitive to scents may prefer something lighter. For best results, use both shampoo and conditioner products from the same brand as part of your routine.

product_name: Garnier Sleek & Shine Shampoo
product_review: I love this Garnier Shampoo! I loved the pleasant scent that it had and also how clean it left my hair and scalp feeling. I was also very surprised that at the end of washing it did not leave my hair feeling ‘stripped’ and dry. Overall great shampoo that left my hair soft and smelling great!

product_name: Garnier Sleek & Shine Shampoo
product_review: I have been using this product for a long time, smells so good, very effective results after use. Value is not expensive at all. Comes in a recycled bottle.

product_name: Garnier Sleek & Shine Shampoo
product_review: Älskar verkligen denna produkt. Doftar gott och gör håret fräscht. Bra pris för detta otroliga schampoo . Ingredienser som verkligen gör ditt hår glänsande

product_name: Garnier Sleek & Shine Shampoo
product_review: Muy rico olor, deja el cabello increíblemente suave, su empaque es increíble. Muy efectivo en el cabello para dejar el cabello hermoso. Muy buen precio

product_name: Garnier Sleek & Shine Shampoo
product_review: Profumazione ottima, consistenza classica di tutti gli shampoo, risultati ottimali sinceramente, prezzo accessibile (come tutti gli altri shampoo in commercio)

product_name: Garnier Sleek & Shine Shampoo
product_review: I absolutely love this shampoo it does as it says and does make your heart shiney and soft, they could try and reduce the plastic some more on products, its value for money for the size And I would definitely use and recommend

product_name: Garnier Sleek & Shine Shampoo
product_review: Have been buying and using for more than 5 years now both the shampoo and conditioner. I always get the 40 oz at sams club. Love the smell, it works great on my curly hair and it leaves it very clean. long lasting scent.

product_name: Garnier Sleek & Shine Shampoo
product_review: This is My go to shampoo and conditioner. The scent is nice and not over powering. There isn’t a bunch of residue left behind . And it works for all hair types. I personally like the bigger bottle because kt lasts longer

product_name: Garnier Sleek & Shine Shampoo
product_review: Quality and quantity are important to me when looking for a shampoo. This one has a great price for what you get and how long it lasts in my hair. I would try it again.

product_name: Garnier Sleek & Shine Shampoo
product_review: Det här schampot kommer jag ihåg sen liten och det är enbart p.g.a. doften. Har alltid tyckt att ser luktar så gott! Tycker man luktar gott lång tid efter duschen och man känner sig fräsch också såklart för det fungerar bra och håret känns stärkt och ser välmående ut!

product_name: Garnier Sleek & Shine Shampoo
product_review: Love how it smells and how well it really cleans your hair no need to wash two or three times to get hair clean and it smells good for days has a great this lather without using lots of shampoo the bottle is easy to open even with wet hands

product_name: Garnier Sleek & Shine Shampoo
product_review: It is effective in removing oils and settling dandruff. The scent is nice but a bit strong. The packaging feels nice and of a good value. It made my hair feel sleek and soft.

product_name: Garnier Sleek & Shine Shampoo
product_review: I just love these shampoos. Good smell, lots of foam, enough to wash your hair once. Very concentrated and excellent composition. You can buy it in any store. efficient and reliable

product_name: Garnier Sleek & Shine Shampoo
product_review: My family uses this line of garnier. It just works great for our hair. I’m Asian and my husband is white, and we both love it. The smell is nice and doesn’t cause me dandruff like other brands.

product_name: Garnier Sleek & Shine Shampoo
product_review: This shampoo smells great and it will leave the hair smelling great! The packaging is easy to open and it’s definitely worth your money! The shampoo does the job.

product_name: Garnier Sleek & Shine Shampoo
product_review: Limpieza profunda. Es un champús que no deja ningún olor desagradable en el pelo, te lo deja con un brillo natural y esa sensación de limpieza hace que sea un producto muy favorito.

product_name: Garnier Sleek & Shine Shampoo
product_review: My go-to travel shampoo! This is a great-smelling, valuable, easy shampoo to use. It’s a great value for the size of the bottle and lasts a good bit of time.

product_name: Garnier Sleek & Shine Shampoo
product_review: I love the scent of this and it makes my hair so nice. It is also extremely affordable. The green packaging is beautiful. This is my favorite shampoo ever.

product_name: Garnier Sleek & Shine Shampoo
product_review: This conditioner and shampoo smells amazing and works pretty good for a drugstore product. I think it's a good value for the price and is one that is in my regular rotation

product_name: Garnier Sleek & Shine Shampoo
product_review: This product is reliable and performs as expected. It offers good value for the price and meets most of the needs it’s intended to address. The quality is solid, though there may be minor areas where improvements could be made. Overall, it’s a dependable choice for those looking for a practical solution without breaking the bank.

product_name: Garnier Sleek & Shine Shampoo
product_review: Deja el cabello suave y limpio el aroma es fresco no me apelmaza ni me deja tirante me gusta para usar cada día y para llevar de viaje y en cualquier sitio. Pero fácil de encontrar

product_name: Garnier Sleek & Shine Shampoo
product_review: Si buscas un shampoo con buen aroma, que te dejé el cabello hermoso y con excelentes ingredientes este es para ti. Es indispensable.en tu día a día.

product_name: Garnier Sleek & Shine Shampoo
product_review: De Garnier Sleek & Shine Shampoo doet precies wat hij belooft. mijn haar is na gebruik glad, glanzend en minder pluizig. De formule met arganolie voedt het haar goed zonder het zwaar te maken, en de frisse geur is aangenaam. Een klein nadeel is dat het voor fijn haar wat zwaar kan zijn, maar voor dik of weerbarstig haar is het een uitstekende keuze. Zeker een aanrader!

product_name: Garnier Sleek & Shine Shampoo
product_review: Lo prendo sempre, lo adoro! Buonissimo capelli super morbidi e profumato, mi piace perché l odore resta e si sente anche nell aria. Il prezzo è buono per il risultato ottenuto e la confezione in plastica rigida é molto resistente.

product_name: Garnier Sleek & Shine Shampoo
product_review: Garnier shampoo son de buenos imgredientes y muy rica fragamcia , su textura es muy suave, de muy eficacia para el cabello,el envase que viene en botellas.

product_name: Garnier Sleek & Shine Shampoo
product_review: Profumato Lascia i capelli profumati puliti senza nodi Delicato nella cute Risultati per uso frequente Buoni prodotti di qualità Da ricomprare

product_name: Garnier Sleek & Shine Shampoo
product_review: Works and smells great! You get your moneys worth, nice packaging, and the texture is smooth and silky. It’s really effective if you have long thick hair too!

product_name: Garnier Sleek & Shine Shampoo
product_review: Sleek packaging, a gooey texture, it's effective in cleaning the hair effectively without drying it out or leaving it too oily. It has a pleasant scent.

product_name: Garnier Sleek & Shine Shampoo
product_review: In love with this shampoo. It smells amazing, very fruity but not overpoweringly sweet and it leaves my straight hair without frizziness. The packaging is very slick and easy to grab. Very inexpensive usually under $5. Will continue to buy.

product_name: Garnier Sleek & Shine Shampoo
product_review: Same thing as I said in my last review the GARNIER hair products are TOP TIER! 😍💎 for such an affordable product with such great value also! Let’s not forget how good and fruity this stuff smells! If you want the softest hair ever definitely run to your Walmart & buy you some GARNIER products!

product_name: Garnier Sleek & Shine Shampoo

product_name: Garnier Repairing Shampoo Honey Treasures
product_review: Great fragrance that leaves my hair feeling smooth without weighting it down. For the price you get a quality product without breaking the budget ❤️.

product_name: Garnier Repairing Shampoo Honey Treasures

product_name: Garnier Repairing Shampoo Honey Treasures
product_review: Shampoing nourrissant et qui laisse une odeur agréable sur les cheveux . Au prix modeste de 3euros. Très beau packaging. Je recommande pour les cheveux .

product_name: Garnier Repairing Shampoo Honey Treasures
product_review: Bellissimo shampoo con ingredienti bio e una profumazione molto dolce e delicata. La confezione ricorda l’ efficacia del prodotto, ottimo colore e ottima texture, consiglio vivamente .

product_name: Garnier Repairing Shampoo Honey Treasures
product_review: The packaging was a real eye catcher, coupled with the value of the double pack it was an eccellent buy. The scent was heavenly and by far one of my favourite honey products.

product_name: Garnier Repairing Shampoo Honey Treasures
product_review: It smells nice. I didn’t notice any damage to my hair and the ingredients seem good. I don’t know if it did a lot to help my hair either, though. I think there’s better out there

product_name: Garnier Repairing Shampoo Honey Treasures
product_review: Love the scent of this - always makes me hair feel and smell lovely! It works for me and definitely feels like it’s helping repair my hair. Loads of people I know use it so it must be good! Cute packaging, love the yellow

product_name: Garnier Repairing Shampoo Honey Treasures
product_review: Gracias a su ingredientes de miel te hidrRa mucho el cabello . El aroma dulce a miel es super agradable y te deja una textura muy buena . Cumple con sus aspectativas

product_name: Garnier Repairing Shampoo Honey Treasures
product_review: J’adore ce shampooing pour son odeur douce de miel.Sa texture est très douce et très agréable à appliquer.Il fait une bonne mousse douce et onctueuse sur les cheveux.Il laisse les cheveux doux et brillant lors du séchage.

product_name: Garnier Repairing Shampoo Honey Treasures
product_review: All the whole blends line from garnier is amazing. Even the shampoo leaves your hair smooth. I love the scent and packaging looks cute. The prices are even better.

product_name: Garnier Repairing Shampoo Honey Treasures
product_review: This product is great. Use alongside the conditioner and your hair will smell amazing, have zero tangles, and look and feel good. I love this stuff! Garnier can do no wrong.

product_name: Garnier Repairing Shampoo Honey Treasures
product_review: Godt produkt, god og dejlig blid duft som giver en frisk duft. Indholdet af honning gør håret dejlig blødt og nemt at rede ud. Nem og drøj i brug. Der skal ikke ret meget i håret.

product_name: Garnier Repairing Shampoo Honey Treasures
product_review: I always purchase this brand at my store. It smells great and gets rid of all the grease in my hair. Love my hair texture after each use and it's always a great value for money

product_name: Garnier Repairing Shampoo Honey Treasures
product_review: I’ve been using Garnier Shampoo Repairing Honey Treasures, and it’s been a good option for dry or damaged hair. The scent is lovely—sweet but not overwhelming—and it leaves my hair feeling softer and less frizzy. It also doesn’t weigh my hair down, which is a plus. However, I noticed that the effects are temporary, and if I stop using it, my hair goes back to being dry fairly quickly. It also contains sulfates, which can be harsh for those with sensitive scalps or colored hair. Overall, it’s affordable and works well for short-term moisture.

product_name: Garnier Repairing Shampoo Honey Treasures
product_review: The Garnier Repairing Shampoo Honey Treasures is so scent fir my hair. This item helps my hair be stronger and smoother than other productions in market.

product_name: Garnier Repairing Shampoo Honey Treasures
product_review: Love this product the scent is divine leaves my hair feeling great clean and glossy and so soft the packaging is eye catching and the product is value for money

product_name: Garnier Repairing Shampoo Honey Treasures
product_review: Adorei o shampoo, o cheiro é muito bom e fica no cabelo por um bom tempinho (é dos poucos que fazem isso), é uma embalagem bem feita, a textura do produto está muito bem, cumpre com as suas funções e está a um bom precinho até

product_name: Garnier Repairing Shampoo Honey Treasures
product_review: Très bon produit de cette marque, très qualitatif, nourris bien le Cheveu & laisse les cheveux doux ! Packaging simple et reconnaissable ! Je trouve top

product_name: Garnier Repairing Shampoo Honey Treasures
product_review: Très bon shampooing efficace pour toute la famille et à prix abordable . Le parfum est agréable et l’emballage sympa . Mes cheveux sont frisés et la composition est parfaite pour mon type de cheveux

product_name: Garnier Repairing Shampoo Honey Treasures
product_review: Ottimo shampoo. Lava bene i capelli senza aggredirli, già sotto la doccia si possono sentire le sue proprietà addolcenti, io che ho i capelli tendenti al crespo, infatti, li sento subito più morbidi e disciplinati. La profumazione è buonissima, nella stagione fredda, poi, è semplicemente perfetta, una coccola per i capelli strapazzati. Il potere rinforzante è effettivo, aumentato se utilizzato con il balsamo della linea, o ancor meglio con la maschera. L'unico dubbio mi rimane sulla sua delicatezza, infatti mi è capitato alcune volte, dopo il suo utilizzo, di sentire un leggero pizzicore alla cute, andato poi via con i successivi utilizzi. Nonostante questo non ho però riscontrato effettivi latio negativi, e comunque credo che la base per l'uso degli ultra dolce rimanga il saper dosare le quantità di prodotto e variare spesso il loro utilizzo

product_name: Garnier Repairing Shampoo Honey Treasures
product_review: Omg it smells amazing!!! It always leaves my hair so shiny and smooth!!! The bottle fits perfectly in my shower and it's more affordable than other repairing shampoos.

product_name: Garnier Repairing Shampoo Honey Treasures
product_review: The scent that this shampoo gives you makes you appreciate and value the packaging. This product leaves a nice texture to your hair when used as a set with the conditioner.

product_name: Garnier Repairing Shampoo Honey Treasures
product_review: I loved the smell of this and the way it made my hair feel! I love this shampoo! Will def get it again. The packaging is cute and it’s very reasonable.

product_name: Garnier Repairing Shampoo Honey Treasures
product_review: Ich habe das Garnier Repairing Shampoo Honey Treasures ausprobiert und kann es absolut weiterempfehlen! Es pflegt das Haar intensiv und hinterlässt ein spürbar weicheres, glänzenderes Ergebnis. Es repariert strapaziertes Haar schonend und verleiht ihm neue Stärke. Der Duft ist sehr angenehm und nicht aufdringlich, schäumt auch gut auf. Nach der Anwendung fühlt sich mein Haar gesünder und geschmeidiger an. Wer nach einem hochwertigen, reichhaltigen Shampoo sucht, ist hier genau richtig. Klare Kaufempfehlung!

product_name: Garnier Repairing Shampoo Honey Treasures
product_review: Personally I love this product because I have very curly hair I feel like this is a thick product that coats my hair very well and makes it feel refreshed.

product_name: Garnier Repairing Shampoo Honey Treasures
product_review: I have frizzy extremely dry hair and spend a lot of money on hair products. That’s until I came across this. I don’t know what it is about this specific shampoo and conditioner but it leaves my hair super soft. It also smells really good which helps. I use it with the conditioner and it works wonders. Usually shampoos dry out my hair and it’s a nightmare to even rinse out but this one right here somehow leaves my hair so smooth when I rinse it off.

product_name: Garnier Repairing Shampoo Honey Treasures
product_review: Ce shampooing vous rendra vos cheveux doux ,soyeux et brillant. L odeur est très agréable. Il est très efficace. Très jolie packaging. Je recommande ce produit.

product_name: Garnier Repairing Shampoo Honey Treasures
product_review: Otroligt bra, använt den sjukt många gånger brukar schamponera Max 2 gånger. Efter duschen luktade den sjukt gott du känner en lugnande lukt samt söt av honungen. Jag skulle nog säga att det är för all typ av hår.

product_name: Garnier Repairing Shampoo Honey Treasures
product_review: Shampoo al miele, mi piace molto la profumazione, ne basta poco e crea tanta schiuma. Pulisce in profondità i capelli anche se ho notato che dopo un po' che lo utilizzo che secca leggermente i capelli. Consiglio di utilizzarlo con altri prodotti.

product_name: Garnier Repairing Shampoo Honey Treasures
product_review: Toda la gama me gusta mucho, están hechos como muy buenos ingrediente. Su textura es suave y te deja el cabello sedoso, como recién salido de la peluquería, y su aroma es increíble.

product_name: Garnier Repairing Shampoo Honey Treasures
product_review: Ten produkt jest niezwykle wszechstronny i spełnia moje oczekiwania. Doskonale sprawdza się zarówno w codziennym makijażu, jak i na specjalne okazje. Jego formuła jest lekka i łatwo się aplikuje, nie obciążając skóry. Efekt, jaki daje, jest naturalny i świeży, a zarazem trwały przez cały dzień. Jestem pod wrażeniem jego jakości i skuteczności – zdecydowanie mogę go polecić każdemu.

product_name: Garnier Repairing Shampoo Honey Treasures
product_review: Macht die Haare sehr weich und geschmeidig, gibt ein wenig Volumen. Die Textur ist flüssig und richt süß nach Honig. Die Verpackung ist ansprechend und verleitete mich zum Kauf, auch weil ich mein spröden Haar in den Griff bekommen wollte, was ich auch erreichte.

product_name: Garnier Repairing Shampoo Honey Treasures
product_review: I love this shampoo it smells so good I buy it all the time that's how much I love it. I tell my friends about it. It definitely something for everyone to try it.

product_name: Garnier Repairing Shampoo Honey Treasures
product_review: Das Shampoo und die Spülung sind ideal für strapaziertes und brüchige Haar, das Duo repariert, kräftigt und nährt das Haar. Der Geruch ist nicht aufdringlich und leicht süß. Die Haare sind nach dem Waschen gepflegt und sauber. Ich bin zufrieden, aber es ist kein außergewöhnliches Shampoo.

product_name: Garnier Repairing Shampoo Honey Treasures
product_review: I’ve had terrible hair fall postpartum and this is one product that helped me overcome it. Lovely fragrance as well. It’s subtle but smells heavenly.

product_name: Garnier Repairing Shampoo Honey Treasures
product_review: ￼ c’est un shampooing que nous utilisons toute la famille. Son parfum et léger et reste assez longtemps après le séchage des cheveux. Il lave ￼ très bien les cheveux et ceci ne sont pas secs par la suite. L’emballage est classique.￼ Le prix est correct.

product_name: Garnier Repairing Shampoo Honey Treasures
product_review: Garnier Repairing Shampoo, Honey Treasures, is truly a gem for anyone seeking a natural, effective solution to damaged hair. From the moment you use it, you notice how indulgent the formula feels—it’s creamy, rich, and lathers beautifully, giving you that luxurious, spa-like experience at home. What sets this shampoo apart is its use of honey, royal jelly, and propolis, all known for their nourishing, repairing, and protective properties. The honey lends a natural softness and shine to your hair, making it feel healthier after just one wash. If you struggle with dryness, breakage, or split ends, this shampoo is a perfect choice because it hydrates deeply without weighing your hair down. Plus, the royal jelly works to strengthen the hair follicles, promoting healthier growth, while propolis helps shield your hair from environmental damage. One of the best things about Garnier’s Honey Treasures is its versatility. Whether you have straight, wavy, or curly hair, this shampoo leaves your strands feeling smooth and manageable. It also smells absolutely divine, with a warm, honeyed fragrance that lingers gently without being overpowering. The added bonus? Garnier is committed to eco-friendly practices. The packaging is recyclable, and the formula is paraben-free, making it a great choice if you’re looking to use more sustainable products. Overall, Garnier Repairing Shampoo, Honey Treasures, delivers salon-quality results at an affordable price. If you’re looking to revive damaged hair while using a product that feels and smells fantastic, this is definitely a must-try.

product_name: Garnier Repairing Shampoo Honey Treasures
product_review: It's very effective in removing oils from your hair. The smell is pleasant and not strong at all which is nice. The packaging is nice looking so doesn't look cheap while still being of a good value. The texture can feel a little sticky but it doesn't leave a residue.

product_name: Garnier Repairing Shampoo Honey Treasures
product_review: Super odeur de miel et texture agréable et légère ! Il fait le job pour un bon rapport qualité prix ! Rien à dire de plus que cela ! Bon achat à recommander

product_name: Garnier Repairing Shampoo Honey Treasures
product_review: Das Shampoo riecht fantastisch. Sehr feminin, und mild. Der Dift bleibt stundenlang im Haar. Es macht die Haare super weich und geschneidig. Ist sehr ergiebig und schäumt gut auf.

product_name: Garnier Repairing Shampoo Honey Treasures
product_review: i absolutely loved this! it left my hair so much softer! it smells so light like a spring day. the bottle is nice & sleek, great value for the price!

product_name: Garnier Repairing Shampoo Honey Treasures
product_review: Ce shampooing est formidable les ingrédients sont vraiment bien le parfum quil procure sur les cheveux et excellent l'odeur reste 2 jours il est très efficaces il n'a pas d' emballages mais la bouteille est super jolie niveau prix il est vraiment pas chers je le recommande vraiment

product_name: Garnier Repairing Shampoo Honey Treasures
product_review: I used it when I had an attack of alopecia, it helped me a lot. Bien que ça avait pris un peu de temps pour que mes cheveux puissent s'y adapter et répondre au traitement, après je le recommande franchement

product_name: Garnier Repairing Shampoo Honey Treasures
product_review: Produto INCRÍVELLLLLL adoro o seu cheiro e sinto que faz muito bem ao meu cabelo por um preço baixo ,nada a acrescentar sobre embalagem e textura, recomendo imenso

product_name: Garnier Repairing Shampoo Honey Treasures
product_review: Garnier Repairing Shampoo Honey Treasures has a lovely, light honey scent that isn’t overpowering. It leaves hair feeling soft, strong, and healthy after just a few washes. The creamy texture lathers well and feels rich, while the packaging is sturdy and easy to use. For the price, it’s a great value, especially if you're looking for a shampoo that nourishes and repairs dry or damaged hair.

product_name: Garnier Repairing Shampoo Honey Treasures
product_review: Had last van jeuk aan de kruin van mijn hoofd door het gebruik van andere shampoo. Met deze was ik mijn haar en hen daarna geen last meer van jeuk, het ruikt lekker en geeft je haar een mooie en langtijdige glans.

product_name: Garnier Repairing Shampoo Honey Treasures
product_review: I have tried many shampoos over the years, most leaving me with a burning sensation due to having sensitive skin, not with this one though! No burning, beautiful smell that leaves my hair super soft and shiny. I will not use any other shampoo.

product_review: I love the sweet honey scent of this shampoo, and it made my hair feel super soft. However, it caused my hair to get oily faster than usual, so I had to wash it more often. It might work better for dry hair types.

product_name: Aussie Miracle Moist Shampoo
product_review: I’ve been using Aussie’s Miracle Moist Shampoo, and it has been a game-changer for my dry, damaged hair. From the first wash, I noticed how much softer and more hydrated my hair felt. It’s enriched with avocado and jojoba oil, which gives my hair the moisture it desperately needs without making it greasy or heavy. The shampoo lathers well, and a little goes a long way. The scent is also amazing—fresh, clean, and lasts all day! After regular use, my hair looks healthier, shinier, and is much easier to manage. If you have dry or damaged hair and need a good moisture boost, I highly recommend giving this shampoo a try!

product_name: TRESemmé Purify and Replenish Deep Cleansing Shampoo
product_review: Tresemmé est une marque populaire de shampoings et de produits capillaires, souvent utilisée à la fois par les consommateurs réguliers et dans les salons de coiffure. Voici quelques aspects à considérer : ### Points positifs : 1. **Prix abordable** : Tresemmé est généralement plus accessible que de nombreuses marques professionnelles, ce qui en fait un bon choix pour un usage quotidien. 2. **Variante de gammes** : La marque propose différentes lignes adaptées à des types de cheveux spécifiques (cheveux secs, gras, colorés, bouclés, etc.), ce qui permet de trouver un produit en fonction des besoins capillaires. 3. **Facilité d’accès** : Les produits Tresemmé sont largement disponibles dans les grandes surfaces, ce qui les rend faciles à acheter. 4. **Formulations avancées** : Certains produits incluent des ingrédients comme la kératine ou l'huile de coco, qui sont réputés pour leurs bienfaits capillaires. ### Points négatifs : 1. **Ingrédients controversés** : Certaines formulations contiennent des sulfates, parabènes ou silicones, qui peuvent ne pas convenir à tout le monde, en particulier pour ceux qui recherchent des produits plus naturels ou pour les cheveux très secs et bouclés. 2. **Effets à long terme** : Quelques utilisateurs ont mentionné que leurs cheveux deviennent secs ou ternes avec un usage prolongé, surtout si les shampoings contiennent beaucoup de produits chimiques. 3. **Pas entièrement naturel** : Contrairement à certaines marques qui se concentrent sur des ingrédients d'origine naturelle, Tresemmé n'a pas nécessairement cette approche. En résumé, Tresemmé est un bon choix pour ceux qui recherchent une solution abordable et pratique, mais si vous avez des préoccupations particulières quant aux ingrédients, il pourrait être utile de regarder plus attentivement les étiquettes ou d’opter pour des alternatives plus douces.

product_name: TRESemmé Purify and Replenish Deep Cleansing Shampoo
product_review: The TRESemmé Purify and Replenish Deep Cleansing Shampoo has become my go-to for days when my hair needs a reset. It effectively removes buildup from styling products, oils, and impurities without leaving my hair feeling stripped or dry. After using it, my hair feels fresh, light, and super clean. It’s perfect for a deep cleanse, especially if you use a lot of hair products or have an oily scalp. The formula lathers well, rinses out easily, and has a subtle, pleasant scent that isn’t overpowering. I appreciate that it contains Vitamin C, which helps nourish my hair while cleansing. I usually follow up with a good conditioner to keep my hair soft and moisturized. The only downside is that it can be a bit drying if used too frequently, so I recommend using it once a week or as needed rather than daily. Overall, it’s a great clarifying shampoo that delivers on its promise to deeply cleanse and replenish!

product_name: Tresemme Rich Moisture Shampoo for Dry Hair
product_review: As someone with naturally dry hair, finding the right shampoo has always been a challenge. TRESemmé Rich Moisture Shampoo has been an absolute lifesaver for my hair care routine. From the very first use, I could tell this shampoo was different. It has a rich, creamy consistency that feels luxurious as you lather it into your hair. The scent is delightful – fresh and clean, but not overpowering. After rinsing, my hair feels incredibly clean without that stripped, dry feeling I often get from other shampoos. It leaves my hair feeling soft, hydrated, and noticeably more manageable. Over time, I've seen a significant improvement in the overall health of my hair. It looks shinier, feels smoother, and the dryness is much less of an issue. What I really appreciate about TRESemmé Rich Moisture Shampoo is that it delivers salon-quality results at an affordable price. It's also easy to find in most stores, making it a convenient option. Overall, TRESemmé Rich Moisture Shampoo has transformed my dry hair into something I’m proud of. If you're struggling with dry, brittle hair, I highly recommend giving this shampoo a try. It truly delivers on its promise of rich moisture and leaves your hair looking and feeling fantastic.

product_name: Tresemme Rich Moisture Shampoo for Dry Hair
product_review: Designed with sleek black and white packaging, our products are both stylish and easy to distinguish. The packaging clearly displays product contents, such as being paraben-free, ensuring peace of mind for users. With a light, long-lasting fragrance that stays on hair for 3 to 4 hours, our products are perfect for all-day freshness. Some users may find the large, 800ml bottles cumbersome, especially when dispensing the thick conditioner. We believe a pump design would improve usability for such large bottles.

product_name: Tresemme Rich Moisture Shampoo for Dry Hair
product_review: I recently tried out the Tresemme Rich Moisture Shampoo for Dry Hair, and I have to say, it's been a game-changer for my hair care routine. First and foremost, let's talk about its effectiveness in providing hydration to dry hair. This shampoo is specifically formulated to deliver rich moisture to parched strands, and it truly lives up to its promise. After just a few uses, I noticed a significant improvement in the overall softness and smoothness of my hair. It effectively hydrates and nourishes my locks, leaving them feeling silky, manageable, and healthy. One of the things I love most about this shampoo is its luxurious lather. Despite being sulfate-free, it foams up beautifully and effectively cleanses the hair without stripping away its natural oils. It rinses out easily and leaves behind no residue, making my hair feel clean, refreshed, and rejuvenated. Another standout feature is its long-lasting hydration. Even after styling and heat exposure, my hair retains its moisture and looks and feels hydrated throughout the day. This is a huge plus for me, as I often struggle with dryness and frizz, especially in harsh weather conditions. I also appreciate the salon-quality performance of this shampoo at an affordable price point. Tresemme products are widely available and budget-friendly, making it easy to incorporate them into my hair care routine without breaking the bank. Overall, I'm extremely impressed with the Tresemme Rich Moisture Shampoo for Dry Hair. It's a reliable, effective, and affordable option for anyone looking to hydrate and nourish their hair without weighing it down. Whether you're dealing with dryness, damage, or just want to enhance your hair's natural moisture, I highly recommend giving this shampoo a try.

product_name: TRESemmé Keratin Smooth Infusing Shampoo

product_name: TRESemmé Keratin Smooth Infusing Shampoo
product_review: ### Key Features: 1. **Frizz Control**: The shampoo is particularly effective for people with frizzy hair, helping to keep hair smooth for up to 72 hours. 2. **Keratin**: Keratin is a protein that naturally occurs in hair, and this shampoo replenishes lost keratin, helping to strengthen and smooth the hair cuticle. 3. **Marula Oil**: Known for its moisturizing properties, marula oil helps to keep hair hydrated and soft. 4. **Sulfate-Free Option**: Tresemmé offers a sulfate-free version of this shampoo for those who prefer gentler cleansing, making it suitable for color-treated or chemically processed hair. 5. **Suitable for Various Hair Types**: While particularly beneficial for frizzy or unruly hair, it can be used on various hair types to add smoothness and shine. ### How to Use: Apply a generous amount to wet hair, lather, and rinse thoroughly. For best results, it is often recommended to follow with Tresemmé Keratin Smooth Conditioner. ### Durability and Effects: The effects of the shampoo, particularly the frizz control and smoothness, can last for several days, especially when used consistently as part of a hair care routine. The addition of keratin helps in making the hair stronger and more resilient over time.

product_name: TRESemmé Keratin Smooth Infusing Shampoo
product_review: The shampoo has great value for the size of the bottle. The scent is great and smells great. The texture and effectiveness of this shampoo is amazing and works great on my hair.

product_name: TRESemmé Keratin Smooth Infusing Shampoo
product_review: TRESemmé Keratin Smooth Infusing Shampoo is a fantastic product that lives up to its promises. As someone with frizzy hair, I'm always on the lookout for products that can help tame and smooth my locks, and this shampoo does just that. The keratin-infused formula works wonders in making my hair feel softer, look shinier, and overall more manageable. One of the things I appreciate the most about this shampoo is its lovely scent that lingers in my hair long after washing. The rich lather it produces makes it easy to distribute the product evenly, and a little goes a long way, which is great value for the price. After using TRESemmé Keratin Smooth Infusing Shampoo for a few weeks, I noticed a significant improvement in the texture and appearance of my hair. It feels healthier, looks sleeker, and is much easier to style. Overall, I highly recommend TRESemmé Keratin Smooth Infusing Shampoo to anyone looking for a reliable product to achieve smoother, shinier hair. It's an excellent choice for those battling frizz and seeking salon-quality results at home.

product_name: Dove Daily Moisture Shampoo
product_review: Thanks to Dove "Lightness and Moisture" shampoo, my hair became silky, soft, manageable and acquired an amazing look! I started using Dove shampoos from the first course, and that was 5 years ago! It was very difficult for me to choose a shampoo. My hair: horror, how soft, dry, unruly, frizzy and my main drawback, there is little of it in principle... Previously, I tried a restorative shampoo, my hair was like straw, broke, split... I also bought shampoos for volume, instead of hair I had a shaggy dandelion... The last thing I took was Dove shampoo! I don't know if it's a coincidence or not, but with the help of shampoos from this series, my split ends stopped today! The word "lightness" scared me in this shampoo. I was afraid that I would have a dandelion on my head, from this lightness, but some trust in this series has already awakened in me, we decided to take it anyway. Dove Shampoo Lightness and Moisturizing: The product is intended for those who need to moisturize their hair. In principle, you can not use additional means for rinsing, but I still use the shampoo together with the Dove "Volume and Restoration" conditioner, as the manufacturer advises. The shampoo has an unusual design. It tapers from the bottom to the top. And now the whole yummy part! The consistency of Dove shampoos is divine! It is so soft, medium thick, milky in color. It foams easily even from a small amount of the product. The aroma is delicious, similar to all previous Dove shampoos. It stays on the hair for quite a long time. The shampoo consumption is economical, thanks to good foaming. The foam is gentle, simply the most gentle, instantly envelops the entire head. There is so much foam on the head that I can barely feel the tips of my fingers, massaging my head. And what a thrill it is to massage your head with Dove shampoos... You can plunge from head to toe into this foam, you don’t even want to wash it off, really! Words cannot describe these feelings. The lid snaps on easily, and can be opened without any problems even with wet hands:

product_name: Pureology Hydrate Shampoo
product_review: Pureology shampoos are a game-changer for those seeking salon-quality hair care at home. With their luxurious formulas crafted from natural ingredients and free from harsh chemicals, they provide gentle yet effective cleansing that maintains the integrity of color-treated hair. Whether you're dealing with dryness, damage, or just want to preserve your vibrant color, Pureology shampoos deliver targeted solutions tailored to your hair's specific needs. Plus, their sulfate-free and vegan-friendly formulas ensure a clean and conscious beauty routine. With Pureology shampoos, you can achieve healthy, radiant hair that looks and feels salon-fresh every day.

product_review: I buy this product for my daughter who has frizzy hair. It does a great job taming it! Even better than the more expensive brands we’ve tried in the past.

product_review: So it works fine, but this product it isn’t my favorite. I think it’s worth a try for others. The smell is fine, and quality is fine as well. I still prefer the smooth shampoo and conditioner from Garnier Frutis, but this Patene products are still pretty good.

product_name: Pantene Smooth & Sleek Shampoo
product_review: Pantene Pro-V Glatt und Seidig Shampoo ist ideal für alle, die nach einer Lösung für widerspenstiges und krauses Haar suchen. Das Shampoo reinigt das Haar sanft und sorgt schon nach der ersten Anwendung für ein spürbar glatteres und weicheres Gefühl. Die Formel, angereichert mit Pro-Vitamin B5, nährt das Haar intensiv und macht es geschmeidig, ohne es zu beschweren. In Kombination mit dem passenden Conditioner wird das Haar zusätzlich vor Feuchtigkeit und Frizz geschützt, was besonders an feuchten Tagen vorteilhaft ist. Der frische, angenehme Duft bleibt lange erhalten und verleiht dem Haar ein gepflegtes Finish. Auch die Kämmbarkeit wird spürbar verbessert, was das Styling erleichtert. Pantene Pro-V Glatt und Seidig hält, was es verspricht, und sorgt für glattes, gesund aussehendes Haar. Wer glatte und seidig glänzende Haare möchte, wird von diesem Produkt nicht enttäuscht sein.

product_name: Pantene Smooth & Sleek Shampoo
product_review: My honest review is that Pantene is great, we only basically use Pantene since forever, my family only bought this brand and we honestly loved it, we had great results and we are pleased with it.

product_name: Pantene Smooth & Sleek Shampoo
product_review: This shampoo leaves your hair feeling and smelling great ! The packaging is easy to open. This shampoo has a great lather and it’s easy to rinse off.

product_name: TRESemmé Keratin Smooth Shampoo
product_review: Finally, I tried Keratin Smooth shampoo with keratin straightening effect from TRESemme brand. You know, I really liked it. My slightly damaged Asian hair from lightening has become smooth and saturated as before! A few characteristics: shampoo of white opaque color with a mother-of-pearl sheen. The consistency is liquid, slippery, and looks more like liquid soap. The product has a very pleasant smell, sweetly floral It is very well applied to the hair, easily gets lost in a thick foam. It rinses once, in principle, even conditioner is not needed for trouble-free hair, shampoo perfectly moisturizes the hair even at the tips. What I immediately noticed after the first wash: 1. Easy to comb. The hair does not get tangled at all, it becomes smoother, it does not fluff. 2. Shine. I was afraid to get the effect of dirty, unwashed hair, but this did not happen with Keratin Smooth. The hair really shines, but at the same time it looks clean and well-groomed. My opinion: I don't know how other TRESemme products will behave, but Keratin Smooth shampoo has become my "excellent student". A really worthwhile product.

product_name: TRESemmé Keratin Smooth Shampoo

product_name: TRESemmé Keratin Smooth Shampoo
product_review: This shampoo is a must-have for anyone with frizzy or unruly hair. TRESemmé's Keratin Smooth Shampoo works wonders in keeping my hair smooth for days, even in humid conditions. It feels luxurious and foams nicely, leaving my hair silky but not heavy. It also helps in reducing breakage, and I've noticed less frizz and more shine. Plus, it's budget-friendly and delivers professional-quality results without breaking the bank. Love it.I’m a fan of the TRESemmé Keratin Smooth Shampoo for its ability to keep my hair manageable and less prone to frizz. After using it for a while, my hair feels softer, and it stays sleek even when I skip the straightener. The keratin infusion seems to really help with smoothing the hair cuticle, and the price is affordable for such quality. The only thing is that it might not be ideal for very fine hair, as it could leave it feeling a bit too smooth or flat.

product_name: TRESemmé Keratin Smooth Shampoo

product_name: TRESemmé Keratin Smooth Shampoo
product_review: Love the way it cleans my hair and how my hair feels after use. I use in conjunction with conditioner to get the most out of it. I have less frizzy hair when I use it. Have been using it for years. My hair is always soft and silky after washing it. There's lots less frizz even with air drying it. My hair has changed texture as I age along with going from wavy to curly. It has always been frizzy, but since using this, my hair doesn't have that issue. My hair is also so much healthier, shinier, and softer even when we have hard water.

product_name: TRESemmé Keratin Smooth Shampoo
product_review: Love the texture of this, not too thick or too runny. Smells Devine. My hair feels great after washing with this. Great value for money, the bottle is huge so lasts a long time.

product_name: TRESemmé Keratin Smooth Shampoo
product_review: We have been using the Tressemne keratin smooth shampoo for years. It takes all the frizz out of our hair without weighing it down. It has a great smell and is a good value for the money. ￼

product_name: TRESemmé Keratin Smooth Shampoo
product_review: I love this product so much one of my favorite, this product can be use for both woman and man hair , this is a must have for everything me it make the hair smooth

product_name: TRESemmé Keratin Smooth Shampoo

product_name: TRESemmé Keratin Smooth Shampoo
product_review: Me encanta su olor, me deja el pelo muy limpio y de textura sedoso, es muy efectivo para cabellos rebeldes como el mío . A mí me gusta mucho y para después de verano más aún

product_review: La verdad que es un champú básico de toda la vida que siempre hemos usado en mi casa. Deja una suavidad increíble y hace bastante espuma. Es ideal.

product_name: TRESemmé Keratin Smooth Shampoo
product_review: The TRESemmé KERATIN Smooth: brand has therefore set itself the objective of creating good quality hair products of identical quality .Shampoo and conditioner TRESEMMÉ KERATIN SMOOTH and Marula oils give you up to 72 hours on your hair good quality shampoo large size for normal and dry hair we hydrate the hair well to apply to the scalp helps fight dryness and breakage .Its nourishes, conditions and strengthens your hair and provides it with hydratation and elasticity

product_name: TRESemmé Keratin Smooth Shampoo
product_review: I noticed my hair feeling smooth after using this (even without conditioner) but I’ve used better, more effective products. The size of the bottle makes the price worth it for sure. I’d say it’s a good option.

product_name: Head and Shoulders Green Apple Daily-Use Anti-Dandruff Paraben Free Shampoo, 32.1 fl oz
product_review: I love how this shampoo smells and how the scent lasts for so long. It leaves my scalp so clean and helps get rid of buildup and dandruff. I love that it comes with a pump.

product_name: Head and Shoulders Green Apple Daily-Use Anti-Dandruff Paraben Free Shampoo, 32.1 fl oz
product_review: Ik ben verliefd op de geur van deze shampoo! Fijne substantie. Heerlijke, frisse appeltjes. De daily shampoo zit in een handige, grote flacon met pompsysteem. Slechts 2 tot 4 pompjes nodig om mijn haren schoon wassen en fris te laten ruiken. Én uitermate geschikt om de strijd aan te gaan tegen roos. Geschikt voor het hele gezin. Heerlijke shampoo voor een prima prijs. Een echte aanrader!

product_name: Head and Shoulders Green Apple Daily-Use Anti-Dandruff Paraben Free Shampoo, 32.1 fl oz
product_review: Head and shoulders helps me against the scalp in my hair, gives me a good texture and strengthens my scalp,prevents breakage and gives a good smell

product_name: Head and Shoulders Green Apple Daily-Use Anti-Dandruff Paraben Free Shampoo, 32.1 fl oz
product_review: Die Wirkung ist sehr gut, man merkt Haarwäsche für Haarwäsche wie die Schuppen weniger werden. der Duft ist überragend. Sehr intensiv. Mittlerweile finde ich die Produkte etwas preisintensiv.

product_name: Head and Shoulders Green Apple Daily-Use Anti-Dandruff Paraben Free Shampoo, 32.1 fl oz
product_review: I love this shampoo. Man it smells so good. I wish they had a perfume of it. The smell isn't to strong and my hair feels nice and fresh! It's definitely worth the value gets ride of the dandruff.

product_name: Head and Shoulders Green Apple Daily-Use Anti-Dandruff Paraben Free Shampoo, 32.1 fl oz
product_review: I have purchased this product multiple times it's that good. I have fine hair and it doesn't weigh it down or strip it too much. The scent is also very light and nice

product_name: Head and Shoulders Green Apple Daily-Use Anti-Dandruff Paraben Free Shampoo, 32.1 fl oz
product_review: Head & Shoulders is widely regarded as one of the best shampoos for treating dandruff and maintaining a healthy scalp. Its formula, which includes active ingredients like pyrithione zinc, is effective in reducing flakes, itchiness, and dryness, which are common symptoms of dandruff. Apart from its anti-dandruff benefits, Head & Shoulders is also known for leaving hair feeling clean and refreshed. It's gentle enough for regular use, and with a range of products tailored to different hair types, including options for added moisture, volume, and scalp care, it appeals to a broad audience. Additionally, it has a pleasant fragrance and lathers well, making it a practical and enjoyable shampoo for everyday use.

product_name: Head and Shoulders Green Apple Daily-Use Anti-Dandruff Paraben Free Shampoo, 32.1 fl oz
product_review: Innehållet räcker länge då det är en stor flaska, bra för storfamiljen och är prisvärd. Smidigt med pump. Doften är ljuvlig! Dock känns håret lite stripigt efter användande.

product_name: Head and Shoulders Green Apple Daily-Use Anti-Dandruff Paraben Free Shampoo, 32.1 fl oz
product_review: This anti-dandruff shampoo is the only one I use now, as it’s inexpensive, effective, and smells great. I’ve tried a lot of other medicated shampoos and I still prefer this staple.

product_name: Head and Shoulders Green Apple Daily-Use Anti-Dandruff Paraben Free Shampoo, 32.1 fl oz
product_review: I have always suffered from dandruff for most of my life, and this is the only shampoo that keeps my dandruff under control, I have tried other products, but after some time of use, my dandruff gets worse. It is gentle on my scalp and does not cause any allergic reaction on my skin, and my hair feels really clean. This one in particular has a pleasant apple scent, and the packaging is a sturdy plastic bottle.

product_name: Head and Shoulders Green Apple Daily-Use Anti-Dandruff Paraben Free Shampoo, 32.1 fl oz
product_review: Este champu es muy eficaz contra la caspa, limpia el cabello y la version con menta es ideal para el verano porque deja una senzacion refrescante.

product_name: Head and Shoulders Green Apple Daily-Use Anti-Dandruff Paraben Free Shampoo, 32.1 fl oz
product_review: Head & Shoulders Apple Fresh Anti-Dandruff Shampoo is a refreshing twist on the classic formula that promises to both cleanse and invigorate your scalp. One of the standout features of this product is its delightful apple scent, which leaves your hair smelling fresh and fruity all day long. The fragrance is not overpowering but just enough to give you that clean, crisp feeling. In terms of performance, the shampoo effectively combats dandruff, thanks to its active ingredient, pyrithione zinc. Regular use helps reduce flakes and soothe an itchy scalp, making it a reliable choice for those struggling with dandruff. The formula is also gentle enough for daily use, ensuring that your hair remains soft and manageable without drying it out. The consistency of the shampoo is just right—not too thick or too runny—and it lathers well, ensuring an even distribution throughout your hair. After rinsing, your hair feels clean and refreshed, with no residue left behind. Overall, Head & Shoulders Apple Fresh Anti-Dandruff Shampoo is a great addition to your hair care routine if you're looking for an effective solution to dandruff that also offers a pleasant, invigorating scent. It's a practical and enjoyable way to maintain a healthy scalp and hair

product_name: Head and Shoulders Green Apple Daily-Use Anti-Dandruff Paraben Free Shampoo, 32.1 fl oz
product_review: Champú anticaspa H&S formulado especialmente para combatir tanto los síntomas como las causas de la caspa. Nada agresivo con el cuero cabelludo, hay donde elegir, este en concreto es con aroma a manzana.

product_name: Head and Shoulders Green Apple Daily-Use Anti-Dandruff Paraben Free Shampoo, 32.1 fl oz
product_review: Seitdem wir dieses Produkt verwenden hat niemand mehr von uns schuppen. Es fühlt sich richtig toll an und dazu dieser herzliche Duft. Wenn man dann aus der Dusche steigt fühlt man sich richtig frisch.

product_name: Head and Shoulders Green Apple Daily-Use Anti-Dandruff Paraben Free Shampoo, 32.1 fl oz
product_review: The 2-in-1 shampoo has a pleasant apple scent. It makes the hair strong and healthy, but the hair can be a bit dry after washing. This shampoo is more suitable for oily scalps.

product_name: Head and Shoulders Green Apple Daily-Use Anti-Dandruff Paraben Free Shampoo, 32.1 fl oz
product_review: Absolutely the best shampoo I have ever used. After years of dandruff and trying various shampoos, within days of using this I am now dandruff free, no more white flakes or itchy scalp. Can't recommend it highly enough, amazing value for money and as well as getting rid of my dandruff it makes my hair sell like an orchard. Had many compliments 😊

product_name: Head and Shoulders Green Apple Daily-Use Anti-Dandruff Paraben Free Shampoo, 32.1 fl oz
product_review: I love this shampoo! love the scent that it leaves and it helps with dandruff!! Also the texture it leaves is amazing. It is not as expensive and the packaging is perfect!

product_name: Head and Shoulders Green Apple Daily-Use Anti-Dandruff Paraben Free Shampoo, 32.1 fl oz
product_review: Smooth and creamy shampoo in a convenient pump that lathers nicely and clarifies your hair. Affordable and smells delicious, all dandruff problems are gone.

product_review: C’est un de mes shampooing préférés, rien que l’odeur j’en suis fan et il me nourrit les cheveux à chaque fois c’est incroyable, par période parfois j’ai des « pellicules » car je lave trop mes cheveux ou il fait froid dehors donc pleine de ptits trucs blancs et ce shampooing me retire tout !

product_name: Head and Shoulders Green Apple Daily-Use Anti-Dandruff Paraben Free Shampoo, 32.1 fl oz

product_name: Head and Shoulders Green Apple Daily-Use Anti-Dandruff Paraben Free Shampoo, 32.1 fl oz

product_review: I'm a huge fan of Head & Shoulders, and I've used it for many years. It has always been a reliable and effective shampoo that has kept my hair clean and my scalp dandruff free.

product_review: Honestly my favorite shampoo. The smell is heavenly, and it cleans better than any clarifying one. I sometimes alternate with another shampoo so it's not too drying, but nothing a good conditioner can't fix.

product_name: Head and Shoulders Green Apple Daily-Use Anti-Dandruff Paraben Free Shampoo, 32.1 fl oz

product_name: Head and Shoulders Green Apple Daily-Use Anti-Dandruff Paraben Free Shampoo, 32.1 fl oz
product_review: This one smells AMAZING. If I can’t find the apple cider vinegar Head and Shoulders, then I usually opt for this one. I love head and shoulders, it’s the only shampoo I use.

product_name: Head and Shoulders Green Apple Daily-Use Anti-Dandruff Paraben Free Shampoo, 32.1 fl oz

product_name: Head and Shoulders Green Apple Daily-Use Anti-Dandruff Paraben Free Shampoo, 32.1 fl oz
product_review: Great product- gives a squeaky clean scalp! Suds up really well- and rinses out easy. Using it 2 times a week is perfect and does not dry out the rest of my hair.

product_name: Head and Shoulders Green Apple Daily-Use Anti-Dandruff Paraben Free Shampoo, 32.1 fl oz
product_review: This really does help with dandruff and this scent is my favorite out of the ones I’ve tried. It’s not my favorite anti dandruff shampoo of all time but it’s perfectly adequate. I would recommend if you have dandruff.

product_name: Head and Shoulders Green Apple Daily-Use Anti-Dandruff Paraben Free Shampoo, 32.1 fl oz
product_review: ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ Head and Shoulders Green Apple Shampoo is a game-changer!
