Highly recommend to anyone looking for a reliable and refreshing shampoo!

product_name: Head and Shoulders Green Apple Daily-Use Anti-Dandruff Paraben Free Shampoo, 32.1 fl oz
product_review: Jag har väldigt känslig hårbotten och har provat massor olika schampon men får alltid gå tillbaka till detta då det är det som fungerar bäst för mig. Det har en väldigt fräsch doft och håret känns jätterent efter tvätt!

product_name: Head and Shoulders Green Apple Daily-Use Anti-Dandruff Paraben Free Shampoo, 32.1 fl oz
product_review: This doesn’t make my scalp get dandruff and it reduce ghe dandruff on my scalp, although it didn’t work as a treatment. It also leaves a light scent on my hair

product_name: Herbal Essences Smooth Collection Shampoo
product_review: I am a mother of 3 girls, I love the smell of this shampoo and conditioner. My girls have been using this shampoo for a while. love how it leaves your hair smelling so good even after a day.

product_name: Herbal Essences Smooth Collection Shampoo
product_review: I love this shampoo. It smells amazing and it leaves my hair feeling soft and fresh. It lathers well and makes your hair texture smooth. The clear packaging shows off the pink tint of the shampoo which is cute and it’s easy to open in the shower.

product_name: Herbal Essences Smooth Collection Shampoo
product_review: This smells divine and leaves my hair feeling clean and healthy. It creates just the right amount of lather to know that is doing it's job. My hair has never looked or smelt better.

product_name: Herbal Essences Smooth Collection Shampoo
product_review: This shampoo leaves my hair feeling smooth and smelling great. It lathers really well, so only needs a drop in my hair and has a nice fruity scent. I have continued to buy this for years.

product_name: Herbal Essences Smooth Collection Shampoo
product_review: Ein tolles Shampoo mit Rosenduft, es reinigt gut schäumt sehr gut und die Haare duftet sehr angenehm nach Rose. Einfache Verpackung aber in einer schönen rosa Farbe. Preislich ist es erschwinglich

product_name: Herbal Essences Smooth Collection Shampoo
product_review: I love these old school bottles, they were how herbal essences used to be and the scent is so much better than the newer ones. The price is slightly high but worth it!

product_name: Herbal Essences Smooth Collection Shampoo
product_review: Ein tolles Shampoo. Ich liebe es wenn Shampoo viel Schaum macht. Die Haarstruktur fühlt sich gut an. Der Duft ist toll und die Verpackunh ansprechend. Ein gutes Preis-Leistung Verhältniss.

product_name: Herbal Essences Smooth Collection Shampoo
product_review: Super shiny hair!! Smells amazing! Lather is great on the second wash. Did you know, it’s two washes, one to wash the dirt out of your roots, second wash to clean your hair and one condition only to the ends not the scalp. Hair dresser knows 😇

product_name: Herbal Essences Smooth Collection Shampoo
product_review: Design sehr schön. Vertrage dieses Produkt sehr gut. Riecht einfach traumhaft nach Rose. Lässt sich gut verteilen. Haare fühlen sich weich und gepflegt an. Ich würde es absolut weiterempfehlen.

product_name: Herbal Essences Smooth Collection Shampoo
product_review: Sehr Zufrieden. Das Shampoo lässt sich gut dosieren und einfach auf das Haar auftragen. Das Haar riecht traumhaft nach Rose. Fühlt sich sehr gepflegt an. Ich würde es wieder kaufen.

product_name: Herbal Essences Smooth Collection Shampoo
product_review: Herbal essence smells amazing! I used to use it way back when I was in high school, and to this day I will buy it every now and then taking me back to my younger days. I love the way it leaves my hair feeling smooth and silky.

product_name: Herbal Essences Smooth Collection Shampoo
product_review: I keep my hair very short, plus I'm a guy, so what do I know about shampoo? I like what smells good, cleans well and doesn't dry out my scalp. This covers all of those bases. I've always been a fan of Herbal Essences and I think this is one of the better fragrances they offer. I may or may not even have used it as a body wash once or twice. Us guys are known for that. If we do something silly like that it's only because it's THAT good (or we're out of body wash). I love the smell enough that I don't mind smothering myself in it. Just like the old commercials, this one for sure makes me moan in the shower. For that reason I'll continue to buy it.

product_name: Herbal Essences Smooth Collection Shampoo
product_review: I love the floral scent of this shampoo! the packaging is stunning, this is a very clarifying shampoo for people with all hair types! I would recommend this shampoo

product_name: Herbal Essences Smooth Collection Shampoo
product_review: Zapach jest piękny, konsystencja jest dobra, opakowanie bardzo przyjemny i pięknie, shampoo jest dużo oczyszczanie aż do skryptu to mnie nie pasuje.

product_name: Herbal Essences Smooth Collection Shampoo
product_review: Wir benutzen die Marke sehr gerne. Wird hier sehr gut vertragen daher auch oft nach gekauft. Der Duft ist sehr angenehm nach rose. Preis ist angemessen. Würde ich wieder kaufen.

product_name: Herbal Essences Smooth Collection Shampoo
product_review: Smells amazing, lathers nicely, and cleans and smooths nicely. The packaging is adorable and pink! The ingredients work effectively. This is my go to shampoo and conditioner conditioner when I have to be out of town for work.

product_name: Herbal Essences Smooth Collection Shampoo
product_review: Dieses Shampoo hat einen wundervollen Rosenduft, der auch noch lange anhält. Zudem schäumt es richtig toll. Meine Haare werden gut gepflegt. Nach dem Motto Haare waschen, glänzen meine Haare auch noch richtig schön!

product_name: Herbal Essences Smooth Collection Shampoo
product_review: The Herbal Essence shampoo smells like I have stepped into a tropical forest with fresh roses and sunshine. It leaves my hair clean and soft. Great value for the money and I would buy it over again.

product_name: Herbal Essences Smooth Collection Shampoo
product_review: Das Schampoo hat einen feinen Duft und pflegt meine Haare vortrefflich. Der Schaum ist sehr stabil, die Flasche schön und summa summarum ist das Produkt preiswert.

product_name: Herbal Essences Smooth Collection Shampoo
product_review: I like this product because the fragrance is floral. It lathers very well. It’s effective and does its job. Packaging is nice. Ingredients are rich.

product_name: Herbal Essences Smooth Collection Shampoo
product_review: It smells so good! you don't have to use a lot in order for it to lather, which is nice. It does a great job cleaning up the scalp as well!

product_name: Herbal Essences Smooth Collection Shampoo
product_review: Perfecto para cabello lacio,lo deja suave y brilloso,su fragancia es bastante buena,,y espeso el producto,un punto a favor,,me encanta q los ingredientes sean naturales en su mayoria.funciona muy bien en general.El empaque es perfecto y facil de usar

product_name: Herbal Essences Smooth Collection Shampoo
product_review: The smell is amazing. The pump is good and doesn’t usually break for me. Had a very foamy lather. I do think it’s effective is smoothing my frizz. I have very fine hair and I doesn’t seems to weight it down.

product_name: Herbal Essences Smooth Collection Shampoo
product_review: Es un buen producto, tiene rica fragancia y deja el cabello radiante. El envase es tal cual en la foto. Los ingredientes que trae hace oler y verse mi cabello muy bonito

product_name: Herbal Essences Smooth Collection Shampoo
product_review: Das Shampoo ist in einer großen und sehr schönen Flasche. Es ist einfach in der Anwendung und hat einen extrem guten Duft. Ihr werdet den Duft lieben. Während der Anwendung merkt man direkt, dass die Haare geschmeidig sind und nach dem waschen sind die Haare gesund und glänzend

product_name: Herbal Essences Smooth Collection Shampoo
product_review: Das Shampoo lässt sich gut im Haar verteilen und duftet sehr blumig und angenehm. Es schäumt angemessen. Bei langen Haaren wird aber auch die Spülung benötigt. Die Verpackung ist sehr ansehnlich.

product_name: Herbal Essences Smooth Collection Shampoo
product_review: Das Shampoo ist für trockenes, stumpfes Haar geeignet. Es duftet unter der Dusche sehr angenehm, blumig und lecker. Dieser aufmunternde Rosenduft wirkt sich positiv auf das Gemüt aus. Wie alle Herbal Essence Produkte ist das Shampoo zu 97% natürlichen Ursprungs, mit echten Rosen Essencen. Ich hatte nach der Anwendung von Shampoo und Spülung super weiches, glänzendes, gescheidiges, super duftendes Haar - perfekt jetzt im Frühling.

product_name: Herbal Essences Smooth Collection Shampoo
product_review: Super hydrating and smells like actual roses 🌹 love the finish it gives and really smooth on my scalp! It’s not strong either chemicals and is certified vegan, 97% organic and recyclable

product_name: Herbal Essences Smooth Collection Shampoo
product_review: Always used this shampoo since I was a kid. I love the scent of the roses, the texture of it is all smooth and thick and it lathers up really well. Leaves your hair feeling all clean and smooth and with a luxurious scent. Packaging is very pretty as well. So it stands out for me.

product_name: Herbal Essences Smooth Collection Shampoo
product_review: OH MY GOODNESS! When I opened to smell it so lovely and fresh of rose. I gently massaged my head, and it was lovely soupy and felt like I was in the garden 😂 I got them from superdrugs. You can get it from anywhere.

product_name: Herbal Essences Smooth Collection Shampoo
product_review: Verzorgende shampoo voor vochtbehoevend haar, formule met hyaluronzuur als echte vochtboost voor lengtes en hoofdhuid Resultaat: Gezond glanzend, levendig en zwierig haar, langdurige hydratatie en verzorging tot in de punten Gebruik: aanbrengen op nat haar, zachtjes inmasseren in de hoofdhuid en ga vervolgens verder met verzorgingsroutine Beschermende en regenererende werking tegen schade door externe omgevingsinvloeden, vochtverzorging tot 72 uur Inhoud: Elvital Hydra Hyaluronic hydraterende shampoo voor glanzend en gezond haar, 1 x 300 ml

product_name: Herbal Essences Smooth Collection Shampoo
product_review: Smells amazing and made my hair so soft and smooth! Absolutely a new go to with the pink color and clean ingredients, and an unbeatable price!!!!

product_name: Herbal Essences Smooth Collection Shampoo
product_review: One of my favorite shampoos to use. Makes my hair feel so clean, and the scent is amazing. I’m not usually one for rose scented anything but this smells wonderful.

product_name: Herbal Essences Smooth Collection Shampoo
product_review: My absolute favorite shampoo! The smell is so fresh and light! It cleans my hair so well, and helps keep it soft and healthy. Not to mention you just can’t beat the price point for what you’re getting! 10/10, would always recommend!

product_name: Herbal Essences Smooth Collection Shampoo
product_review: Das Shampoo, die Pflegespülung und die Haarmaske lassen sich super ins Haar einarbeiten. Der angenehme leichte Blumenduft hält sich in meinem Haar ca. einen Tag. Nach der Anwendung sind die Haare leicht kämmbar, schön weich und haben einen schönen gesunden Glanz. Es ist eine gute Produktreihe die ich gerne weiterempfehle.

product_name: Herbal Essences Smooth Collection Shampoo
product_review: I bought this today while it was on offer after seeing so many people complimenting the smell and benefits of it. I've used it on my hair and the conditioner and found it smells even better once your hair has dried, the ingredients are cruelty free which is a must when buying and the bottle is easily recycled. The product itself looks cosmetically pleasing to the eye.

product_name: Herbal Essences Smooth Collection Shampoo
product_review: Dieses Trio von Herbal Essences Blütensanft mit Rosenduft ist die perfekte Kombination für eine gute Haarpflege. Das Shampoo schäumt prima und lässt das Haar gleich gepflegt wirken. Als perfekte Ergänzung zum Shampoo sind Haarmaske und Conditioner spitze. Sie lassen sich gut auftragen, pflegen das Haar sehr gut und es lässt sich gut durchkämmen. Und der Duft nach Rosen ist einfach himmlisch, er bleibt lange bestehen und verbessert unsere Stimmung definitiv. Wir können wirklich nicht mehr aufhören uns an den Haaren zu schnüffeln.

product_name: Herbal Essences Smooth Collection Shampoo
product_review: Mein liebstes Shampoo von Herbal Essences. Es duftet angenehm und die Haare fühlen sich nach dem Waschen frisch und gesund an. Die Menge ist sehr ergiebig.

product_name: Herbal Essences Smooth Collection Shampoo
product_review: This shampoo smells gorgeous, like roses but not overwhelmingly so. The shampoo along with the matching conditioner leaves my fine hair VERY soft, almost too soft (nothing styling product can’t help) and easy to detangle.

product_name: Herbal Essences Smooth Collection Shampoo
product_review: Best scent ever. Leaves my hair smelling amazing and super clean and soft. The bottle is a pretty good size and and the price is super affordable.

product_name: Herbal Essences Smooth Collection Shampoo
product_review: I have been using this shampoo and conditioner for over 6 years and I have never suffered from split-ends, breakage, or dryness. My hair is virgin, so I don’t have damage from hair dye! I always get the largest size bottles and it’s such an amazing price and product. I have tried other more expensive hair products and they don’t leave my hair feeling the same way this one does.

product_name: Herbal Essences Smooth Collection Shampoo
product_review: I'm absolutely thrilled with this collection! This product is a game-changer when it comes to hair care. Not only does it live up to its promise of making my hair incredibly soft, but the scent is absolutely divine. The sweet, lingering fragrance leaves my hair smelling amazing all day long. Using Herbal Essences Rose Hips is like giving my hair a luxurious treat every time.

product_name: Herbal Essences Smooth Collection Shampoo
product_review: Let me tell you about my experience with Herbal Essences Smooth Collection Shampoo—it's been a game-changer for my hair care routine! 🌿✨ From the first time I used it, I noticed a significant difference in the texture and manageability of my hair. The formula is infused with a blend of rose hips, vitamin E, and jojoba extracts, which work together to nourish and hydrate my hair, leaving it feeling incredibly soft and smooth. Plus, the irresistible floral scent lingers long after I've stepped out of the shower, adding a touch of luxury to my daily routine. One of the things I love most about this shampoo is its ability to tame frizz and flyaways, even on the most humid days. It leaves my hair looking sleek and polished, without weighing it down or making it feel greasy. Another standout feature is its gentle formula, which is free from parabens, silicones, and colorants. As someone with sensitive skin, I appreciate knowing that I'm not exposing my scalp to any harsh or potentially irritating ingredients. Overall, Herbal Essences Smooth Collection Shampoo has become a must-have in my shower caddy. It delivers salon-quality results at an affordable price, and I love the way it makes my hair look and feel. If you're in need of a shampoo that leaves your locks soft, smooth, and frizz-free, look no further than this gem!

product_name: Herbal Essences Smooth Collection Shampoo
product_review: Das Shampoo reinigt mein Haar sanft und gründlich, ohne es auszutrocknen. Es hinterlässt einen wunderbar zarten Rosenduft, der lange anhält. Besonders gut gefällt mir: • Der zarte Rosenduft • Die sanfte Reinigung • Das geschmeidige Haargefühl nach der Wäsche • Die vegane Formel Meine Haare fühlen sich nach der Anwendung weich, glänzend und gepflegt an.

product_name: Herbal Essences Smooth Collection Shampoo
product_review: My favorite go to shampoo and conditioner. A inexpensive, smell good product. It washes your hair while leaving a great smell to it. It works amazing!!!

product_name: Herbal Essences Smooth Collection Shampoo
product_review: So ein toller Duft der die Haare so frisch riechen lässt und super Länge hält. Ich kann ihn jedesmal aufs Neue empfehlen den der Effekt ist einfach wow. Absolut preiswert und ein richtig rosiger Duft der sich wirklich riechen lässt

product_name: Herbal Essences Smooth Collection Shampoo
product_review: This shampoo smells soo good it smells like almost fruity roses. I’ve been using this for most of my life as my mom was a fan of this shampoo too. It cleans really well almost too good borderline stripping . If you have oily hair you’ll love this if your hair is on the dryer side you might not. The price is always pretty good for these I got the matching conditioner and it smells just as good it’s good for detangling but could have better slip. Overall for a shampoo that’s pretty easy to find it’s very good not perfect but good

product_name: Herbal Essences Smooth Collection Shampoo
product_review: I wanted to change the shampoo l always use. I think my hair needed a change. I have salon coloured hair, that’s why choosing Herbal Essences classic replenishing shampoo was my choice. Nice light fragrance and lathers up quite well. It is for coloured hair. It’s of a good consistency. I have noticed my hair is a little softer and feels squeaky clean. It is a reasonably priced shampoo that will not break the budget. Would recommend this Herbal Essence shampoo to family and friends. The only thing l found that l don’t like is the construction of the cap, l’ve pulled the cap off the hinge holding it onto the bottle. It never goes back on correctly

product_name: Herbal Essences Smooth Collection Shampoo
product_review: Eines meiner Lieblings Shampoos. Riecht gut. Nicht zu viel glycerin enthalten. Macht die Haare sehr geschmeidig. Benutze ich echt sehr gerne.

product_name: Herbal Essences Smooth Collection Shampoo
product_review: I love herbal essences products. When I found out they expanded their line, I had to give it a try! I love roses and this shampoo smells gorgeous 😍 it makes your hair silky and smooth, I just wish it added some volume too as I feel like my hair is a bit flat when using it!

product_name: Head & Shoulders Smooth & Silky Anti-Dandruff Shampoo
product_review: Great value. The scent is great. Makes my hair feel soft and silky. Dose not make my head itch like others. And my hair looks healthy after each use.

product_name: Head & Shoulders Smooth & Silky Anti-Dandruff Shampoo
product_review: Pretty good dandruff shampoo but not amazing. It smells nice. It lathers really well. However, I don’t feel that it does much for my dandruff. There are better dandruff shampoos.

product_name: Head & Shoulders Smooth & Silky Anti-Dandruff Shampoo
product_review: Sia io che mio narito adoriamo questo shampo!. Mantiene quello che promette, 100% protezione dalla forfora, con un uso regolare. Protegge la cute mantenendo un buon equilibrio del microbioma, con in più una parte di balsamo per capelli lusci e nutriti. Decisamente approvato, non solo come cura per la forfora ma anche in prevenzione.

product_name: Head & Shoulders Smooth & Silky Anti-Dandruff Shampoo
product_review: Šampon používáme celá rodina. Má příjemnou krémovou texturu, nádherně voní a hlavně pomáhá. Není vhodný pro extra suché vlasy, ale jinak je k nezaplacení. Toto větší balení je úsporné pro peněženku a vhodné pro 5ti člennou rodinu. Vlasy jsou po něm čisté, bsz lupů. Jsou jemné a hebké.

product_name: Head & Shoulders Smooth & Silky Anti-Dandruff Shampoo
product_review: I love the smell and how it makes my hair feel so soft! Great price too. Great for short or long hair. For women and men.

product_name: Head & Shoulders Smooth & Silky Anti-Dandruff Shampoo
product_review: Jeśli chodzi o szampon z serii Head&shouders moim ulubionym jest 2in1 Smooth&Silky. Ma kremową konsystencje, jest bardzo wydajny bo wystarczy odrobina nawet przy moich włosach średniej długości. Radzi sobie z łupieżem perfekcyjnie, nie znam innego zapobiegającego szamponu o takiej skuteczności. Zostawia wlosy oczyszczone,pięknie pachnące. Kupimy go poniżej 20zl więc cena jest ok.

product_name: Head & Shoulders Smooth & Silky Anti-Dandruff Shampoo
product_review: Este shampoo es una delicia para tu pelo , desde el olor hasta la buena limpieza sin dañar tu cabello , su envase y productos son bastante buenos y duraderos ya que con poquito producto obtendrás una gran limpieza y bastante espuma , su precio es súper asequible

product_name: Head & Shoulders Smooth & Silky Anti-Dandruff Shampoo
product_review: It has not helped with dandruff much but leaves hair smooth and silky. I would recommend. Scent is very refreshing and lathers really well. Great value for money.

product_name: Head & Shoulders Smooth & Silky Anti-Dandruff Shampoo
product_review: i just bought Head &Shoulders in Target last week . the smell of Anti - Dandruff shampoo & Conditioner very good . the smell of flower make me feel very comfortable, i really love this smell . my hair is dry and damaged a lot by iron a lot . my hair is died. but this shampoo help a lot just like giving food for my hair , my hair getting better , don't i don't lost a lot of hair like before. Head &Shoulders never disappointed me . highly recommend this product

product_name: Head & Shoulders Smooth & Silky Anti-Dandruff Shampoo
product_review: The scent of this one is amazing! Packaging is simple yet eye catching. The texture is smooth and creamy. It is a great value for the price. Effectiveness comes with continued use.

product_name: Head & Shoulders Smooth & Silky Anti-Dandruff Shampoo
product_review: I use this product for my first rinse and then use my regular shampoo. It works really well to remove and prevent dandruff, all while making my hair feel soft and smooth

product_name: Head & Shoulders Smooth & Silky Anti-Dandruff Shampoo
product_review: This is a review of the 2-in-1 formula. This is my go-to daily haircare and has been for a few years. The 2-in-1 formula is super easy to use. Instead of using two products and waiting forever for a conditioner to rinse out, this rinses quickly and cleanly. It manages to not strip the hair and gives it light hydration. This is a must for those of us who aren’t looking to spend a lot of time tending to our hair daily but still want to look nice. If I am having a special occasion, I might try something other than this product for those days, but this is just so easy for the day-to-day. Pleasant scent.

product_name: Head & Shoulders Smooth & Silky Anti-Dandruff Shampoo
product_review: Head & Shoulders 2 in 1 Shampoo, Smooth and Silky is a game-changer for dandruff control and hair smoothness. It leaves my scalp refreshed and my hair silky soft with a pleasant scent. Highly recommend for a convenient and effective hair care solution!

product_name: Head & Shoulders Smooth & Silky Anti-Dandruff Shampoo
product_review: Etablierte Produkte mit hoher Qualität, sind ihren Preis wert, angenehmer Duft, schöne Konsistenz, gut aufzutragen, schöner Schaum, spürbarer Effekt im Haar

product_name: Head & Shoulders Smooth & Silky Anti-Dandruff Shampoo
product_review: Me encanta es el de toda la vida, es efectivo, su esencia, su empaque, la textura y el precio me encanta es es q más me a gustado cuando tengo un poco de re sequedad en el cuero cabelludo.

product_name: Head & Shoulders Smooth & Silky Anti-Dandruff Shampoo
product_review: I actually use this product during the winter when the skin sloughs off. What they don't tell you if you have the medical condition of blepharitis or anything like that that you need to leave it on for 5 minutes before rinsing it out and it'll be effective and you can use it at least three times a week doing that and it's awesome ,smell is great it's moisturizing give it a 4 out of 5 for the frizziness cuz I still had to use an oil later to keep my frizziness down.

product_name: Head & Shoulders Smooth & Silky Anti-Dandruff Shampoo
product_review: Dieses Schuppen schampo ist super gegen Schuppen ,es gibt dir nach dem duschen ein frisches Gefuhl auf der Kopfhaut,der Preis ist auch super kann es jeden weiter empfehlen.

product_name: Head & Shoulders Smooth & Silky Anti-Dandruff Shampoo
product_review: It's great to use as a daily shampoo or just as you need it. Dandruff will be gone in no time after using this product. Just try it for yourself and you will see, it's the perfect combination for your hair.

product_name: Head & Shoulders Smooth & Silky Anti-Dandruff Shampoo
product_review: It gets the job done, but It doesn’t make my hair soft, the scent is good but it makes the texture of my hair like I haven’t used conditioner, The packaging is pretty but It’s not worth the price.

product_name: Head & Shoulders Smooth & Silky Anti-Dandruff Shampoo
product_review: I started using this shampoo because my scalp became really sensitive,after just few times using it my scalps became much better!it is really worth buying it if you have sensitive scalp and dandruff! The scent is very nice which is a bonus!

product_name: Head & Shoulders Smooth & Silky Anti-Dandruff Shampoo
product_review: Head and shoulders shampoo is known for dandruff shampoo. My scalp was clean and stop itching right after I washed my hair. It felt like a relieve when my hair and scalp is not itching anymore. Combine with head & shoulders conditioner is a hit. Highly recommended.

product_name: Head & Shoulders Smooth & Silky Anti-Dandruff Shampoo
product_review: Good shampoo. Good smell and can control the dandruff. Texture is good not too much thick. Nice bottle with well packing. Good for itchy scalp. It’s make the hair a little dry, highly recommended use together with conditioner.

product_name: Head & Shoulders Smooth & Silky Anti-Dandruff Shampoo
product_review: Love it on so many levels! Keeps the flakes away and doesnt smell medicinal. Smells wonderful. It also keeps my hair smooth and not frizzy. Best bang for your buck when you have dandruff.

product_name: Head & Shoulders Smooth & Silky Anti-Dandruff Shampoo
product_review: Always my go to when i get a dry scalp! Good price and gets the job done as intended. I jist dont notice much difference with it making hair "smooth and silky". Not a dealbreaker for me, though, i love it!

product_name: Head & Shoulders Smooth & Silky Anti-Dandruff Shampoo
product_review: Smells lovely and cleans the hair well. Leaves the hair feeling silky smooth. Sleek bottle design and good price for the amount you get. A lot of the time the shops have promotions on these.

product_name: Head & Shoulders Smooth & Silky Anti-Dandruff Shampoo
product_review: I used this for years even when I was not struggling with dandruff. It smells wonderful and was good for my hair. It did also seem to work when I had bad dandruff.

product_name: Head & Shoulders Smooth & Silky Anti-Dandruff Shampoo
product_review: I buy these from Tescos 3 for £10 which is a good bargain as else where I have seen them for £6 pound each! The scent of them all last 1-2 days, the texture isn’t like other shampoos I have used you only need a little bit and goes a long way! Good for dandruff!

product_name: Head & Shoulders Smooth & Silky Anti-Dandruff Shampoo
product_review: I love the smell & how it leaves my hair. I use it when I need to wash my hair really fast and it leaves my hair feeling nice. It’s budget friendly. Recommend.

product_name: Head & Shoulders Smooth & Silky Anti-Dandruff Shampoo
product_review: Head and shoulders have always been my favorite shampo for anti Dandruff relief. it is very silky, very smooth and the scent of the shampoo is very nice and the price is very low

product_name: Head & Shoulders Smooth & Silky Anti-Dandruff Shampoo
product_review: I have been using head and shoulders for years and it makes my hair feel great. Doesn't wright it down, and not greasy, my hair looks and feels great.

product_name: Head & Shoulders Smooth & Silky Anti-Dandruff Shampoo
product_review: I use head and shoulders shampoo every other night to wash my hair. I suffer with bad dandruff and have used many other brands but find this is the only one that actually works. They always have special offers on when purchasing, it smells lovely and leaves my hair shiny and smooth.

product_name: Head & Shoulders Smooth & Silky Anti-Dandruff Shampoo
product_review: Shampoo eccezionale, ma ciò che mi piace di piu e la profumazione di questi shampoo perché se apri il contenitore senti già il profumo anche a distanza.

product_name: Head & Shoulders Smooth & Silky Anti-Dandruff Shampoo
product_review: I’ve been using this new shampoo for a couple of weeks now, and it’s okay, I guess. The effectiveness is just average; it cleans my hair, but I haven’t noticed any remarkable changes or improvements. The scent is pleasant enough, not too strong or too faint, just there. As for the texture, it’s like most shampoos, maybe a bit creamier, which is nice. The packaging is pretty standard, nothing that stands out on the shelf or in my shower. And when it comes to value for money, it’s reasonably priced, but considering I didn’t find anything special about it, I might try something else next time. It does the job, but I’m not wowed by it.

product_name: Head & Shoulders Smooth & Silky Anti-Dandruff Shampoo
product_review: The fragrance is soothing, the scalp is not itchy. Sometimes more than weeks I wash my hair and still not itchy . Those are my feelings when using. That’s it.

product_name: Head & Shoulders Smooth & Silky Anti-Dandruff Shampoo
product_review: Demasiado bueno, me deja el cabello suave y me controla la caspa, para mi Head shoulders siempre sera un 20/10, además que me ayuda mucho con el frezz, deja sensación a frescura y limpieza

product_name: Head & Shoulders Smooth & Silky Anti-Dandruff Shampoo
product_review: I recommend you try using this shampoo because it has the ability to clean oil and dandruff on the scalp, restoring damaged hair function and make it shiny.

product_name: Head & Shoulders Smooth & Silky Anti-Dandruff Shampoo
product_review: So effective! Nothing else works with my hair to get rid of a dry scalp. So cheap - great value for money and the scent is amazing. Pretty packaging, definitely recommend

product_name: Head & Shoulders Smooth & Silky Anti-Dandruff Shampoo
product_review: A lovely product to help keep dandruff at bay. This is used my all of the family and has a lovely scent. My daughters have seen excellent results so far.

product_name: Head & Shoulders Smooth & Silky Anti-Dandruff Shampoo
product_review: This is a very good shampoo but I highly recommend getting the shampoo and conditioner bundle. I haven’t had a good experience with 2 in 1. I find it’s best to use the shampoo and conditioner separate.

product_name: Head & Shoulders Smooth & Silky Anti-Dandruff Shampoo
product_review: I both the pair shampoo and conditioner and it helped get grid of my dandruff. When I first apply it, it leaves my scalp feeling fresh and clean. My hair ge5 adjusted to it and then dandruff tends to come back.

product_name: Head & Shoulders Smooth & Silky Anti-Dandruff Shampoo
product_review: Nice smelling shampoo and you don’t need to use too much. Makes my hair feel soft. Easy to spot in the supermarket. Usually on offer which is good.

product_name: Head & Shoulders Smooth & Silky Anti-Dandruff Shampoo
product_review: We love this in our house it really does the job! Smells amazing too, it’s great value for money and a little goes along way. It’s like any other shampoo just with added extras to make your hair lovely and silky

product_name: Head & Shoulders Smooth & Silky Anti-Dandruff Shampoo
product_review: I've been using this for the past year, and I absolutely stand by my brand. If you have dandruff. Look no further!! This will leave your hair feeling nourished and silky. There is no need for salon products when this makes your hair feel just as beautiful.

product_name: Head & Shoulders Smooth & Silky Anti-Dandruff Shampoo
product_review: Been using this shampoo for foreverrr. It does help prevent dandruff but not entirely. Not a big fan of the scent or the texture of the liquid. It’s also kinda drying but that can be remedied by conditioner. Packaging is pretty nice and doesn’t break easily. It’s also pretty cheap. Overall, just a meh shampoo.

product_name: Head & Shoulders Smooth & Silky Anti-Dandruff Shampoo
product_review: Good product doesn't dry your hair out. Also it smells amazing and better still your still going to be dandruff free. Also it isn't a very expensive shampoo. And does an amazing job

product_name: Head & Shoulders Smooth & Silky Anti-Dandruff Shampoo
product_review: I've been using this Head & Shoulfers Smooth and Silky Anti-Dandruff Shampoo for decades now and it keeps my scalp dandruff free. I also love the fresh scent and smooth hair.

product_name: Head & Shoulders Smooth & Silky Anti-Dandruff Shampoo
product_review: Is good shampoo like all from head and sholders but i prefer the menthol one.II didn't helpmewithmy dandruff at all. The hairi is nine and smoothaftertheuse.

product_name: Head & Shoulders Smooth & Silky Anti-Dandruff Shampoo
product_review: This is my go to shampoo. My scalp is very dry specially In the winter and this helps me keep my scalp moisturized. The bottle is very pretty and it lasts all month.

product_name: Head & Shoulders Smooth & Silky Anti-Dandruff Shampoo
product_review: In the winter months I get such bad dandruff and head and shoulders always takes it away I really like the scent to this! It works amazingly well leaves my hair silky smooth!

product_name: Head & Shoulders Smooth & Silky Anti-Dandruff Shampoo
product_review: I personally can’t use any other shampoo or container unless it’s from head and shoulders. As I have a sensitive scalp the scents don’t affect my skin which is lovely! The texture of the products is nice and think so you can really feel it removing any build up/ dirt. And of course it’s great value for money! You get the salon feel and amazing soft hair for under £5.

product_name: Suave Keratin Infusion Smoothing Shampoo
product_review: This shampoo leaves my hair nice and shiny. It also helps make my hair manageable by keeping it smooth. The smell is nice, and it's worth every penny i spend on it.

product_name: Suave Keratin Infusion Smoothing Shampoo
product_review: I have always used suave, but after trying the Keratin infusion smoothing shampoo I love this brand even more. It comes in a squeeze bottle for easy dispensing. It has a light scent and a smooth texture. And it leaves my hair so smooth and manageable.

product_name: Suave Keratin Infusion Smoothing Shampoo
product_review: Suave brings me back in time with their scents. They are a go to if I am wanting to switch up my shampoo game. Suave is on the lower end of cost and still delivers everything you want to clean your hair. Suave is very effective in keeping my hair healthy.

product_name: Suave Keratin Infusion Smoothing Shampoo
product_review: I had never tried suave hair products so I thought I would give this a try. The shampoo and conditioner came together which wa sa money saver. This product did not disappoint both the shampoo and conditioner made my hair feel smooth , manageable and easy to style. I would defintly recommend this product

product_name: Suave Keratin Infusion Smoothing Shampoo
product_review: LOVE!! This is the only shampoo I use. Usually when I use any other shampoo my hair will be extra frizzy, super dry, and puffy but this shampoo has helped maintain my my hair frizz. Besides that, the scent to this shampoo is amazing!!! I get compliments all the time that my hair smells really good and I always get asked what shampoo I use.

product_name: Suave Keratin Infusion Smoothing Shampoo
product_review: Great shampoo for the price! Leaves my hair smelling great and feeling clean. Leaves my hair soft as well. Packaging is good and easy to use! I’ve seen better, more expensive shampoos out there but this one does the job

product_name: Suave Keratin Infusion Smoothing Shampoo
product_review: as someone who has been using salon quality hair products for a while now, i have to say that this made my hair feel better than some of the high end products i have tried! i used this while on a weekend trip and i have to say, it did impress me. my hair felt so clean and soft after days of being at the lake and in the sun. my hair did not feel weighed down at all. it also had a beautiful shine!

product_name: Suave Keratin Infusion Smoothing Shampoo
product_review: Suave Keratin is so good for my hair and my family's hair. Not only does it come home with shampoo and conditioner, you can purchase it this way, it is cost effective. The smell is divine and both products are superb when it comes to shampoo and conditioner! My hair is thriving and I definitely recommend giving them a try!!

product_name: Suave Keratin Infusion Smoothing Shampoo
product_review: My daughter told me about this shampoo and I tried it. I will say if you want smooth hair try it. It has done wonders for me. The price is very good. Nice big bottle. And smells good too.

product_name: Suave Keratin Infusion Smoothing Shampoo
product_review: The keratin works well at smoothing and detangling my hair. Smells refreshing and uplifting. Nice size and convenient pump. The product is very affordable.

product_name: Suave Keratin Infusion Smoothing Shampoo
product_review: I love Suave products I have discovered many products they have that are really wonderful the Suave keratin infusion shampoo is great it smells really good and I love the results I get from using this my hair is softer shiner healthy looking and more manageable this shampoo has quenchlock for hydrated healthy hair the keratin helps seal the cuticle and provides lasting smoothness the quenchlock works by delivering lightweight micro moisturizing particles that lock in hydration to help make hair stronger to reduce breakage and leaves hair smoother and more healthy looking and provides frizz control for up to 48 hours how great is that I love the big pump bottle makes it easier to come out this is Peta cruelty free which is a plus this is very affordable and worth the money I am very satisfied with the results I got

product_name: Suave Keratin Infusion Smoothing Shampoo
product_review: Love it! Was skeptical at first but it won me over. Smells amazing. Price is good. Effective. The scent lasts on my hair. Leaves my hair soft. It’s an overall great shampoo.

product_name: Suave Keratin Infusion Smoothing Shampoo
product_review: Great shampoo. Smells super good. Also love the hand pump, makes it so easy just to pump and wash my hair! I recommend this to family and friends!!

product_name: Suave Keratin Infusion Smoothing Shampoo
product_review: This shampoo was rich and creamy and felt nice to apply. It lathered well. It was a little heavy for my fine the hair and left it weighed down so I had to wash more frequently. It’s nice though if you wash daily.

product_name: Suave Keratin Infusion Smoothing Shampoo
product_review: This shampoo has been my go-to for a couple of years now. The smell is very subtle, packaging makes it easy to find, and it leaves my hair feeling so soft without paying a lot of money!

product_name: Suave Keratin Infusion Smoothing Shampoo
product_review: This product helps keep my hair clean, smooth and very managable. This is a great product. I have since bought this product several more times..

product_name: Suave Keratin Infusion Smoothing Shampoo
product_review: Nice effective good value shampoo. Good size bottle. Helps make hair look nice and shiny. Smoothing and helps with frizz. Good for strengthong and color cate

product_name: Suave Keratin Infusion Smoothing Shampoo
product_review: For reference I have wavy to curly hair that is thin and prone to frizz and I live in a humid climate. The conditioner of this is soo good! I struggle with shampoos because after a while most tend to weigh heavy on my hair, making it a greasy, floppy mess. This isn't heavy at all and tames the frizz so that it's not so crazy. And it isn't super expensive!

product_name: Suave Keratin Infusion Smoothing Shampoo
product_review: I thought the scent was okay. As far as effectiveness it wasn't the worst. Not the best at washing products out of your hair such as hairspray and styling gel but it worked on my hair without any product. As far as ingredients go I love shampoos with keratin and it was a pretty good price for you what you get.

product_name: Suave Keratin Infusion Smoothing Shampoo
product_review: Hasta el momento ha sido uno de los productos que mejor le ha caído a mi cabello, lo deja sedoso con un aroma rico, y brillante, además que es de fácil acceso ya que el precio es bastante bajo..!!

product_name: Suave Keratin Infusion Smoothing Shampoo
product_review: The conditioner does a better job. I use the conditioner and shampoo for this brand. The shampoo is ok, nothing special. I like the scent and the simple packaging. It does help clean my hair. It’s ok, nothing amazing. The conditioner is a different story. I love the conditioner for this brand.

product_name: Suave Keratin Infusion Smoothing Shampoo
product_review: Great shampoo. I like how well this cleans my hair without stripping it completely. It also seems to not weigh it down overly and it smells nice too

product_name: Suave Keratin Infusion Smoothing Shampoo
product_review: The Suave Keratin Infusion Shampoo /conditioner combo is at an affordable for the price of 2. This shampoo and conditioner super amazing. The shampoo lathes nice snd guck. And deep washes your hair leaving it softer, silkier, shiny, cleaner and healthier hair. The conditioner feels like a luscious kind of hair that not only restores, replenishes, deeply moisturizes the hair from the inside & out. I love the smell. The scent lingers in HHe hsir for days. Although Suave is a cheap brand I like it because it is economical and a shampoo & conditioner that not only deliver. But smells super fabulous. I recommend the Suave silk Protein Infusion for sleeker, smoother and sexier hair without the knots.

product_name: Suave Keratin Infusion Smoothing Shampoo
product_review: I have been using this for a while now and this shampoo and conditioner set i love love loveeee it leave my scalp moisturized and not dehydrated and the smell of this is very pleasing to me I also love the color of the packaging the pretty pinky peachy is really. Aesthetic

product_name: Suave Keratin Infusion Smoothing Shampoo
product_review: After years of using higher end products and still ending up with significantly dirty hair, I went back to ol’ reliable from when I was growing up. This product has been a breath of fresh air in the shampoo game, and I’m glad I found something that not only works but is super affordable!

product_name: Suave Keratin Infusion Smoothing Shampoo
product_review: Best shampoo ever for a healthy, silky, shinny and soft hair. Get more easy to comb, the scent stay on very long on your hair. The price is very good also.

product_name: Suave Keratin Infusion Smoothing Shampoo
product_review: It works wonders on frizzy unmanageable hair. Makes it look healthy and shiny and not frizzy. Doesn't leave hair dull and limp or oily looking. Great product

product_name: Suave Keratin Infusion Smoothing Shampoo
product_review: This works great for me. I have very long thing hair that goes down to my butt and this makes my hair look so shiny and smooth. It hydrates my hair and I have not seen an imperfections with this product. I do recommend this.

product_name: Suave Keratin Infusion Smoothing Shampoo
product_review: It is a great shampoo but it may dry your hair out. It’s good for its price and smells good and overall is an amazing shampoo considering its price.

product_name: Suave Keratin Infusion Smoothing Shampoo
product_review: I use this and the conditioner often and then have a great scent and smooth my hair so much! My hair is very thick and gets frizzy and these seems to help!

product_name: Suave Keratin Infusion Smoothing Shampoo
product_review: This is the shampoo my mother uses and loves. It’s easily accessible and is cheap! But you get great quality for such an affordable price tag. This is supposed to improve your hair within the first wash or two: it leaves behind a much softer and silkier hair. It helps minimize frizz and living in the south that is a necessity lol the scent is good and clean/fresh. It doesn’t leave to feminine or masculine it’s a good unisex product. It doesn’t leave my hair oily or greasy or gross at all which is great! I battle with finding a good one that is great for frizz and yet still doesn’t leave the hair too oily or greasy after drying (especially if I don’t want to blow dry it)… this one is it though for a good price. I would definitely recommend to others on a budget looking for good shampoo!

product_name: Suave Keratin Infusion Smoothing Shampoo
product_review: For a shampoo under $10 this is good. Makes your hair super soft and smells good. I love the conditioneras well. Will definitely buy again in the future

product_name: Suave Keratin Infusion Smoothing Shampoo
product_review: I am always on the hunt for affordable, yet effective hair care. I have very thick, wavy hair which is also very dry and tends to break easily. Somebody recommended Suave Keratin Infusion shampoo to me, so I tried it. It smells good, not clinical like some shampoos can. It doesnt lather as much as I like my shampoo to, but after washing my hair my scalp feels fresh and clean, not heavy. My hair feels silky and healthy. But after a day, it feels dry again. I think for thinner hair types itd be great, it just doesnt work exceptionally well with mine.

product_name: Suave Keratin Infusion Smoothing Shampoo
product_review: I use this and the the smoothing conditioner. It really helps with keeping my crazy hairs tamed. If I use heat styling I have no problems with my hair going crazy for a few days. But if I let it dry naturally I only have 2 days of smooth calm hair. It's a great product to use without breaking the bank.

product_name: Suave Keratin Infusion Smoothing Shampoo
product_review: This shampoo is my holy grail. It keeps my hair looking so shiny and healthy, volumous and smells devine by the time you’re done out of the shower! 12/10 recommend especially for anyone with psoriasis or sensitive scalps. It’s gentle and leaves your head feeling refreshed.

product_name: Suave Keratin Infusion Smoothing Shampoo
product_review: I use the keratin shampoo and conditioner. It is great for keep the frizzies from taking over in the Louisiana humidity. I also use the Moroccan oil version of this shampoo and conditioner. I would definitely recommend both!

product_name: Suave Keratin Infusion Smoothing Shampoo
product_review: I have tried this product and it was definitely amazing and it made my hair silky and Smoove I will use this product anytime of day over and over again

product_name: Suave Keratin Infusion Smoothing Shampoo
product_review: Absolutely do not purchase. This is terrible for your hair and your hair ends up being a grease ball in 5 seconds flat. I would definitely spend the money and get something better

product_name: Suave Keratin Infusion Smoothing Shampoo
product_review: This shampoo helps my hair stay strong and soft. My hair is shiny. I have less shedding and breakage. It doesn't strip my color. Great Shampoo!!!

product_name: Suave Keratin Infusion Smoothing Shampoo
product_review: This shampoo and conditioner combo leaves my hair silky and smooth. It also smells very good! I usually leave a little conditioner in after rinsing to help with detangling.

product_name: Suave Keratin Infusion Smoothing Shampoo
product_review: I have coarse and dry hair. This really changed things up! My hair is smoother and softer and easier to style. Would definitely recommend. It a much cheaper price point.

product_name: Suave Keratin Infusion Smoothing Shampoo
product_review: I really like this shampoo. It made my hair so soft and shiny, and it smells amazing. It doesn’t have a heavy perfume scent and it’s not a strong scent at all. The best part is that it isn’t expensive like the salon brands.

product_name: Suave Keratin Infusion Smoothing Shampoo
product_review: I have used this product For many Yeras I like How it my hair looks after Applying. I like th hat they have different styles For the hair problems that you might have they also offer you different smells that do last on your hair not as much but you can smell it.

product_name: Suave Keratin Infusion Smoothing Shampoo
product_review: Used this product for a long time! It works great and leaves your hair smooth and shiney! And on top of that it smells amazing

product_name: Suave Keratin Infusion Smoothing Shampoo
product_review: I really enjoy this product the honey infused makes your hair smell so good and soft I would definitely recommend this to people

product_name: Suave Keratin Infusion Smoothing Shampoo
product_review: I like the price and you get the same benefits of a high priced shampoo without breaking the bank. Easy on the hair. My first pick

product_name: Suave Keratin Infusion Smoothing Shampoo
product_review: I like the smell of this shampoo. Also, it rinses out clean, without tangles. I will continue buying this product. I know that having keratin in it helps my hair get and stay healthy.

product_name: Suave Keratin Infusion Smoothing Shampoo
product_review: I absolutely love this shampoo because it smells amazing and it makes my hair feel so clean and it makes it so soft.....

product_name: Suave Keratin Infusion Smoothing Shampoo
product_review: I really like this line from sauve, especially because it is so budget friendly. Leaves my hair soft, manageable and smells luxurious.

product_name: Suave Keratin Infusion Smoothing Shampoo
product_review: I was hesitantly looking at it in the store. I didn't want to chance buying a cheap product out of fear that it would damage my hair/skin BUT I got it anyway and I am honestly impressed!!!

product_name: Ogx Beauty Biotin & Collagen Shampoo
product_review: Love the way this made my hair feel! I have super fine hair and that product made it feel so healthy! Such a great product and a great price point! Totally recommend

product_name: Ogx Beauty Biotin & Collagen Shampoo
product_review: Der Duft ist erinnert einen an Urlaub.. Kokosnüsse. Zur Verpackung, eine super große Flasche. Mit praktischem Öffner. Preis-Leistung ist total okay mit 6,95€. Zum Haarwachstum kann nichts sagen. Aber es macht schöne Haare Ich mag es.

product_name: Ogx Beauty Biotin & Collagen Shampoo
product_review: I love this shampoo, I think it’s really good for giving hair a bit more volume and definition, however I do prefer the argon oil of Morocco shampoo, just because it makes my hair shinier

product_name: Ogx Beauty Biotin & Collagen Shampoo
product_review: Makes my hair fill fuller and thicker. It also makes it have a nice shine. I've been using this for a few weeks and definitely makes my hair look and feel better

product_name: Ogx Beauty Biotin & Collagen Shampoo
product_review: After trying MANY hair products ogx was the best value for money and actually does what it says on the bottle. My hair feels so much stronger and better condition. Smells lovely nice bright packaging.

product_name: Ogx Beauty Biotin & Collagen Shampoo
product_review: Fragrant shampoo, makes hair soft and smooth, big bottle, super economical to use. With collagen to help hair grow more and create volume for hair

product_name: Ogx Beauty Biotin & Collagen Shampoo
product_review: This shampoo is like a protein shake for your hair. After a few uses, my hair felt thicker and stronger—like it hit the gym. The scent is sweet and refreshing, Don’t expect a full mane if you’re starting from a buzz cut, but if you’re looking for some extra volume and strength, this shampoo's got your back. Solid addition to the grooming routine!

product_name: Ogx Beauty Biotin & Collagen Shampoo
product_review: This shampoo is amazing. The smell is so delightful it makes my hair feel super soft and strong. The size of the bottle will last for a while since you only need a dime size amount. ￼

product_name: Ogx Beauty Biotin & Collagen Shampoo
product_review: This shampoo works really good and I have noticed that my hair is stronger and I’m not having as much breakage. This shampoo is easy to use and leaves my hair feeling clean

product_name: Ogx Beauty Biotin & Collagen Shampoo
product_review: Das Shampoo und die Spülung dieser Reihe sind einfach unglaublich! Die Haare werden wunderbar weich nach der Dusche und lassen sich leicht kämmen.

product_name: Ogx Beauty Biotin & Collagen Shampoo
product_review: My teen daughter is a regular user of this shampoo. She has wavy hair that is to her lower back for length. I feel this shampoo does help keep her hair strong and it has a wonderful scent. We get the 40 fl. Oz. bottles through Sam's Club so it lasts quite a while.

product_name: Ogx Beauty Biotin & Collagen Shampoo
product_review: This shampoo smells very good and leave my hair healthy and clean. I had severe hair lost due to pregnancy and after using this shampoo, my hair is stronger. Very reasonable price and super cute bottle.

product_name: Ogx Beauty Biotin & Collagen Shampoo
product_review: Love OGX, makes my hair super shiny and healthy looking! It also smells really good. I highly recommend it for everyday use. The purple packaging is also really pretty.

product_name: Ogx Beauty Biotin & Collagen Shampoo
product_review: I love the scent of this shampoo !!!This really help thicken my hair ! I used it daily and it didn't even dry my hair out . Best of all it's sulfate free !!!

product_name: Ogx Beauty Biotin & Collagen Shampoo
product_review: If you are looking for an inexpensive shampoo, this is exactly what you need. Good ingredients, pleasant smell, very good packaging and an incredible result.

product_name: Ogx Beauty Biotin & Collagen Shampoo
product_review: Great shampoo ever, one of my favorite! Smells absolutely amazing! Keeps your hair shine and glowy! Effectiveness is so high as it contains biotin and collagen! Highly recommend it!

product_name: Ogx Beauty Biotin & Collagen Shampoo
product_review: Shampoo für Menschen, die ihre Haare pflegen! Die Zusammensetzung ist mit Salonkosmetik vergleichbar. Pflegt das Haar gut und macht es dicker und voluminöser

product_name: Ogx Beauty Biotin & Collagen Shampoo
product_review: Mit Abstand eins der besten Shampoos die ich je getestet habe und das waren sehr viele :) Einfach ein seidig glänzendes Haar Gefühl. Die Haare sehen einfach rundum super aus und fühlen sich sehr gut an.

product_name: Ogx Beauty Biotin & Collagen Shampoo
product_review: Amazing product use with the conditioner. Smells absolutely amazing and it lasts too which I love. Sleek beautiful packaging and I have no problem with the product leaking. Lathers really well in the hair. I’m really impressed with this product. I can’t get over how beautiful it smells. Will continue to buy this, it’s also amazing for people with hair extensions as it’s sulfate free

product_name: Ogx Beauty Biotin & Collagen Shampoo
product_review: Love this shampoo, I buy it at BJs for a great price. It’s effective and my hair feels so healthy after using it. I just wish the bottle was modified a little to where we can use all the product.

product_name: Ogx Beauty Biotin & Collagen Shampoo
product_review: OGX Beauty Biotin and Collagen Shampoo is a hair care product formulated to strengthen and volumize hair. It typically contains biotin, a B vitamin known for promoting hair growth and health, and collagen, which helps improve hair's elasticity and thickness. This shampoo is designed to nourish and fortify hair strands, leaving them looking fuller and healthier. My hair is so smooth and firm when using it. Highly recommend!

product_name: Ogx Beauty Biotin & Collagen Shampoo
product_review: Das Shampoo Biotin&Collagen schäumt gut und ist sehr ergiebig, so dass man nur eine kleine Menge benötigt um das ausreichend einzuschäumen.😉 Die Haare fühlen sich nach der Anwendung weich an und sehen sofort voller aus, fallen nicht mehr platt herunter. 🥰Dies hält auch den Tag über an.🥰 Das Flaschendesign finde ich schon mal richtig toll ansprechend.😊Ich kann dieses Shampoo weiterempfehlen

product_name: Ogx Beauty Biotin & Collagen Shampoo
product_review: Das Shampoo lässt sich sehr sparsam verwenden. Es schäumt gut auf, die Haare werden gut gereinigt. Beim Ausspülen des Shampoos fühlen sich die Haare viel griffiger und fester an. In Kombination mit dem Conditioner wirken die Haare gepflegt und fülliger. Das Haar hat nach dem Fönen ein tolles Volumen und einen schönen Glanz. Der Duft ist angenehm frisch und fruchtig.

product_name: Ogx Beauty Biotin & Collagen Shampoo
product_review: This shampoo and the corresponding conditioner are my tried and true products. I’ll often mix it up and use a different product every once in a while, but I always come back to this product. It keeps my hair feeling soft and strong and never builds up on my hair. I hope they never change this formula!

product_name: Ogx Beauty Biotin & Collagen Shampoo
product_review: He usado tanto el shampo cómo el acondicionador , realmente son productos espectaculares para el cabello y la caída sobre todo ya q contienen biotina

product_name: Ogx Beauty Biotin & Collagen Shampoo
product_review: OGX Biotin & Collagen Extra Strength Volumizing Shampoo is a popular choice for those seeking thicker, fuller hair. Enriched with biotin, collagen, and hydrolyzed wheat protein, this shampoo helps to strengthen and fortify each strand, promoting healthy hair growth and increased volume. The extra strength formula provides a boost of hydration, leaving hair feeling soft, smooth, and more manageable. With regular use, this shampoo can help improve the overall thickness and density of the hair, giving you the appearance of fuller, more voluminous locks. Plus, its luxurious scent leaves hair smelling fresh and rejuvenated. For those looking to enhance their hair's volume and thickness, OGX Biotin & Collagen Extra Strength Volumizing Shampoo is a great choice.

product_name: Ogx Beauty Biotin & Collagen Shampoo
product_review: After 2 kids, my previously very thick hair has thinned out horribly. I’ve tried several things but I do think this shampoo and conditioner is making a difference. It’s not huge and I haven’t noticed new growth, but the hair I have does feel and look thicker after washing. The smell is good, too. However, it’s difficult to get the last of the product out of the bottle.

product_name: Ogx Beauty Biotin & Collagen Shampoo
product_review: I tried this shampoo to target my fine hair and it was pretty good for the price. The scent is nice unlike some other biotin shampoos and lathers well

product_name: Ogx Beauty Biotin & Collagen Shampoo
product_review: OGX Biotin and Collagen Shampoo is thick and lovely. It smells super nice, and has a thick rich lather that makes you confident that it is doing its job. An added bonus is extra volume in your hair

product_name: Ogx Beauty Biotin & Collagen Shampoo
product_review: I have been using both the ogx thick and full + biotin & collagen shampoo & conditioner. And I am absolutely happy to finally get rid of this combo. It made my hair worse than better. It leaves it feeling thin and unclean. I washed my hair the day before the photos, and it was already oily and flat. I saw no growth or thickness. In the month I used it for. I picked up the bottles for $6 each at Walmart. Scent was not bad, like coco butter.

product_name: Ogx Beauty Biotin & Collagen Shampoo
product_review: I used this for a while hoping it would help my hair grow. I found out later that ingredients in it are not good for your hair. The scent wasn’t bad and for the price it’s not awful however if your wanting to grow your hair I would find a cleaner brand

product_name: Ogx Beauty Biotin & Collagen Shampoo
product_review: Good quality for a cheaper, drug store shampoo. It helped volumize my fine hair and kept it oil-free for 4-5 days! Normally I’d need to wash my hair every 2-3 days. The scent is very pleasant as well.

product_name: Ogx Beauty Biotin & Collagen Shampoo
product_review: Smells divine and I feel like it does a thorough job with washing my long hair. That said don't know if it does really help with thickening the hair as I haven't seen much difference and if I did it could be due to various factors. It is lovely though.

product_name: Ogx Beauty Biotin & Collagen Shampoo
product_review: This is how my hair turned out after I used this on my curly hair. I really like it because I have noticed a change in softness in my hair. It smells like very good. I also like the purple color it just adds a bit of fun to the hair washing process.

product_name: Ogx Beauty Biotin & Collagen Shampoo
product_review: I haven’t used this shampoo since college and recently my partner bought it and I was reminded why I liked it so much! It smells SO good! every time I play with my hair the scent is released again. It also makes my hair pretty soft after use as well.

product_name: Ogx Beauty Biotin & Collagen Shampoo
product_review: My hair is 2b oily low porosity. It takes a special.shampoo otherwisemy hair is limp and oily.or.over dried. This one works for me.pretty well.

product_name: Ogx Beauty Biotin & Collagen Shampoo
product_review: This shampoo has healed my damaged hair. It smells great too! It’s has an interesting texture, almost like jelly, which is nice because I don’t accidentally drop it and waste product. It’s super affordable as well.

product_name: Ogx Beauty Biotin & Collagen Shampoo
product_review: The scent is amazing and takes you straight to tropics. The packaging looks and feels premium when held. The texture is of a perfect thickness, so that you can dispense the smallest amount required easily, and don’t waste the product. I am not convinced it is a super effective product, but definitely one very pleasant to use.

product_name: Ogx Beauty Biotin & Collagen Shampoo
product_review: I bought this shampoo to give a bit of volume and thickness to my limp fine hair. It was underwhelming! It did not give me volume nor any feel of thickness, plus my hiar falls out a lot when using this.

product_name: Ogx Beauty Biotin & Collagen Shampoo
product_review: This shampoo is awful. It has a nice scent but this shampoo gave me frizz and overall dried my hair. Mind you I have Long hair and my ends need to have hydration. I do not recommend this shampoo at all if you have long hair and want a hydrating shampoo. It unfortunately dried out my hair and this one was not a good shampoo at all. EDIT: DMDM was the culprit of drying out and leading to fallout of hair for many many years ago.

product_name: Ogx Beauty Biotin & Collagen Shampoo
product_review: I love this shampoo its smells amazing and the packaging is so pretty 👍🏻 Its keep my hair shiny and smells nice for long time Highly recommended this one

product_name: Ogx Beauty Biotin & Collagen Shampoo
product_review: Hair felt bouncier from first wash Scent is lovely Packaging is nice Colour of shampoo is a lilac Only need a small amount Lathers up quickly Nice

product_name: Ogx Beauty Biotin & Collagen Shampoo
product_review: No thank you! I do NOT recommend. I shed a lot of hair when I shower naturally, this shampoo more than doubled the amount of shedding I had. It also did pretty much nothing for the state of my hair. The price seems nice, but the outcome is not worth it.

product_name: Ogx Beauty Biotin & Collagen Shampoo
product_review: I recently purchased this after figuring out if this was still causing people’s hair to fall out. I have thin hair that comes out due to medication and I wanted to see if this would help being the fact that it has biotin in it. I like it so far haven’t noticed too much of a change but it does get your hair clean and it smells nice.

product_name: Ogx Beauty Biotin & Collagen Shampoo

product_review: Actually, I have not even used this yet, as I still had some left in my previous bottle, but I have been using TRESemme Volumizing Shampoo and Conditioner for many years now and I know the brand. FIVE STARS*****

product_review: La calidad y efectividad de los productos para el cabello varían dependiendo de factores como la composición, la marca y las necesidades individuales del cabello. Los productos de calidad suelen contener ingredientes naturales y estar libres de químicos agresivos. Las marcas reputadas suelen someter sus productos a pruebas dermatológicas para garantizar su seguridad y eficacia. Sin embargo, es importante tener en cuenta que lo que funciona para una persona puede no funcionar para otra, por lo que es importante probar diferentes productos y consultar con un profesional si es necesario.

product_review: TRESemmé 24 Hour Body Volume Shampoo is a game-changer for anyone seeking voluminous, bouncy hair that lasts all day. Formulated with a unique blend of ingredients, including collagen and silk proteins, this shampoo effectively cleanses and revitalizes hair while providing long-lasting volume and body. With regular use, it helps to boost hair's natural volume and thickness, leaving it looking fuller and more vibrant. Plus, its lightweight formula doesn't weigh hair down, ensuring a natural and airy finish. Say goodbye to flat, lifeless locks and hello to hair that's full of body and bounce, 24 hours a day, with TRESemmé 24 Hour Body Volume Shampoo.

product_review: The smell of this is sooooo nice. Not only does it smell good but it leaves my hair frizz free and shiny. The texture is like a thicker conditioner and for the price point? You cant beat that.

product_name: Garnier Smoothing Treat 1 Minute Hair Mask + Avocado Extract
product_review: Absolutely loved this product! Originally got it with Influenster as a part of campaign but have rebought in store a few times. Very affordable and you get a good bang for your buck! How long it lasts really just depends on how often you wash your hair. It’s not something I use every wash, so one small container lasted for a good while. It has a sweet smell that’s subtle, not overpowering and stays with your hair all day post wash! It was a little hydrating and helped with frizz for a few days.

product_name: Garnier Smoothing Treat 1 Minute Hair Mask + Avocado Extract
product_review: First of all the smell is amazing, and thats big for me because usually things that are good for u smell terrible but this leaves a nice core smell, also very sweet, not too expensive, and the texture is a creamy kind of texture like conditioner type, it comes in a small jar and it even fit in your travel bag, and as far as resultssss baby this is great for right after u take out your braids or right before u wanna straighten it, i definitely recommend to the curly hair girliesss

product_name: Garnier Smoothing Treat 1 Minute Hair Mask + Avocado Extract
product_review: First of all this smells so good, like avocado. It made my hair smooth after using it and leaving clean. I have really curly coarse hair and it made my hair feel clean.

product_name: Garnier Smoothing Treat 1 Minute Hair Mask + Avocado Extract

product_name: Garnier Smoothing Treat 1 Minute Hair Mask + Avocado Extract

No complaints.

product_name: Garnier Smoothing Treat 1 Minute Hair Mask + Avocado Extract
product_review: Let me share my experience with Garnier Smoothing Treat 1 Minute Hair Mask + Avocado Extract—it's a hair care treat that leaves my hair feeling nourished and silky smooth! Firstly, this hair mask is a lifesaver for achieving smooth and manageable hair in just one minute. Infused with avocado extract, it deeply moisturizes and nourishes my hair, leaving it feeling soft, silky, and revitalized. And let me tell you, the scent is amazing! It's fresh and invigorating, adding a touch of luxury to my hair care routine. The best part? It's quick and easy to use. I simply apply it after shampooing, leave it on for a minute, and rinse it out—no need to wait around with a mask on for ages! Overall, Garnier Smoothing Treat 1 Minute Hair Mask + Avocado Extract is a must-have for anyone looking to nourish and smooth their hair. Its nourishing formula, combined with the benefits of avocado extract, make it a staple in my hair care routine. Trust me, once you try it, you'll love the way it leaves your hair feeling soft, silky, and beautifully nourished!

product_name: Garnier Smoothing Treat 1 Minute Hair Mask + Avocado Extract
product_review: Garnier hair masks are awesome! They are inexpensive and are on sale often. I have tried a couple different ones. This one leaves your hair smooth and shiny. It is easy to apply, and I like that you only need to leave it in for a minute.

product_name: Garnier Smoothing Treat 1 Minute Hair Mask + Avocado Extract
product_review: I opened the tub at the shop and instantly fell I love with the smell so I just had to buy it. I did leave it in my hair for just over 5 minutes and oh my god my hair was so soft and smooth (left to dry naturally) I was very impressed given as my hair is quite dry normally. I did my my product on offer at £5.50 so I'm unsure what the going price is for it.

product_name: Garnier Smoothing Treat 1 Minute Hair Mask + Avocado Extract
product_review: I love everything about about this mask. The scent is pleasant without being overpowering, the product is thick and creamy, and my hair looks so healthy since I started including it into my hair care routine.
