product_name: Garnier Smoothing Treat 1 Minute Hair Mask + Avocado Extract
product_review: Obsessed! This smells so good and makes your hair so soft and healthy! The large tub lasts so long! I have long, wavy dry hair and this was so helpful with maintaining moisture and healthy waves!

product_name: Garnier Smoothing Treat 1 Minute Hair Mask + Avocado Extract
product_review: Als langjähriger Fan von Garnier-Produkten war ich gespannt, die Garnier Hair Smoothing 1 Minute Hair Mask mit Avocado-Extrakt auszuprobieren - und ich wurde nicht enttäuscht! Diese Haarmaske ist absolut erstaunlich. In nur einer Minute verwandelt sie trockenes, krauses Haar in unglaublich geschmeidige Locken.Der Avocado-Extrakt ist ein wahrer Geniestreich. Er spendet Feuchtigkeit, ohne das Haar zu beschweren, und hinterlässt einen erfrischenden Duft, der den ganzen Tag anhält. Ich liebe auch die Vielseitigkeit dieser Maske - man kann sie als Conditioner oder als intensive Kur verwenden, je nach Bedarf.Seitdem ich diese Haarmaske benutze, habe ich bemerkt, dass meine Locken viel weniger Frizz haben und viel leichter zu stylen sind. Sie sind jetzt viel weicher und glänzender, und ich erhalte regelmäßig Komplimente für mein Haar!Insgesamt kann ich die Garnier Hair Smoothing 1 Minute Hair Mask mit Avocado-Extrakt nur wärmstens empfehlen. Wenn Sie nach einer schnellen und effektiven Lösung für geschmeidigeres Haar suchen, ist dies definitiv das Produkt für Sie!

product_name: Shimmer Lights Purple Shampoo for Blonde & Silver Hair
product_review: I have platinum blond and use this once a week to keep my color icy. I use it first, before my regular shampoo. You definitely need to condition after as it can feel a bit stripping.

product_name: Shimmer Lights Purple Shampoo for Blonde & Silver Hair
product_review: This shampoo/conditioner combo will really brighten up your hair, HOWEVER - it does dry it out a LOT so make sure you use hair masks. I would recommend using this only once a week.

product_name: Shimmer Lights Purple Shampoo for Blonde & Silver Hair
product_review: this stuff works AMAZING!! the color of the shampoo is the same color as the bottle! it keeps my bleached hair platinum, smelling good, and silky😍

product_name: Shimmer Lights Purple Shampoo for Blonde & Silver Hair
product_review: Product works so well! 😍 I love it and the smell is amazing not like other shampoos that have a sharpie like smell. The packaging is amazing and honestly it is so worth the price. After one use I already see the results. I used the Ion purple shampoo and i switched back to this one.

product_name: Shimmer Lights Purple Shampoo for Blonde & Silver Hair
product_review: Must have for stylists. Great for toning 613 hair. Very cost effective and durable packaging. Definitely a staple product in my hair salon and at home.

product_name: Shimmer Lights Purple Shampoo for Blonde & Silver Hair
product_review: I’ve been bleaching my hair for a couple years and i naturally have dark hair so it always has the brassy yellow color and this knocks most the color out! Very effective amazing product! I love this and always recommend

product_name: Shimmer Lights Purple Shampoo for Blonde & Silver Hair
product_review: Worked great for taking down the brassiness in my hair! The person who dyed my hair highly recommended this brand to keep it toned the way I wanted , and for the price i would say it was more than worth it.

product_name: Shimmer Lights Purple Shampoo for Blonde & Silver Hair
product_review: This has always been the top favorites because it’s more on the affordable working side but also helps but not as much as other purple shampoos I like it though

product_name: Shimmer Lights Purple Shampoo for Blonde & Silver Hair
product_review: I got this for my aunt when she visited me for a week. She is blonde and needs this miracle shampoo to keep her hair moisturised, smooth and visible appealing. That’s her favorite kind!

product_name: Shimmer Lights Purple Shampoo for Blonde & Silver Hair
product_review: Este producto logra eliminar a la perfeccion todos los tonos amarillos de mi cabello para.asi lograr un perfecto tono de blanco, lo cual es muy importante porque pinto mi cabello de colores pasteles.

product_name: Shimmer Lights Purple Shampoo for Blonde & Silver Hair
product_review: This is probably one of the most effective (and well-known) purple shampoos on the market. It works extremely well in removing brassiness. However, you shouldn't use it more than once a week as it can cause dryness. Always follow with a deep conditioner as well. Also note that if you have very light (i.e., level 9 or 10 hair) and you use this frequently it may tint your hair more silvery which is cool if that's what you like!

product_name: Shimmer Lights Purple Shampoo for Blonde & Silver Hair
product_review: Had to get the mini size one for travel as well, because this product is amazing, it those it’s job to clean the scalp as makes your hair look and feel moisturizer

product_name: Shimmer Lights Purple Shampoo for Blonde & Silver Hair
product_review: 1. BACKGROUND: I used this product from 2016 (summer) to 2018 (fall). My hair is very dark, as I am half Korean, to take me fully blonde it took 2 sessions a week apart (8-12 hrs each) this was done to do as little damage to my hair as possible. (Any unevenness in tone from hair under my ear/base of skull is due to previous bleaching for underlights and color). VIDEO is from 1st session (lost video from second session-red tones are from previous sessions of green/purple/red underlights so it was impossible to go as light as others my go/wish to without EXTREME permanent damage and immediate breakage). 2. REVIEW: This product is very damaging to your hair, my friend has been bleaching her hair for over 12 years, there are much better products. Many people also use this as they believe purple shampoo “kills yellow tones” it helps with orange and BRASSINESS. Use BLUE shampoo if you want to keep more silver/ remove more “yellow tones”. It is cheap, and in images you can see I bleached very light, shimmer lights did kill some brassiness but it did not help as much as blue shampoo would have (it is mis-marketed). Also, after speaking to multiple professional HMUA’s, this is one of the most damaging purple shampoo’s you can purchase. It did more damage overtime and looking back I would have preferred to not use it at all, or use it less than the bottle & brand recommends. My sister has bleached her hair in 2013/14 (underlights and some highlights bordering on an ombré) and a full ombré in 2020 that she occasionally grows out partially then bleaches higher without touching the top which is why the bottle image is small as the bottle is dirty). It has also damaged her hair which is much thicker/denser and darker than mine (she has more curl/Native American recessive genes/and Korean than I do from our mom & great-grandmother-paternal). Regardless we have both suffered more damage from this product and would have used a higher quality, less damaging blue shampoo instead. 3. EDIT: as you can see from my roots in at least 2 images, my hair was a very cool dark brown, commonly mistaken as black (it is not black- my mothers hair is black. In my current profile image I have a lot of red lights that I put some purple dye on- in my profile picture all the bleached hair has been grown out and cut. 4. OTHER INFORMATION: -my hair is lighter from both age & once you bleach the skull your hair will never be as dark as it once was/ the same goes for natural blondes or lighter brunettes if you add darker color to the roots- this is just some extra information I wish I had known at a younger age in case anyone has children/ is looking at products before dying their hair).

product_name: Shimmer Lights Purple Shampoo for Blonde & Silver Hair
product_review: I did not like this shampoo. I do not think it works at all and it does not smell good. My husband hates it when i use it but i dont want it to go to waste so i still use it but i dont see any difference.

product_name: Shimmer Lights Purple Shampoo for Blonde & Silver Hair
product_review: This is a powerful toning shampoo!! I used to use it every wash but it was very drying and causing quite a bit of damage to my hair. Now I just use it every now and then, or just before going out / to an event. I can leave it in for less than 10 minutes and my hair goes icy blonde and even sometimes a bit purple (which I personally really like)

product_name: Shimmer Lights Purple Shampoo for Blonde & Silver Hair
product_review: The purple shampoo really does it’s job, but there is a purple tint to your hair if processed light enough to the point it’s platinum. I know my friend uses it because she likes her hair a light purple color and it works because she is platinum blonde.

product_name: Shimmer Lights Purple Shampoo for Blonde & Silver Hair
product_review: This is my favorite drugstore purple shampoo to use whenever I bleach my hair. It tones the brassiness out of my hair without fail. It is not damaging, smells nice, and lathers beautifully.

product_name: Shimmer Lights Purple Shampoo for Blonde & Silver Hair
product_review: This is great for toning your blonde. I will admit it was a bit drying, but worked great to tone the brassiness when I was blonde.

product_name: Shimmer Lights Purple Shampoo for Blonde & Silver Hair
product_review: This is an excellent product to use if you are experiencing brassy or yellow tones to your blonde hair. I use this as a shampoo a few times a week and I also use it on dry hair as a mask. It works perfectly!

product_name: Shimmer Lights Purple Shampoo for Blonde & Silver Hair
product_review: This is the most affordable purple shampoo out there that actually works well. It’s definitely scented but I like the scent.

product_name: Shimmer Lights Purple Shampoo for Blonde & Silver Hair
product_review: I used this product for a little while because I loved the results it gave me. Little did I know that the entire time I was using it, I was breaking off more hair by the minute. It is so extremely damaging, I switched to the purple shampoo from olaplex!

product_name: Shimmer Lights Purple Shampoo for Blonde & Silver Hair
product_review: Like my title says, this shampoo tones your hair pretty well. HOWEVER, it makes my hair so dry it is crying for moisture. Wouldn’t really recommend unless you’re in a crunch.

product_name: Shimmer Lights Purple Shampoo for Blonde & Silver Hair
product_review: It's unique and best product that I really love and always want to try, then I found it and have it, now I realize this is the best product i ever used. Try it and see the results. Try and get the best you want. I want to try it again.

product_name: Shimmer Lights Purple Shampoo for Blonde & Silver Hair
product_review: This shampoo actually works! It brightens my bleached hair so well I went through the entire bottle. It’s very strong and smells great. I usually use once a week. Highly recommend!

product_name: Shimmer Lights Purple Shampoo for Blonde & Silver Hair
product_review: This was always my go-to purple shampoo as a blonde to remove brassiness and it worked like a charm. I did notice some dryness after having used this but it’s not necessarily for daily use so I never had a problem with that. The scent could definitely use improvement which is why I only gave it 4 stars.

product_name: Shimmer Lights Purple Shampoo for Blonde & Silver Hair
product_review: I really enjoyed using this purple shampoo, with other store bought purple shampoos I feel like they have to sit on to tell a different but this one is the opposite it’s fast working and my hair felt nice after using no dryness or irritation definitely recommend!

product_name: Shimmer Lights Purple Shampoo for Blonde & Silver Hair
product_review: this shampoo definitely gets the brassy tones out of blonde hair. if you can get over the smell it is definitely worth it. it does leave the hair feeling very dry (as with most shampoos) but it is overall a good product

product_name: Shimmer Lights Purple Shampoo for Blonde & Silver Hair
product_review: If you've had an oops and have a little too brassy of hair this is your go to it works great in a few shampoo and doesn't dye your hair

product_name: Shimmer Lights Purple Shampoo for Blonde & Silver Hair
product_review: ’ve purchased many different kinds of hair cleanser/conditioners. I don’t skimp on pricing because you get what you pay for mostly. I’ve been using a name brand for over two years and felt it was time for a change. It was way more costly than this product and I’m shocked at how awesome this product is for the price. They only problem I have now is my hair is so soft a pony tail won’t stay in on day one. This has never been an issue for me.

product_name: Shimmer Lights Purple Shampoo for Blonde & Silver Hair
product_review: I have been using purple shampoo for 12 years now and this is one of the worst ones I have ever tried. It dries out my hair so badly and the purple pigment wasn't strong enough to get rid of the yellow in my hair. I would use a different brand if possible.

product_name: Shimmer Lights Purple Shampoo for Blonde & Silver Hair
product_review: I bought this back when I had silver dye on my hair and it help me with the yellow undertones in my hair. I tried a lot of purple shampoo and found this one worked best for me. My hair is very thin and straight. I found that putting this shampoo before wetting your hair and leaving it for 5-10 minutes (no more than that or your hair will turn purple) will take all of those yellow tones.

product_name: Shimmer Lights Purple Shampoo for Blonde & Silver Hair
product_review: It’s really good to have and a perfect starter if you’re perfecting your blonde. Used after bleaching and while transitioning back to my natural hair. Smaller bottle was good since I use it less frequently now.

product_name: Shimmer Lights Purple Shampoo for Blonde & Silver Hair
product_review: This product has a very pleasant smell. I went from yellow orange to blonde platinum in 2 uses. I leave it in my hair for about 15 minutes while I'm doing my other normal hygiene care and when I'm done I rinse it out and use some good conditioner. I love this stuff.

product_name: Shimmer Lights Purple Shampoo for Blonde & Silver Hair
product_review: I used this when I had blonde in my hair to cancel any orange out because of rust water. It works really well and kept my hair the way I wanted it to be so I definitely recommend.

product_name: Shimmer Lights Purple Shampoo for Blonde & Silver Hair
product_review: Took the brasiness away when I bleached my hair then dyed it blonde. Doesn't leave hair too dry and cleanses well. Lasts a long time so I'd recommend

product_name: Shimmer Lights Purple Shampoo for Blonde & Silver Hair
product_review: Purple shampoo helps my blonde hair shinner and glossy looking. It also helps my hair not look greasy! I rate it 10/10. Perfect for hair!! It keeps my hair looking silky. Best for dry scalp and oily scalp! I am satisfied that it works this good!

product_name: Shimmer Lights Purple Shampoo for Blonde & Silver Hair
product_review: This was horrible. It dried out my hair and did nothing to color correct. I had to cut all my blond hair off and start fresh with my roots because this destroyed my hair. If I go blond again I will not be using this brand.

product_name: Shimmer Lights Purple Shampoo for Blonde & Silver Hair
product_review: This is a classic for blondes. If you have near white/lightest blonde hair this can dye it lavender. I specifically bought this a year ago to make my hair lavender. You leave it on about 15-20 minutes and you will have lavender/some lavender hues for about 1.5 weeks. I also used this later on as a regular toning shampoo for my blonde hair and it works great. I have tried other purple shampoos that I like better. This is very drying and smells like faint musky cat pee smell with shampoo. Those are my reasons for giving it a 4/5. Of course that scent washes out but it's pretty strong when applying. I think Pravana has the best blonde products.

product_name: Shimmer Lights Purple Shampoo for Blonde & Silver Hair
product_review: I really like this shampoo and it works good!! It smells good and it doesn't stain your scalp or bath tub. It's affordable and you get alot for the price.

product_name: Shimmer Lights Purple Shampoo for Blonde & Silver Hair
product_review: This shampoo did not work for me. It is super watery and didn’t help my hair. Gave off a weird smell and made my hair feel not hydrated at all.

product_name: Shimmer Lights Purple Shampoo for Blonde & Silver Hair
product_review: Yes, I know that purple shampoo tends to dry out your hair but this one I feel dries it out the MOST. I can appreciate it doing it’s job and removing enough of the brassiness, but I don’t think it’s worth it. No matter what conditioner I use with this shampoo my hair is extra breakable. I’ve switched since then and have had much better luck.

product_name: Shimmer Lights Purple Shampoo for Blonde & Silver Hair
product_review: Been using this for years and it works every time to remove brassiness from the hair. All you do is shampoo and leave on a few minutes and it's gone.

product_name: Shimmer Lights Purple Shampoo for Blonde & Silver Hair
product_review: This shampoo smells so good! Leaves your hair silky and shiny. No residue left afterwards. Great for dry scalp.

product_name: Shimmer Lights Purple Shampoo for Blonde & Silver Hair
product_review: In the brief moment in time that I had bleached hair, desperately trying to have good-looking blond hair, I used this. It really helped to lift the yellowness out of my hair! I feel like this stuff really worked!

product_name: Shimmer Lights Purple Shampoo for Blonde & Silver Hair
product_review: I purchased this as I highlight my hair and am looking for something to keep it bright and highlights/color looking fresh. I am actually really impressed with this product. My color looks so much better after using but my hair is also super hydrated, soft and silky. After using my husband even asked me if I got my hair done which I did not. I am thinking of just using this full time for my hair as I love it so much. Great product!

product_name: Shimmer Lights Purple Shampoo for Blonde & Silver Hair
product_review: Me encanta este producto porque cuida mi cabello pero sobretodo mi tinte ya que lo he decolorado muchas veces y mi cabello realmente está protegido de resequedad puntas abiertas o quemado . Lo recomiendo al 100% para todas aquellas que necesiten cuidado al rubio.

product_name: Shimmer Lights Purple Shampoo for Blonde & Silver Hair
product_review: I used this product as a toner and it completely turned my hair purple for 2 weeks. That was before cosmetology school. Now I use actual toners. This is good for a at-home use in my opinion

product_name: Shimmer Lights Purple Shampoo for Blonde & Silver Hair
product_review: It does what it says. It definitely tones the hair. But it is very harsh and drying on the hair. I wouldn't recommend it for this reason.

product_name: Shimmer Lights Purple Shampoo for Blonde & Silver Hair
product_review: This shampoo is really good for inbetween hair coulour appointments it takes the brass out of my blonde and makes my hair look a bit lighter inbetween colour appointments.

product_name: Shimmer Lights Purple Shampoo for Blonde & Silver Hair
product_review: This purple shampoo works beautifully for taking out any brassiness from blonde hair. I only used it once a week for upkeep.

product_name: Joico K-PAK Shampoo
product_review: As a type 4 Natural who has experienced hair loss, im always on the lookout for products that can help repair and strengthen my hair. The Joico K-Pak Hair Line is one that has completely transformed my dry brittle hair. I have to say—it’s a game-changer

product_name: Joico K-PAK Shampoo
product_review: The shampoo is a restorative one, but we know, right?, that it is not possible to restore hair from shampoo. So why do I take a restorative shampoo? It's simple, I expect the most gentle cleansing from such shampoos, no squeaking of hair and tangling during washing. I need a shampoo that does not turn my hair into a washcloth (yes, shampoos cannot restore hair, but they can certainly worsen its condition). Did Joico K-PAK shampoo live up to my expectations? Yes, and once again, yes! But let's take everything in order. Appearance. Packaging. I have a 300 ml shampoo, so I'll describe it. It is in a gold-colored plastic bottle (typical of the entire restorative line). Nice design, simple but tasteful, one might say in the spirit of professional products. The lid opens easily and closes firmly. Composition and consistency. You can see the composition in the photo. To be honest, I am not very good at compositions, especially in shampoo compositions. It is worth noting that the shampoo contains useful substances: hydrolyzed keratin, evening primrose oil, kukui seed oil... But how effective are these substances in the shampoo, because it is on the hair for literally a few minutes. Nevertheless, thanks to this composition, you can count on gentle hair cleansing. As for the consistency - the shampoo itself is quite thick, creamy. It has a pearlescent color. I would also like to note a very pleasant aroma, it is light, floral, if you smell it directly from the bottle, it seems a little cloying, sweet, but during use I feel only freshness. I can't say whether the aroma of the shampoo remains on the hair, since after that I also use other care products (masks, balms, leave-in products). In principle, there is nothing special about the shampoo, the manufacturer recommends holding the shampoo on your hair for a minute, I did it and then washed it off right away, well, I can’t say that there are any differences in the end. If you have time, then why not hold it on. The shampoo foams well, the first time it may not give a very rich foam, but I always wash my hair twice and the second time the foam turns out great (although the presence of rich foam is not always a guarantee of high-quality cleansing, I have had such shampoos). I apply the shampoo only to the roots, there I whip up the foam (massage) and then rinse it off, that is, the length is washed with just the flowing foam. For me, this method of application is the best, but even if you wash your hair completely with shampoo (I did this a couple of times), the shampoo does nothing bad to your hair, it’s just a matter of habit. I have oily scalp, I wash my hair about once every 2-3 days, the shampoo copes well with pollution, and with this shampoo you don't have to wash your hair more often (this happens with restorative shampoos). As for cleansing, everything is great here) the shampoo gently cleanses the hair, even with quite intensive massage of the roots, the hair does not get tangled, when washing off the shampoo, it seems to smooth out. For me, it is very important that the hair does not get tangled, since then I have to comb it when wet, otherwise I simply will not comb it when dry. Here, I can calmly leave my hair alone after washing and comb it when it is dry. the price is high but it's worth it.

product_name: Joico K-PAK Shampoo
product_review: Been on the hunt for a new shampoo will make my hair soft and healthy and hit the jackpot with this one! Lathers super well, love the scent and my hair feels like it’s getting stronger, easier to brush through and is shiny and healthy. I use the conditioner as well and just love how my hair has responded to it. The scent is great too and not overpowering.

product_name: Joico K-PAK Shampoo
product_review: I love smell of this. Leaves hair very shiny. I have a hairstylist friend who immediately knew this was used in my hair from seeing it in person after getting my hair done. The product is on the bigger side but lasts awhile.

product_name: Joico K-PAK Shampoo
product_review: I have to say I really had high hopes for this! When used, it lathers well but once rinsed, I feel like I need to shampoo again 2 more times. Afterwards my hair is very flat after blow drying with this product.

product_name: Joico K-PAK Shampoo
product_review: I have curly, dry, frizzy hair that needs moisture. I have used this shampoo and conditioner several times over the years. It does smooth your hair but in my opinion, it weighs my hair down too much to where it’s just flat after being styled.

product_name: Joico K-PAK Shampoo
product_review: I have been using Joico hair care products for years. I honestly don’t have a single negative thing to say about their products! I have very long hair & it has been every color imaginable but yet my hair is in excellent shape due to Joico products. The permanent hair color & the K-pack shampoo/conditioner duo keep my hair soft, shiny but most importantly-healthy!

product_name: Joico K-PAK Shampoo
product_review: It was a nice shampoo to use when I was coloring my hair. It seemed to help add hydration back into it. It was decently priced for the effectiveness of the product.

product_name: Joico K-PAK Shampoo
product_review: Shampoo che oltre a detergere la cute in modo delicato, offre al capello un’adeguata e mirata ricostruzione delle parti danneggiate lasciandolo molto morbido e idratato . Profumo fantastico !!!! La Texture è molto cremosa e ne basta una piccola quantità da diluire con un po’ di acqua per una miglior distribuzione.

product_name: Joico K-PAK Shampoo
product_review: The k-pak line is now my HG! This shampoo cleanses my bleached blonde hair so well and my hair is now so soft. Good for curly hair and i recommend the clarifying shampoo as well

product_name: Joico K-PAK Shampoo
product_review: I love this shampoo. It leaves my hair soft and shiny and you only need to use a small amount to get a good lather. I use both the shampoo and conditioner. I have course, thick, wavy long hair and this gives smoothness and shine.

product_name: Joico K-PAK Shampoo
product_review: I have been bleaching my hair consistently for about 4 years so to find a shampoo that not only makes the hair look good, but feel softer too is AMAZING! In love with the Joico K-Pak

product_name: Joico K-PAK Shampoo
product_review: With this product my hair shine and not frizzy. The shampoo is soft and not aggressive for hair. The price versus the quality is very good. I recommend this product for every type of hair

product_name: Joico K-PAK Shampoo
product_review: Absolutely love this shampoo & conditioner. It was recommended to me by my hairdresser. I have pretty damaged hair from constantly using box dye and she told me about this shampoo and conditioner and it seems to be working 🙂

product_name: Joico K-PAK Shampoo
product_review: I am thrilled to write a five-star review for Joico K-PAK shampoo. As someone who regularly bleaches their hair every 1-3 months, I have been on a constant search for a product that could repair and restore my damaged hair. Joico K-PAK shampoo has been a game-changer in my hair care routine. From the moment I first used this shampoo, I could tell that it was different from any other shampoo I had tried before. Its rich, creamy texture felt luxurious and nourishing on my hair, and the scent was absolutely divine. But what really impressed me was how it transformed my hair over time. After just a few uses, I noticed a significant improvement in the texture and overall health of my hair. It felt softer, smoother, and more manageable than ever before. And with continued use, my hair has become stronger and more resilient, even after frequent bleaching. I love that this shampoo is formulated with Joico's exclusive Bio-Advanced Peptide Complex, which helps to repair and protect damaged hair. It also contains a blend of antioxidants and vitamins that nourish and strengthen hair from the inside out. Overall, I can't recommend Joico K-PAK shampoo enough. If you have damaged or chemically treated hair like mine, this product is an absolute must-have. It has been crucial in repairing and restoring my hair, and I will continue to use it as a staple in my hair care routine. Five stars all around!

product_name: Joico K-PAK Shampoo
product_review: My hair was in such bad shape, after going to the salon and getting this shampoo recommended, my hair was saved. My hair is softer, so shiny, and overall healthier. I feel like my color lasts longer also but that may just be in my head. Either way it’s my go to shampoo now. I can’t recommend enough if you’re in the market for a new shampoo.

product_name: Joico K-PAK Shampoo
product_review: Worked great on my frizz and smells amazing would definitely repurchase. The conditioner is also very great! Keratin treatment who! We don’t need that here. :)

product_name: Joico K-PAK Shampoo
product_review: LOVE. Love the smell, love how it leaves my hair feeling, love how easy it is to saturate and spread. There will never be a time this isn't in my arsenal for use.

product_name: Joico K-PAK Shampoo
product_review: Joico’s K-Pak line is amazing. I’ve been using the shampoo & conditioner for over a decade now (off and on cause I love to try new things as well). The K-Pak line has never failed me and I used to fry my hair like it was an egg on a skillet, with bleach. This line has saved my hair many times and kept it in good condition after chemical treatments, etc. This is something I recommend to anyone who says they have damaged hair. It smells really nice too! I’ve grown attached to the scent cause I’ve used Joico K-Pak for so many years now!

product_name: Joico K-PAK Shampoo
product_review: Very moisturizing and my hair feels great after using it. I don’t use it every time I wash my hair just cz it can weigh it down but I do like to use it every other wash.

product_name: Joico K-PAK Shampoo
product_review: Use this Joico shampoo with conditioner and it works great for my damaged hair. I bought this product probably the third time and very happy with it. My hair looks great.

product_name: Joico K-PAK Shampoo
product_review: Joico is one of the better brands out there for the professional. I can say that the smell is far better than many shampoo and conditions available. It has a nice light clean smell, without the heavy perfumes. Biolage always reminds me of weeds and I avoid like the plague. K-Pak was designed for repair and does just that. It will feel heavier on hair and if you tend to have oily hair, it's probably not for you. With the conditioner, avoid the scalp. But then again, if you have dry or damaged hair, you probably aren't having issues with oily hair. As with all professional products, buy from a professional and ask for advice. This is a superior brand and works as it's meant to. I highly recommend.

product_name: Joico K-PAK Shampoo
product_review: Smells so good !!! Makes your shower a nice treat when it smells this good. Your hair will feel super soft and moisturized with just this shampoo - highly recommend

product_name: Joico K-PAK Shampoo
product_review: It's no wonder that Joico has already been elected as the best hair care brand in the world. ALL of your products are wonderful. In addition to visibly restoring hair from the first use, the line still smells wonderful. The K-pak line has a delicious and smooth banana scent, in addition to rebuilding, strengthening and nourishing the hair. The mask alone is already a miracle. I have bleached hair and only Joico products recover from chemical damage. If you are insecure, you can buy without fear. if you prefer, buy a travel size to do a test because you will be surprised

product_name: Joico K-PAK Shampoo
product_review: I like because my hair is soft and shine. I have been use Joico , products since 2017 . I can tell you and another’s my hair changes a lot since 2013. I really loved Joico products.

product_name: Joico K-PAK Shampoo
product_review: This is my all-time favorite shampoo I always have this at my house the shampoo conditioner and the hair treatment! I always recommend this one

product_name: Joico K-PAK Shampoo
product_review: I'm extremely picky and it's really hard to find shampoo for my hair it's dyed and it's coarse. Out of more than 100 shampoos this is the first one I fell in love with & my go to

product_name: Joico K-PAK Shampoo
product_review: It reconstructed my hair. It looks super healthy. The shampoo cleans really well and it’s not necessary to use a big amount of it.

product_name: Joico K-PAK Shampoo
product_review: I’ve always heard from my hairdresser to never use shampoos from tjmaxx and drug stores as most just use random product and sell it cheap, but if you go to any salon like a jcp salon or ulta ect and check sale sections you spot good finds like this shampoo I ordered last minute while I was out of town!

product_name: Joico K-PAK Shampoo
product_review: This shampoo is amazing! It’s one of my favorites it’s done wonders for my hair after coloring and bleaching it. My hair feels and looks so much healthier since using this

product_name: Joico K-PAK Shampoo
product_review: This shampoo smells amazing and leaves my hair feeling so clean and smooth! It has helped repair my hair from using cheap products!

product_name: Joico K-PAK Shampoo
product_review: The best shampoo I’ve used!! My hairdresser recommended it And I’ve loved it ever since!! Definitely recommend to anyone!

product_name: Joico K-PAK Shampoo
product_review: I’m in cosmetology school and we use everything from joico. I never used the brand before but OH MY. My hair has never looked better!! 10:10 recommend any joico product

product_name: Joico K-PAK Shampoo
product_review: I love the smell of this shampoo. It lathers nicely and washes out easily. Makes my hair soft. The bottle is easy to hold.

product_name: Joico K-PAK Shampoo
product_review: I have used this product for years and love it! It keeps your hair healthy without adding too much weight or moisture.

product_name: Joico K-PAK Shampoo
product_review: Great shampoo for color damaged or over processed hair. I have blonde highlights that benefit from using a good shampoo and conditioner. Don’t hesitate to try any of the products by Joico. They are all great!

product_name: Joico K-PAK Shampoo
product_review: This product repairs my hair so fast from the damage I give it. Plus the scent is a win for me. I love how silky my hair gets after.

product_name: Joico K-PAK Shampoo
product_review: This completely transformed my hair. I have very dark hair that I get bleached often and my hair was becoming very damaged. Joico has been the only thing to help bring it back. I love this Kpak shampoo and conditioner.

product_name: Joico K-PAK Shampoo
product_review: Love this stuff. Very moisturizing and smells nice and light too. It's not too bad price wise either which is nice!

product_name: Joico K-PAK Shampoo
product_review: I really like this shampoo, my hair looks great and smells amazing. I also bought a set of shampoo + conditioner for my mom!

product_name: Joico K-PAK Shampoo
product_review: This shampoo I’d very moisturizing but It’s too heavy for my hair. I’m quite oily and after washing my hair, my hair would feel oily again by the day after.

product_name: Joico K-PAK Shampoo
product_review: I loved this shampoo and used it for many years until switching to the color safe shampoo in this same line. Great for brittle damaged hair!

product_name: Joico K-PAK Shampoo
product_review: This was good! Gave my hair a lot of shine and it smelled wonderful! I shampoo twice a week and this did not dry out my hair.

product_name: Joico K-PAK Shampoo
product_review: I know that when it comes to shampoos and conditioners it can be difficult to find one that works for you and your hair. When it came to the Joico shampoo I felt it did a good job over removing impurities from my hair while still leaving it moisturized. I honestly really liked it and would definitely recommend it for curly hair or wavy hair.

product_name: Joico K-PAK Shampoo
product_review: This shampoo is okay. I think it’s just my hair type but it was a but heavy for what I usually am wanting in my hair. It does well repairing tho so it just depends on what you need! I have fine hair and didn’t love it

product_name: Joico K-PAK Shampoo
product_review: I like this ok. I have really dry curly hair this doesn't do for me what i need from products. It not bad but its not great!

product_name: Joico K-PAK Shampoo
product_review: My go to daily shampoo. Smells amazing. Really has helped with my dry ends and somewhat oily scalp. It’s has a nice lather. It’s been a favorite of mine for years

product_name: Joico K-PAK Shampoo
product_review: This is a solid product! It help keep hair healthy and doesn’t strip it while providing a nice clean. Works well on color treated hair so color doesn’t fade excessively. Very satisfied with this shampoo.

product_name: Joico K-PAK Shampoo
product_review: The best product ever!!!!!!!!! I loved it!!! It’s one of my favorites, for sure!!!!!!

product_name: Joico K-PAK Shampoo
product_review: I really enjoy this shampoo and conditioner. It it pricey but smells good and is overall great. I have no complaints. It makes my hair soft, shiny, strong, and full. I think I might need to go buy more. 100% recommend.

product_name: L'Oreal Paris Moisture Sulfate Free Shampoo for Dry Hair
product_review: I usually LOVE loreal products. Their elvive line has worked great for me. So i figured id give this line a try. While it isnt a bad product by any means i just dont feel it does anything for my hair. My hair doesnt have volume when it dries and i just dont feel like it gets my hair as clean as i would like. Its not awful but its not amazing. On the plus side it is sulfate free and it smells amazing! Just think there are better products for the same price.

product_name: L'Oreal Paris Moisture Sulfate Free Shampoo for Dry Hair
product_review: The shampoo works great. I think it does have a nice scent and it does help with repairing your hair. I also like that it’s affordable as well. This is great for dry and frizzy hair.

product_name: L'Oreal Paris Moisture Sulfate Free Shampoo for Dry Hair
product_review: Love this shampoo and conditioner. I definitely notice a difference in the texture of my hair when using this. My hair is on the dryer side and this make its feel moisturized.

product_name: L'Oreal Paris Moisture Sulfate Free Shampoo for Dry Hair
product_review: I decided to try this as a friend recommended it for my dry hair. I will mention that it did show pretty immediate results! The downside, is after 2 months of using it my hair seemed to grow accustomed to the formula and seemed even more brittle than it did previously. I discontinued use, but I wouldn't completely write off trying another product from this line.

product_name: L'Oreal Paris Moisture Sulfate Free Shampoo for Dry Hair
product_review: I really enjoy this shampoo from L’Oréal. I think that it is very similar to salon quality. It’s hard to find a drugstore brand or reasonable price that is sulfate free.

product_name: L'Oreal Paris Moisture Sulfate Free Shampoo for Dry Hair
product_review: One of the most affordable and effective drug store products! The packaging is a plus too. You can’t go wrong with any of the shampoo/conditioner from this line.

product_name: L'Oreal Paris Moisture Sulfate Free Shampoo for Dry Hair
product_review: Make a a great job of moisturizing and cleaning hair ,no dryness or fly-aways and as my hair have a lot of natural body .makes easier manage and life...

product_name: L'Oreal Paris Moisture Sulfate Free Shampoo for Dry Hair
product_review: Un shampoing qui convient parfaitement a mes cheveux déshydratée, abîmée et colorée, c'est efficace par rapport au prix, le parfum est sublime!

product_name: L'Oreal Paris Moisture Sulfate Free Shampoo for Dry Hair
product_review: I actually received this product yesterday from Influenster a while ago. I remember it didn’t make my hair feel any less dry. It made it feel the same or honestly dryer. I gave the two stars because it smells good and the packaging is beautiful. I just wish the product itself was as good as the packaging.

product_name: L'Oreal Paris Moisture Sulfate Free Shampoo for Dry Hair
product_review: I have really oily roots and dry ends so what I do is use this only on my roots. Take a hair scrub thing and work that in. Then use the moisturizer conditioner on the rest of my hair. Let it cook while I shave my legs and it works well. Smells good. Took me a minute to figure out a hack like that but it does save me money

product_name: L'Oreal Paris Moisture Sulfate Free Shampoo for Dry Hair
product_review: Hey there, fellow hair enthusiasts! If you've been on the quest for a shampoo that leaves your locks feeling nourished and hydrated without weighing them down, let me introduce you to a gem: L’Oréal Paris Moisture Sulfate Free Shampoo. Now, let’s get into the nitty-gritty of what this shampoo offers. The first thing you’ll notice is its incredible scent. It’s fresh and uplifting without being overpowering—a perfect way to start your day! When you lather it up, you’ll find that it creates a nice, rich foam that feels luxurious, even though it's sulfate-free. This gives you that clean feeling without the harsh dryness. After using it for a few weeks, I noticed a definite improvement in the moisture levels of my hair. My strands didn’t feel parched or brittle. Instead, they were soft and shiny—almost like I had just come from a salon treatment. It’s great for all hair types, especially if yours tends to be on the dryer side, thanks to the added nourishing ingredients that help retain moisture. The packaging is sleek and modern, and the pump dispenser makes it super easy to use, even with wet hands (a total plus in my book!)

product_name: L'Oreal Paris Moisture Sulfate Free Shampoo for Dry Hair
product_review: Really love this shampoo! It helps my hair out! I'd love to try all the other everpure products so I definitely will! This is all healthy and doesn't have any harsh ingredients! Highly recommend! They have this at Walmart, the shampoo and conditioner pack for $13.95 which isn't bad a price considering that everything is healthy in this product! Others you'll end up paying $20 or more. Love it! Will continue purchasing all my life ❤

product_name: L'Oreal Paris Moisture Sulfate Free Shampoo for Dry Hair
product_review: Helps tame frizz to dry and damaged hair. Helped with shine. When I use this it reminds me of going to the hair salons because of the smell. Absolutely recommend and love it!

product_name: L'Oreal Paris Moisture Sulfate Free Shampoo for Dry Hair
product_review: Love that it is Sulfate free. I also like the scent. My main concern is the way it weighs my hair down. I have straight fine hair, and it just doesn't give me enough body.

product_name: L'Oreal Paris Moisture Sulfate Free Shampoo for Dry Hair
product_review: I like this for a drugstore brand. My hair is dry and frizzy and out of control. It gives me moisture and not so unkempt. I switch around a lot but this one I have purchased several times as to the shampoo, conditioner and smells nice . Easy squeeze tube is fine.

product_name: L'Oreal Paris Moisture Sulfate Free Shampoo for Dry Hair
product_review: It’s a very effective and good hair product. I love the texture of it and the scent is so good! You get great value for money and the packaging is clean and nice looking.

product_name: L'Oreal Paris Moisture Sulfate Free Shampoo for Dry Hair
product_review: I have used this shampoo and conditioner combo previously. It smells very nice and leaves your hair smelling fresh even once it has dried after your shower.

product_name: L'Oreal Paris Moisture Sulfate Free Shampoo for Dry Hair
product_review: Does have a nice floral scent and makes my hair super soft it very cheap and makes my hair feel so good and I use do have bad dead end hair not anymore my hair is so silky and healthy and the packaging is cute and easy to use

product_name: L'Oreal Paris Moisture Sulfate Free Shampoo for Dry Hair
product_review: This is my go to shampoo/conditioner when I need to keep beauty products in a budget! It smells great, is moisturizing, and leaves my hair feeling clean and voluminous!

product_name: L'Oreal Paris Moisture Sulfate Free Shampoo for Dry Hair
product_review: Effective! I have wavy hair that tends to get frizzy, and hard to comb through. A little bit of this magic balm and my hair is smooth before and after blowdrying. Not to mention it smells great! A little goes a long way.

product_name: L'Oreal Paris Moisture Sulfate Free Shampoo for Dry Hair
product_review: Works so well for color treated hair as well as particularly dry hair. I am pretty neutral about the scent but it definitely isn’t a bad one, smells mostly like rosemary. When bought in a box set with the matching conditioner it has an honestly unbeatable price and it is perfect to use as a daily shampoo!

product_name: L'Oreal Paris Moisture Sulfate Free Shampoo for Dry Hair
product_review: Love the scent! One of my favorite things about the scent is that it is fresher than many other moisturizing brands. I find that moisturizing brands tend to smell sweeter and heavier, like coconut, shea butter or vanilla, but this one has a refreshing burst of herbal fragrance. The scent is light and lasts a long time.Gentle but thorough cleansing. Left my hair looking and feeling great. I used this brand for a few years. I've recently found something that works better for me (Living Proof No Frizz). In Loreal's defense, I have stubborn fly aways and live in a humid environment and Living Proof is a stronger performer in that department. However, if I found myself unable to obtain or afford Living Proof, I would happily go back to this brand. This works better than many expensive brands I have tried. Even though it's no longer my #1 favorite, it's a fantastic product, and I highly recommend it.

product_name: L'Oreal Paris Moisture Sulfate Free Shampoo for Dry Hair

product_name: L'Oreal Paris Color Vibrancy Intensive Protecting Shampoo
product_review: L'Oréal Paris Color Vibrancy Intensive Protecting Shampoo: A Hair Color Saver I've been using L'Oréal Paris Color Vibrancy Intensive Protecting Shampoo for a few months now, and I'm absolutely in love with it. As someone who colors my hair, I was looking for a shampoo that could help maintain the vibrancy and longevity of my color, and this one delivers. Scent: The shampoo has a pleasant, fruity fragrance that is not overpowering. It's refreshing and invigorating, making each wash an enjoyable experience. Lather: The shampoo lathers well, even with a small amount. It creates a rich, creamy foam that cleanses my hair thoroughly without stripping it of its natural oils. Packaging: The bottle is sleek and modern, with a sturdy design that prevents leaks. The pump dispenser is easy to use and helps to control the amount of product dispensed. Effectiveness: This shampoo does an excellent job of protecting my color from fading. My hair looks vibrant and healthy, and the color stays true to its original shade for much longer. Texture: The texture is thick and creamy, but it rinses out easily without leaving any residue. My hair feels soft and manageable after each wash. Overall, I highly recommend L'Oréal Paris Color Vibrancy Intensive Protecting Shampoo. It's a fantastic product that helps to maintain the vibrancy and longevity of colored hair. If you're looking for a shampoo that can keep your color looking its best, I encourage you to give this one a try.

product_name: L'Oreal Paris Color Vibrancy Intensive Protecting Shampoo
product_review: Love this shampoo. I have coloured hair, and this keeps the colour looking great, and my hair feels lovely and soft. It's a Great size bottle that lasts ages. My hair feels light weight and smells amazing.

product_name: L'Oreal Paris Color Vibrancy Intensive Protecting Shampoo
product_review: The L'Oreal Paris Color Vibrancy Intensive Protecting Shampoo is a popular choice for those with color-treated hair, designed to maintain color richness and protect against fading. Here's a detailed review: ### **Product Overview** L'Oreal Paris Color Vibrancy Intensive Protecting Shampoo is part of the brand's Color Vibrancy line, which is formulated to extend the life of color-treated hair. This shampoo is enriched with antioxidants and a UV filter to protect hair from environmental damage, which can cause color to fade. It promises to keep color-treated hair vibrant and nourished while providing deep cleaning. ### **Performance** The shampoo effectively cleanses the hair without stripping away the color. It lathers well and leaves the hair feeling clean and refreshed. The formula is designed to be gentle on color-treated hair, helping to maintain color intensity and prevent dullness. Many users report that their hair feels soft, smooth, and manageable after using this shampoo, with a noticeable shine that enhances their hair color. ### **Formula** This shampoo contains antioxidants, which help protect the hair from free radicals that can cause color fading. Additionally, the UV filters help shield the hair from sun exposure, another common cause of color degradation. The formula is also infused with nourishing ingredients that help to keep hair hydrated, which is crucial for maintaining the health and vibrancy of color-treated hair. ### **Scent** The shampoo has a pleasant, slightly floral scent that is not overpowering and leaves the hair smelling fresh. The fragrance is long-lasting, which is a plus for those who enjoy scented hair products. ### **Packaging** The shampoo comes in a vibrant red bottle, which is eye-catching and easy to use. The packaging is practical, with a secure flip-top cap that dispenses the right amount of product without waste. ### **Value for Money** Priced affordably, the L'Oreal Paris Color Vibrancy Intensive Protecting Shampoo offers good value, especially for those looking to extend the life of their color-treated hair without breaking the bank. The size of the bottle is generous, and a little goes a long way, making it cost-effective for regular use. ### **Pros:** - Protects and extends the life of color-treated hair. - Enriched with antioxidants and UV filters. - Leaves hair soft, smooth, and shiny. - Pleasant, long-lasting scent. - Affordable and good value for money. ### **Cons:** - May not be suitable for those with very fine hair, as it can feel slightly heavy. - Some users might prefer a sulfate-free formula for a gentler cleanse. ### **Conclusion** The L'Oreal Paris Color Vibrancy Intensive Protecting Shampoo is a reliable and affordable option for maintaining the vibrancy and health of color-treated hair. Its protective formula helps to prevent fading, while the nourishing ingredients keep hair looking and feeling great. Although it may be slightly heavy for very fine hair, it is an excellent choice for anyone looking to preserve their hair color between salon visits.

product_name: Head & Shoulders Itchy Scalp Care Anti-Dandruff Shampoo

Questo prodotto è particolarmente efficace nel combattere la forfora, riducendo la desquamazione e il prurito. Dopo l'uso, i capelli risultano morbidi e lucenti, con una fragranza rinfrescante che lascia una sensazione di pulito. È adatto a tutti i tipi di capelli e può essere utilizzato quotidianamente senza danneggiare la chioma. In sintesi, Head and Shoulders Mentol Fresh è un'ottima scelta per chi cerca uno shampoo efficace e rinfrescante, ideale per mantenere il cuoio capelluto sano e i capelli freschi.

product_name: Head & Shoulders Itchy Scalp Care Anti-Dandruff Shampoo
product_review: I suffer from dry scalp in the winter. The typical itchy and sometimes flaky scalp. I also want to mention that I get really oily roots and have hair down to my butt. With that being said I don’t often find products that soothe my scalp without making it oily and keep my ends from taking too much damage. This seems to be a winner! The eucalyptus smells great (I like the earthy plant smells) and feels nice too. When I rinse it, it doesn’t make my ends feel like hay (some other brands do) and it gives you the added bonus of a slight tingle on the scalp. If you haven’t tried this brand or type you should. It’s done wonders for me! I will mention that the directions ask you to leave it in for a few minutes and if I immediately wash it out as you would a regular shampoo, I don’t get the same results. So having the patience to let it sit almost like a conditioner is key here.

product_review: Smells so good! Really helps with dandruff. It has a slight cooling effect. I feel like a little goes a long way because it lathers very nicely. It is a go to in my household. I highly recommend giving it a try even if you don't have dandruff.

product_name: Tea Tree Special Shampoo
product_review: This shampoo is amazing! My hairdresser has been using it on my hair for as long as I can remember. I took it home & used it but I don't remember the extremely strong smell. The smell is amazing but it smells more of a strong peppermint than tea tree oil. You will definitely pay a good price for the bottles no matter the size but it's worth it! It makes my hair smell so good all day, makes my hair shiny & clean, & glad there is a matching conditioner. But I only use it once a month when I want a really good cleanse as the smell makes me a little dizzy in the shower. I bought mine from Ulta for $16.50!

product_name: Tea Tree Special Shampoo
product_review: Another love/hate affair for me...I like this one because it does actually help reduce my oily scalp and calms my scalp down (probably due to the Tea Tree oil in it), however the dislike is because it's slightly on the harsh side, which is definitely due to the fact that it contains SLS. Rarely does my hair like any shampoo that contains this ingredient, as I end up with hair that feels 'stripped' clean and dry, and not in a good sense! It also contains too much Menthol, and too much peppermint oil - straight out of Pureology's Hydrate Shampoo books. Both brands' shampoos have Peppermint Oil at 6th place in the ingredients list, although unlike Pureology, I don't find my scalp itching as much after using Paul Mitchell's. It also foams less and smells quite refreshing and more natural. However I wouldn't use this long term simply because it doesn't agree with my hair and I end up having to use a hair mask weekly to try and restore my hair to its pre-shampoo state. The hunt for a good shampoo continues... --> My Top 10 Beauty Must-Haves <-- 1. Hair Loss Treatment: ‘Divine Herbal’ - Hair Oil < 2. Lip Balm: 'Nuxe' - Reve De Miel Lip Balm < 3. Pigmentation + Anti-Aging Serum: ‘Divine Herbal’ - Facial Treatment Serum < 4. Cleanser: 'Paula's Choice' - Skin Balancing Cleanser < 5. Concealer: ‘Mac’ - Studio Finish Concealer < 6. Lash Growth Serum: ‘Divine Herbal’ - Divinelash < 7. Foundation/SPF: ‘Juice Beauty’ - Stem Cellular Repair (warm glow) < 8. Face Scrub: 'Dermalogica' - Multivitamin Thermafoliant < 9. Moisturizer: ‘Lush' - Enzymion < 10. Hand Cream: 'Burt's Bees' - Ultimate Care Hand Cream

The shampoo really cleanses my hair without residue or drying, and the conditioner is just creamy perfection in a bottle!!! Yes, just perfect for my hair! I love it and will definitely continue to buy it without a doubt! Suave, please don't ever discontinue this one!!! I am a lifetime loyal customer for this product!!!

product_review: This product is one of my favorites for my youngest daughter hair! It smells delicious, as do most of this brands productions, but most instantly it makes her soft, shiny, healthy, and strong!

product_review: Ein außergewöhnliches Shampoo mit cremiger Textur, das dem Haar Pflege und Widerstandskraft verleiWenn Sie auf der Suche nach einem wirksamen Produkt mit einem guten Preis-Leistungs-Verhältnis sind, dann haben Sie es gefunden.ht. Ich liebe ihn.

product_name: Garnier Fructis Strength & Repair Shampoo
product_review: Maravilloso champu de fructis repara el cabello lo deja espeso y brillante y además te deja una fragancia en el cabello súper agradable a frutas. Hay diferentes envases .

product_name: Garnier Fructis Strength & Repair Shampoo
product_review: This shampoo is perfect for those seeking a gentle yet effective cleansing experience. Its sulfate-free formula is designed to be kind to both your hair and scalp, making it suitable for daily use without stripping away essential oils. Infused with nourishing natural ingredients like argan oil and aloe vera, it helps to hydrate and restore shine, leaving your hair looking vibrant and healthy. The shampoo is also great for color-treated hair, as it protects against fading and helps maintain your color’s brilliance. The fresh, invigorating scent lingers throughout the day, giving you a lasting clean feeling. Plus, its eco-friendly packaging and biodegradable formula make it a responsible choice for those who care about the environment.

product_name: Garnier Fructis Strength & Repair Shampoo
product_review: My hair is frizzy and easy to fall apart due to texture of hair and post Covid problem. This shampoo helps to improve my hair conditions. It is very cheap if you have membership with Sam or Costco. Packaging is plastic, lol… like any other affordable brands.

product_name: Garnier Fructis Strength & Repair Shampoo
product_review: Szampon zawiera w sobie ekstrakt z grejpfruta, z witaminą b6 i niacyniamidem. Przede wszysykim - jak wszystkie szampony fructis- pachnie obłędnie, owocowo/ cytrusowo, do tego zapach długo utrzymuje się na włosach. Ogólnie jest fajny, włosy się po nim bardzo łatwo rozczesują- nawet bez maski czy odżywki, fajnie wyglądają, nie puszą się, są bardziej elastyczne- i wyglądają na zdrowe. Występuje w różnych wariantach - od 250 ml , do 1l co jest fajne - 1 l szampon ma pompkę dozującą. Konsystencja żelowa. Sam szampon nie jest drogi. Ogólnie polecam, teraz testuję garnier z serii botanica . Zobaczymy, czy będzie jak fajny, jak ten.

product_name: Garnier Fructis Strength & Repair Shampoo
product_review: I have recently tried the Garnier Fructis Strength and repair shampoo. I like the shampoo but didn’t care for the fragrance. It lathered up well and left my hair soft and manageable.

product_name: Garnier Fructis Strength & Repair Shampoo
product_review: This is a great shampoo for your hair to repair damage ends. And it will also nitrate your hair look all new and shiny. A bit high on price but it is worth it

product_name: Garnier Fructis Strength & Repair Shampoo
product_review: I've been using Garnier Fuji's strength and repair shampoo for a few months now, and I have to say, I'm quite impressed. My hair tends to get dry and brittle, especially after frequent styling, but the shampoo has made a noticeable difference. From the first wash, I felt my hair was softer and more manageable. The shampoo is a pleasant fruity scent that isn't too overpowering and leaves my house smelling fresh all day. One thing I really appreciate is that it doesn't weigh my hair down or leave any residue. My hair feels light and looks shinier than before. Overall Garnier strengthen and repair shampoo has become a staple in my hair care routine. It delivers on its promise to strengthen and repair, making hair healthier and more resilient. I highly recommend!

product_name: Garnier Fructis Strength & Repair Shampoo
product_review: Amazing. I bought it from Kroger accidentally. The citrus flavor is one of reasons why I fell in love with it. It is committed with natural extracts. I don't see any effect because I just used it for first time 2 days ago. Perhaps I give some reviews later about it effectiveness.

product_name: Garnier Fructis Strength & Repair Shampoo
product_review: My hair has been thinning due to PCOS and this helps stop breakage and moisturizes my dry hair! I’m picky with shampoo right now and I’ll throw this one into the rotation a few times a week to help smooth dry ends and stop breakage

product_name: Garnier Fructis Strength & Repair Shampoo
product_review: Nice smell , lathers well but left my hair limp and dull looking , possibly just did not suit my hair type but not a product I would purchase again . Price was inexpensive

product_review: The smell of this shampoo is lovely, I love the green bold colour of the packaging, it stands out and makes you look straight for it when looking in the shops. This really helps your hair to look strong and back to being brand new.

product_name: Garnier Fructis Strength & Repair Shampoo
product_review: Garnier shampoo strength and repair has been my life savor, since after having two kids my hair lost some life to it. It's affordable, smells, great, but I'd recommend to take collagen or biotin for hair repair. The shampoo and conditioner themselves won't save your damaged hair.

product_name: Garnier Fructis Strength & Repair Shampoo
product_review: Fijn product met een mooie verpakking. Fijne textuur en goed te verdelen over het haar. Ik gebruik hem 2 keer per week, en het werkt prima. Ik heb mooi, zacht haar.

product_name: Garnier Fructis Strength & Repair Shampoo
product_review: The smell on all garnier products is excellent and salon quality. I love the way my hair feels after using this. I feel like it is effective at cleaning my hair and removing all of the build up. The packing isn’t my favorite, but it is still preferable to a lot of other drugstore products. This is a great value. I typically buy it on sale for $3 or $4 dollars max.

product_name: Garnier Fructis Strength & Repair Shampoo
product_review: Este producto tiene un aroma muy agradable, te deja el pelo con una textura sedosa y muy suave, los ingredientes son 💯 naturales, y el envase es mi práctico para llevar a cualquier lugar

product_name: Garnier Fructis Strength & Repair Shampoo
product_review: I've been using Garnier Fructis Strength and Repair Shampoo for a few weeks now, and I'm genuinely impressed. My hair feels stronger and healthier, with noticeably less breakage. The shampoo has a pleasant scent and lathers well, leaving my hair clean and refreshed without any residue. I appreciate the nourishing ingredients that make my hair softer and more manageable. It's also quite affordable, making it a great value for the quality it provides. Overall, Garnier Fructis Strength and Repair Shampoo has become a staple in my hair care routine. Highly recommended!

product_name: Garnier Fructis Strength & Repair Shampoo
product_review: The lid was easy to open. I'm not sure if I really noticed a difference in my hair. I used it a while ago before I needed to use dandruff shampoo. Large bottle.

product_name: Garnier Fructis Strength & Repair Shampoo
product_review: Ce produit est excellent pour les cheveux. C’était le shampooing de mon adolescence mes cheveux brillaient de milles feux et souples, mes cheveux étaient bien démêlés et lissés, un doux parfum agréable pour un prix plus que correct et une emballage simple et efficace!

product_name: Garnier Fructis Strength & Repair Shampoo
product_review: Bardzo dobry szampon do włosów który ładnie pachnie to jeszcze bardzo dobrze odżywia włosy moje włosy po tym szamponie są miękkie w dotyku.🙂.

product_name: Joico Color Balance Purple Shampoo
product_review: This purple shampoo did not hold up to the Joico quality that I am used to seeing when using their products. I love the Joice K-Pak conditioner because you can see instant results in your hair, but not the case for the Purple shampoo. I feel like I wasted a lot of product and received no results: instantly or over time. I currently have very light bleached blonde hair with extensions, and while the shampoo did give a tint to the extensions, it did nothing for my natural hair sadly. I have also used the Blue shampoo which worked a little better when I had darker blonde highlights, but the purple for lighter blondes is a no-go.

product_name: Joico Color Balance Purple Shampoo
product_review: This is the best purple shampoo out of all the tried! Makes even virgin hair so ashy. Love how deep purple the shampoo actually is. Good amount for the amount you buy.

product_name: Joico Color Balance Purple Shampoo
product_review: This purple shampoo made my hair hold the blonde better than any other! Never seemed to damage my hair when using Atleast 1 times a week. My hair stayed strong, smelled great and all in all I have zero complaints.

product_name: Joico Color Balance Purple Shampoo
product_review: I’m a huge Joico fan and I review this brand a lot. They have products in their line to target any hair needs that you have. I have bleached blonde hair which is definitely not forgiving of any damage. My natural color is a light blonde so the lift wasn’t too extreme. It does however get that brassy tone after the color process which is typical. This is the strong Barney purple that I use right after color processing. One use makes a huge and noticeable difference right away. I only leave it on for 5 minutes tops or else the purple will stick to hair. It’s not good when you think you’ve done a good job of rinsing only to find some random purple after you’ve dried your hair. Depending on the condition of your hair you definitely don’t ever need to leave it on for more than five minutes and twice a week tops. It’s not usually necessary. It has an average scent so that’s not a selling point. This shampoo has really one pain purpose in my opinion so I don’t see it as adding any shine or softening benefits. I do recommend this only if your hair is what it’s targeted to.

product_name: Joico Color Balance Purple Shampoo
product_review: The only purple shampoo that I trust to use on my hair! Tones brassiness and leaves your hair looking and feeling fabulous! 10/10 from me, great product

product_name: Joico Color Balance Purple Shampoo
product_review: This purple shampoo is so good!! it kept my blonde from going brassy and it smells soooo good!! This product is not only good for color, but it also helped make my hair super shiny and smooth!!

product_name: Joico Color Balance Purple Shampoo
product_review: The shampoo works amazing on blonde brassy hair. I am not a huge fan of the scent but It is manageable and similar to other purple shampoos, but with a stronger “floral” type smell. The packaging is pretty but the cap did but off of mine shortly after Buying.

product_name: Joico Color Balance Purple Shampoo
product_review: I love this shampoo! My hairstylist recommended it for me ever since I started regularly dying my hair blonde. It smells great and does a fantastic job cancelling out brassiness. It’s a little pricey, but spending a little extra on your hair is worth it. I would recommend this for all my blondies!!

product_name: Joico Color Balance Purple Shampoo
product_review: After dying my hair blonde, my hairstylist recommended the shampoo to keep the brassiness out of my hair and I love it. I don’t have to use a lot it does the job keeps the brassiness out. ￼

product_name: Joico Color Balance Purple Shampoo
product_review: I’ve been using the shampoo and conditioner for sometime now and it doesn’t get rid of the yellow tones. I see some improvements on some strands but overall my hair is still pretty yellow. I’ve tried activating it and foaming on my hands, I have tried applying it direct to my hair and working with my hands through it but it just doesn’t get rid of the yellow.

product_name: Joico Color Balance Purple Shampoo
product_review: I use this 1-2 times a week to brighten up my hair. It really does remove the brass and dullness. It leaves me hair feeling clean too. I strongly recommend this brand.

product_name: Joico Color Balance Purple Shampoo
product_review: This is my go to shampoo when I am blonde. I have tried other brands but this one is the winner. It doesn't leave my hair feeling to stripped/dry. Sometimes I end up with a bit of purple in my hair but I never mind it. I would just be wary of how much you use.

product_name: Joico Color Balance Purple Shampoo
product_review: I have blonde balayage hair. I do it once a year when the weather gets warmer. This purple shampoo helps me keep the blonde ash like I love! We don't want yellow lol

product_name: Joico Color Balance Purple Shampoo

product_name: Joico Color Balance Purple Shampoo

product_name: Joico Color Balance Purple Shampoo

product_name: Joico Color Balance Purple Shampoo

product_name: Joico Color Balance Purple Shampoo

product_name: Joico Color Balance Purple Shampoo

product_name: Joico Color Balance Purple Shampoo

product_name: Joico Color Balance Purple Shampoo

product_name: Joico Color Balance Purple Shampoo

product_name: Joico Color Balance Purple Shampoo

product_name: Joico Color Balance Purple Shampoo

product_name: Joico Color Balance Purple Shampoo
product_review: My hairdresser recommended this product for me and I haven’t used anything else! It keep my blonde bright and not brassy, and doesn’t stain. Along with that it doesn’t leave a purple tint. [product:joico-color-balance-purple-shampoo]

product_name: Joico Color Balance Purple Shampoo

product_name: Joico Color Balance Purple Shampoo
product_review: Amazing purple shampoo! When I choose to tone my hair on the icier side of the color wheel, I always use this product for maintenance. I also have used it as a mask (put it on for an hour and rinse) to get even faster, more vibrant results. I bought the largest size and it’s lasted me 3 years since you don’t need to use purple shampoo every time you wash your hair.

product_name: Joico Color Balance Purple Shampoo
product_review: I have been using this shampoo for a few years. It is perfect for hair that is dyed a light champagne blond or for hair that is naturally silver or white. If you want your hair to look a bit different without a lot of work and expense, this is a good way to go.

product_name: Joico Color Balance Purple Shampoo
product_review: Having natural dark, and bleaching I need a lightener! I completely recommend this shampoo!

product_name: Joico Color Balance Purple Shampoo

product_name: Joico Color Balance Purple Shampoo

product_name: Joico Color Balance Purple Shampoo
product_review: This product did what it was supposed to do and did it well keeping my hair non brassy. The smell was fantastic and their is not much to improve. It also does a very good job at thoroughly cleaning my hair and i have and will purchase again.

product_name: Joico Color Balance Purple Shampoo
product_review: I have been using this shampoo for two years. I love how it washes away any brassy or yellow tones. I am frequently asked what type/brand of shampoo I use.

product_name: Matrix Brass Off Blue Shampoo
product_review: Matrix Brass Off Blue Conditioner is a fantastic choice for anyone looking to neutralize brassy tones in their hair. This conditioner is specially formulated with blue pigments to counteract unwanted orange and yellow hues, leaving your hair with a cooler, more balanced color. Users appreciate its ability to keep blonde, highlighted, or brunette hair looking fresh and vibrant between salon visits. Additionally, it provides deep conditioning, leaving hair feeling soft, smooth, and hydrated. Overall, Matrix Brass Off Blue Conditioner is a must-have for maintaining beautiful, brass-free hair.

product_name: Matrix Brass Off Blue Shampoo

product_name: Matrix Brass Off Blue Shampoo

product_name: Matrix Brass Off Blue Shampoo

product_name: Matrix Brass Off Blue Shampoo
product_review: This is the best blue shampoo I have tried and I have tried many of them. The smell is nice, not off putting like some, and it really cools my brassiness.

product_name: Matrix Brass Off Blue Shampoo
product_review: I recently had the opportunity to try the Matrix Blue Brass Off Shampoo and I must say, it exceeded my expectations in every way. As someone who is a natural brunette dying my hair blonde has been a struggle. I have always struggled with maintaining the cool, ashy tones and avoiding the dreaded brassy hues that can develop over time. That's why I was excited to try the Matrix Blue Brass Off Shampoo, which is specifically formulated to neutralize those unwanted warm tones and restore a beautiful, vibrant color. First and foremost, I was impressed with how effective this shampoo was at toning down the brassiness in my hair. After just one use, I noticed a significant difference in the color of my hair. The shampoo's blue pigments work to counteract the orange and yellow tones, leaving my hair looking much cooler and more natural. Not only does this shampoo deliver on its promise to eliminate brassiness, but it also leaves my hair feeling incredibly soft and smooth. The formula is gentle and nourishing, so it doesn't strip my hair of its natural oils or leave it feeling dry or brittle. Instead, it leaves my hair feeling hydrated and healthy, with a beautiful shine. I also appreciate the convenience of the packaging. The bottle is easy to use, with a flip-top cap that allows for precise pouring and prevents any spills or messes. A little goes a long way with this shampoo, so the bottle lasts a long time, making it a great value for the price.

product_name: Matrix Brass Off Blue Shampoo
product_review: I bought this recently since I colored my hair with highlights. It works really well on taking the golden/brass look out of my hair. The only thing I don’t like is that it stained my scalp a little bit.

product_name: Matrix Brass Off Blue Shampoo
product_review: I used this product when I started growing out my gray roots, to neutralize brassy ends. It left my hair feeling clean and light, and smells nice. It does seem to work more effectively when used at least twice a week.

product_name: Matrix Brass Off Blue Shampoo
product_review: Dopo aver provato i campioncini di shampoo e conditioner di Matrix Brass Off, posso dire che sono rimasta molto soddisfatta.Ecco i motivi per cui consiglio questi prodotti: Risultati: Lo shampoo e il balsamo Brass Off hanno fatto un lavoro eccellente nel neutralizzare i toni gialli e arancioni indesiderati dai miei capelli castani con schiariture.Dopo averli usati, i miei capelli sono diventati più luminosi e belli. L'Idratazione: Il balsamo Brass Off ha idratato i miei capelli in modo efficace, lasciandoli morbidi e facili da pettinare. Profumo: Entrambi i prodotti hanno un profumo piacevole e duraturo. In generale, consiglio vivamente lo shampoo e il balsamo Brass Off di Matrix a chiunque cerchi un modo efficace per mantenere i propri capelli biondi luminosi e privi di toni indesiderati.

product_name: Matrix Brass Off Blue Shampoo

product_name: Matrix Brass Off Blue Shampoo

product_name: Matrix Brass Off Blue Shampoo

product_name: Matrix Brass Off Blue Shampoo

product_name: Matrix Brass Off Blue Shampoo

product_name: Matrix Brass Off Blue Shampoo
