product_review: Love this product, when I’m lighter in the summer months I love to use this on my hair to help tone down the brassyness. I love the scent and can say it leaves my hair feeling healthier too

product_name: L'Oreal Paris Brass Toning Purple Sulfate Free Shampoo
product_review: I had never tried this shampoo/conditioner set before but in looking for purple one--those made specifically for blonde, silver and gray hair--I ran across this and decided to try it. My (now-white) hair has always been dry but even though I do not blow dry it I still feel it is on the dry side. It has also gotten a bit frizzy. This doesn't leave my hair as soft as I would like but I think it does a pretty fine job, hence four stars for moisturizing and softness. I do tend to rinse thoroughly so perhaps I am doing a bit too much. The scent is minimal, thank goodness, because I loathe scented/perfumed products of any kind. And my hair gets and looks wonderfully clean. Recommended.

product_name: L'Oreal Paris Brass Toning Purple Sulfate Free Shampoo
product_review: Great purple shampoo for blond hair! Love to use this in my weekly rotation! Definitely a staple in my shower. Also you can’t beat the price!! Love love love

product_name: L'Oreal Paris Brass Toning Purple Sulfate Free Shampoo
product_review: This is my favorite purple shampoo, i love the smell and it leaves my hair looking very blonde. worth the money and does its job perfectly. it last a while as well

product_name: L'Oreal Paris Brass Toning Purple Sulfate Free Shampoo
product_review: This was my first time using this purple shampoo and my experience was very good. I would recommend this shampoo because it is inexpensive yet still gives you really good results. It does a good job at getting rid of the brassiness in your hair and gives your hair color a nice, cool blonde tone.

product_name: L'Oreal Paris Brass Toning Purple Sulfate Free Shampoo
product_review: I’ve used this after having a balayage color, and it helped maintain the color and helped with the dryness of my hair. It’s not too expensive too for purple shampoo.

product_name: L'Oreal Paris Brass Toning Purple Sulfate Free Shampoo
product_review: I love a good sulfate free shampoo! This smells good and it finally gives us brunettes our own color correction. Did it get rid of all my brass tones and reduce the amount of times I went to the salon to get a toner, no. However, I do think it helped in between treatments.

product_name: L'Oreal Paris Brass Toning Purple Sulfate Free Shampoo
product_review: helps w blonde especially if its dyed or highlights !! it lasts a while for the price and it smalls like nothing really. also love the packaging !!

product_name: L'Oreal Paris Brass Toning Purple Sulfate Free Shampoo
product_review: Great price for an effective product. I get so many compliments on how healthy and not brassy my hair looks. The scent is neutral and the packing is simple and easy.

product_name: L'Oreal Paris Brass Toning Purple Sulfate Free Shampoo
product_review: This product was pretty good for the price. I probably should have been more consistent but it did take out some of the brass/yellow tones. And it’s nice that it’s sulfate free

product_name: L'Oreal Paris Brass Toning Purple Sulfate Free Shampoo
product_review: I had my hair lightened to a brass color and did not like how it looked. I used this purple shampoo and it helped tone down my hair. I highly recommend trying this if you don’t like the color your hair turns out. They are a good price.

product_name: L'Oreal Paris Brass Toning Purple Sulfate Free Shampoo
product_review: L'oreal Brass Toning Shampoo is a highly effective product for neutralizing brassiness in blonde and highlighted hair. The shampoo's unique formula contains violet pigments that work to counteract unwanted yellow and orange tones, leaving hair looking brighter and cooler. The shampoo is gentle enough for regular use and helps to maintain a clean and vibrant color between salon visits. Original Insight: One of the standout features of L'oreal Brass Toning Shampoo is its ability to deliver noticeable results after just a few uses. The shampoo effectively removes brassiness without drying out the hair, leaving it feeling soft and looking refreshed.

product_name: L'Oreal Paris Brass Toning Purple Sulfate Free Shampoo
product_review: L'Oréal Paris Brass Toning Purple Shampoo seems to be reasonably priced, making it an affordable option for neutralizing brassy tones and achieving an even hair color. It has a pleasant scent, produces a rich lather, and rinses out with some effort. However, it does tend to dry out my hair, resulting in tangles and brittleness.

product_name: L'Oreal Paris Brass Toning Purple Sulfate Free Shampoo
product_review: Smells fantastic! Leaves my hair feeling so soft and shiny after washing. A little goes a long way. Definitely takes the brassiness out of my hair.

product_name: L'Oreal Paris Brass Toning Purple Sulfate Free Shampoo
product_review: One of the best toning shampoos. Always a big help for me to reduce the brassiness and my hair look colder blond. It smells great and really requires a little bit of the product. I usually just wait for about 5-7 minutes and then wash it off. The results are great.

product_name: L'Oreal Paris Brass Toning Purple Sulfate Free Shampoo
product_review: Amazing value for money, leaves my blonde brighter than ever without making my hair feel dry, which a lot of other purple shampoos do. Highly recommend!

product_name: L'Oreal Paris Brass Toning Purple Sulfate Free Shampoo
product_review: I really like this product. It has clean ingredients and is color safe. It smells great and the purple really does tone. A lot of these toning products can be harsh but this one is nice.

product_name: L'Oreal Paris Brass Toning Purple Sulfate Free Shampoo
product_review: I started dyeing my hair gray for some time and I came across this shampoo that helps maintain the color so that it doesn't wash out so quickly and honestly it was a bull's eye 😁 My hair maintains its color for a long time, what's more, the shampoo doesn't dry it out and it smells nice 🙃

product_name: L'Oreal Paris Brass Toning Purple Sulfate Free Shampoo
product_review: Good quality for a drugstore haircare product. It tones up your hair perfectly and doesn't leave it feeling dry. Smells nice and good amount of product.

product_name: L'Oreal Paris Brass Toning Purple Sulfate Free Shampoo
product_review: Price is great for this antibrass. As a color treated blonde and having pitch black natural hair this is useful. Leaves my hair hydrated and somewhat helps with brassinress.

product_name: L'Oreal Paris Brass Toning Purple Sulfate Free Shampoo
product_review: Good for removing brassiness from bleached and colored hair. Leaves hair soft and shiny. Its Good for weekly use to help maintain color and tone

product_name: L'Oreal Paris Brass Toning Purple Sulfate Free Shampoo
product_review: This product was great for getting the brassiness out of my hair when I was blonde. It also smells really good and left my hair feeling SO soft! I definitely recommend!

product_name: L'Oreal Paris Brass Toning Purple Sulfate Free Shampoo
product_review: Love this purple shampoo, keeps the hair brass free and smells great. It is a great price for the amount that you pay for it. My hair is fine and it can be drying so always use a conditioner after

product_name: L'Oreal Paris Brass Toning Purple Sulfate Free Shampoo
product_review: This shampoo is used to mask the brassiness in your hair. It does the job and smells great. I leave the shampoo on for few minutes to let the product sit or a little longer

product_name: L'Oreal Paris Brass Toning Purple Sulfate Free Shampoo
product_review: Though it's a little pricey for the amount that you get, it's a good product. I recently bleached my hair and this was good for toning on my wash days. It left my hair feeling soft

product_name: L'Oreal Paris Brass Toning Purple Sulfate Free Shampoo
product_review: It was really effective in getting some of the brass out of my hair while leaving my hair feeling soft, silky, and smelling nice and it's not too expensive.

product_name: L'Oreal Paris Brass Toning Purple Sulfate Free Shampoo
product_review: When I was platinum blonde I used this shampoo once a week for years! Now that I have a more natural shade of blonde, I use it every two weeks to keep my hair from looking brassy. This shampoo leaves my hair feeling great and is super affordable.

product_name: L'Oreal Paris Brass Toning Purple Sulfate Free Shampoo
product_review: My hairdresser recently suggested I purchase a purple shampoo to use at least once a week. After lots of research, I decided on L'OREAL EVERPURE PURPLE SHAMPOO. My hair has blonde highlights so it tends to get slightly orange as the weeks go on between colorings. This shampoo immediately fixed that and now it's back to the way it was before. The directions are simple and best of all the price. I didn't wanna pay a lot for a once a week shampoo so this was the perfect choice!

product_name: L'Oreal Paris Brass Toning Purple Sulfate Free Shampoo
product_review: This shampoo is very effective, it does not have a scent but comes in good packaging and is great value for the money. Improves hair texture but it smells okay

product_name: L'Oreal Paris Brass Toning Purple Sulfate Free Shampoo
product_review: Didn’t work as well as other purple shampoos I’ve used but wasn’t horrible. Cheaper than other products. Didn’t smell great, left my hair drier than normal.

product_name: L'Oreal Paris Brass Toning Purple Sulfate Free Shampoo
product_review: This product is nice but the only thing is that it can leave your hands purple afterwards. But it has a good effect afterwards and it leaves your hair brighter than before. And it leaves your hair feeling very smooth.

product_name: L'Oreal Paris Brass Toning Purple Sulfate Free Shampoo
product_review: This product is very effective! It smells so good and you get your bang for your buck! The packaging makes it easy to use and makes your hair feel clean!

product_name: L'Oreal Paris Brass Toning Purple Sulfate Free Shampoo
product_review: I’m a natural blonde and this works pretty well for the price. Definitely worth a try! My least favorite part about this is that where I’m located it tends to sell out more often than I’d like but that’s just me.

product_name: L'Oreal Paris Brass Toning Purple Sulfate Free Shampoo
product_review: A good go to Toning shampoo if you want an easy fix on your newly bleach hair. I used once when I bleach my hair and was satisfied with the result. Makes your hair smooth and nice and tones well. And smells good just like your regular shampoo.

product_name: L'Oreal Paris Brass Toning Purple Sulfate Free Shampoo
product_review: I've been using this shampoo for about 2 years now and it does wonders! Within a few washes your brass is gone! It's affordable and does the job great! I'm obsessed! It also smells pretty good too! Keeps my hair blonder and looking like I just freshly came from the salon! For the price this shampoo is a MUST!

product_name: L'Oreal Paris Brass Toning Purple Sulfate Free Shampoo
product_review: Great products Great for removing brassiness from freshly bleached hair even hair that’s been dyed long before. My mom ones had her hair professionally done and they left it quite yellow so we ran to the store and purchase this purple shampoo and it really helped the tone her hair down she was embarrassed to go out like that, and after the wash she was very pleased with it.

product_name: L'Oreal Paris Extraordinary Clay Shampoo
product_review: The Elvive line of Loreal products always does amazing things for my hair no matter which type i use ! I usually use the total repair but i had switched to use this one at one point because total repair was sold out and it did amazing things for my hair ! It made my hair feel super soft, look super shiny, and it took a couple days for my hair to get greasy after using this product. While it is more expensive than the total repair i feel that it is worth the extra money!

product_name: L'Oreal Paris Extraordinary Clay Shampoo
product_review: Me encanta el olor que deja en el pelo. Es perfecto para raíces grasas ya que funciona super bien, me deja el cuero cabelludo limpio y el resto del pelo hidratado!

product_name: L'Oreal Paris Extraordinary Clay Shampoo
product_review: The texture of this shampoo is as expected and adds the effectiveness of the product. When bought as a package it is excellent value for money and a little goes a long way.

product_name: L'Oreal Paris Extraordinary Clay Shampoo
product_review: This product is great for greasy hair especially used along side the conditioner and hair mask. It has helped me with being able to wash my hair less

product_name: L'Oreal Paris Extraordinary Clay Shampoo
product_review: J’utilise ce shampooing car mes cheveux sont très gras. J’ai utilisé pas mal de marques différentes et au final celle-là, et pour l’instant celle qui est le plus efficace sur mes cheveux. Grâce a son argile, il absorbe l’excès de sébum et permet que les cheveux progressent moins vite. Il laisse mes cheveux bien doux et avec une très bonne odeur. Ce shampooing est très efficace mais malheureusement il n’est plus comme commercialiser, mais on peut le trouver sur d’autres sites. ￼

product_name: L'Oreal Paris Extraordinary Clay Shampoo
product_review: This was really fun to use! I liked the feel of the shampoo in my hands and through my hair. It wasn't as effective on my hair as I had hoped; it did great work at keeping my hair clean, just not looking as fresh and new as I had hoped

product_name: L'Oreal Paris Extraordinary Clay Shampoo
product_review: Good product for a very good price, this is fits me perfect if i am on a budget. Nice smell, works great. Easy packaging. Good, smooth texture. 👌 👌

product_name: L'Oreal Paris Extraordinary Clay Shampoo
product_review: I LOVEDDDD everything about this shampoo! How it smells, how it feels, how it absorbs oil from my scalp but still leaves my Hair strands hydrated. Wish they didn’t discontinue this in Canada.

product_name: L'Oreal Paris Extraordinary Clay Shampoo
product_review: Smells super nice like vanilla, gets rid of all my dandruff. Texture is nice and smooth. Good value for money I would definitely buy again, also looks super cute.

product_name: L'Oreal Paris Extraordinary Clay Shampoo
product_review: Przyjemny zapach i kolor. Dobrze oczyszcza skórę głowę. Włosy są gładkie, pachnące i błyszczące. Niestety posiada w swoim składzie dużo niekorzystnych składników, które dają krótkotrwały efekt.

product_name: L'Oreal Paris Extraordinary Clay Shampoo
product_review: This is a must have to have on hand! I don’t use it daily but for the price you need this in your hair care collection! Perfect sleek packaging; super effective for cleansing and detoxing your scalp! Perfect for those dry shampoo users and purple shampoo users! Helps with texture and the smell is great and fresh!

product_name: L'Oreal Paris Extraordinary Clay Shampoo
product_review: Let me say that the way this shampoo is packaged is what first caught my attention and when I opened it the scent took my breath away and the it’s effectiveness after use it what tea told me that I got the value for my money

product_name: L'Oreal Paris Extraordinary Clay Shampoo
product_review: Good shampoo for oily headed guys and gals. Effective at cleaning oily hair without being harsh and leaving it stripped and "squeaky" feeling. My hair feels soft, hydrated, and smelling fresh while delaying the build up of oil.

product_name: L'Oreal Paris Extraordinary Clay Shampoo
product_review: Love this shampoo/conditioner. Smells amazing. Really helps with oily scalp! I found my hair didn’t look as oily, the day after I washed my hair! It is a bit pricey, but well worth it!

product_name: L'Oreal Paris Extraordinary Clay Shampoo
product_review: Tolles Shampoo, duftet sehr schön, reinigt die Haare wunderbar uns sie fetten tatsächlich nicht so schnell nach. Einfach nur top! Ich würde dieses Shampoo jedem empfehlen der unkomplizierte Haare hat und nach einem Shampoo ohne Schnick-Schnack sucht.

product_name: L'Oreal Paris Extraordinary Clay Shampoo
product_review: Shampoo ruikt erg lekker en heb het idee dat hij mijn haren goed verzorgt. Frisse verpakking die doet denken aan de spa vanwege de kleur. Past goed bij klei. Niet te duur in de aanbieding.

product_name: L'Oreal Paris Extraordinary Clay Shampoo
product_review: Ein sehr gutes Shampoo für "Mischhaar" bzw. trockene Spitzen und einen fettigen Ansatz. Es pflegt die Kopfhaut und nimmt überschüssiges Fett auf. Gleichzeitig pflegt es die Spitzen und Längen und man hat hinterher ein so schönes sauberes und gepflegtes Haargefühl. Sehr empfehlenswert

product_name: L'Oreal Paris Extraordinary Clay Shampoo
product_review: The L'Oreal Paris extraordinary clay shampoo is an amazing product, it's very effective keeping the hair smooth and clean. It's got a great scent, the product is neatly packaged and it's good value for money. It's very smooth on the hair

product_name: L'Oreal Paris Extraordinary Clay Shampoo
product_review: This has really helped my hair with dryness. My bottoms get really dry but near my roots used to get really oily. It has helped to even them out and now it’s sort. I also like the way it smells.

product_name: L'Oreal Paris Extraordinary Clay Shampoo
product_review: Het ruikt erg lekker en voor de prijs hoef je het niet te laten. Het doet zijn werk en je haar word er superzacht van. De verpakking is prima geen op of aanmerkingen gewoon een lekker shampootje

product_name: L'Oreal Paris Extraordinary Clay Shampoo
product_review: As someone with oily hair, this shampoo does the job of making your hair feel super clean after and removing all the buildup from the scalp. The scent is nice and not over powerful.

product_name: L'Oreal Paris Extraordinary Clay Shampoo
product_review: Clay shampoo es una excelente opción cuando del cuidado de la piel se trata , excelente textura , fragancia, y acondicionamiento , muy útil para el uso diaria

product_name: L'Oreal Paris Extraordinary Clay Shampoo
product_review: So I have not brought it or used it before I don’t know if I should because I’m not really sure what type of hair is suits but if anyone has let me know if it’s good ￼

product_name: L'Oreal Paris Extraordinary Clay Shampoo
product_review: The L'Oréal Paris Elvive Extraordinary Clay Rebalancing Shampoo is highly praised for its unique formulation aimed at addressing oily roots and dry ends. Infused with three refined clays, this shampoo effectively cleanses the scalp by absorbing excess oil and impurities while providing hydration to the hair lengths. Users love how it leaves their hair feeling fresh, light, and balanced without stripping away natural moisture. The shampoo lathers well and has a pleasant, clean fragrance, adding to the enjoyable washing experience. Many users report that their hair remains oil-free for longer periods, reducing the need for frequent washes. However, those with very dry or coarse hair might find it slightly less hydrating. Overall, the L'Oréal Paris Elvive Extraordinary Clay Rebalancing Shampoo is an excellent choice for individuals seeking to manage oily roots and dry ends, delivering a clean and balanced feel to the hair.

product_name: L'Oreal Paris Extraordinary Clay Shampoo
product_review: Super Shampoo mit tollen Duft. Reinigt gut die Kopfhaut. Dadurch muss ich weniger die Haare waschen bzw dadurch fetten die Haare nicht mehr so schnell.

product_name: L'Oreal Paris Extraordinary Clay Shampoo
product_review: Ideal para pelo graso porque limpia en profundidad el cuerpo cabelludo. No me resecó para nada y la sensación de pelo limpio me encantó. Es un producto asequible y trae buena cantidad. Me gustó mucho.

product_name: L'Oreal Paris Extraordinary Clay Shampoo
product_review: Lovely scent clay is perfect not to thin or to thick. Really made my hair so much softer, you get a good amount for your money as well it lasted me about 2 weeks.

product_name: L'Oreal Paris Extraordinary Clay Shampoo
product_review: Es un champú con una textura densa que siempre la han usado en casa los más jóvenes, con fragancia que no molesta, ya no la compro puesto que no la encuentro por ninguna parte.

product_name: L'Oreal Paris Extraordinary Clay Shampoo
product_review: Great shampoo for leaving your hair feeling deeply clean. It has a very refreshing scent, the texture is slightly thicker than other shampoos however it does exactly what it states to do!

product_name: L'Oreal Paris Extraordinary Clay Shampoo
product_review: It feels so good and it makes my hair clean and soft. I totally love the scent which is sooo good! It comes in a cute packaging and al. I would totally recommend getting it.

product_name: L'Oreal Paris Extraordinary Clay Shampoo
product_review: Cleaned my hair super fast! Scent was so nice, the packaging was very easy to open and it was genuinely worth the money I spent on it. Extremely recommend this product!

product_name: L'Oreal Paris Extraordinary Clay Shampoo
product_review: Effectiveness:* 8/10 (Effectively cleanses and purifies the hair and scalp, but may not be as effective for severe dandruff or scalp issues) *Scent:* 9/10 (Pleasant, subtle, and clean scent that's not overpowering) *Packaging:* 8/10 (Standard shampoo bottle with a flip-top cap, easy to use and dispense product) *Value for money:* 7/10 (Reasonably priced, but may not be the most affordable option) *Hair texture:* Suitable for all hair types, especially those with oily roots and dry ends (Adds moisture and nourishment while controlling oil and impurities) Overall, the L'Oréal Elvive Clay Shampoo is a good choice for those seeking a gentle, effective, and pleasant-smelling cleanser for everyday use. However, those with severe scalp issues or very dry hair may need a more specialized product.

product_name: L'Oreal Paris Extraordinary Clay Shampoo
product_review: This shampoo is great! Always leaves my hair feeling very shiny and soft as well as clean and does not become oily quickly. Cute packaging as well

product_name: L'Oreal Paris Extraordinary Clay Shampoo
product_review: The event it very strong leaves my hair smelling good all day. Helps with oily scalp and cleanses very well. The colour is very pretty the bottle and product

product_name: L'Oreal Paris Extraordinary Clay Shampoo
product_review: Was very good when my roots were oily and ends dry.really worked back then.good price for effective product, highly recommended. L’Oréal is great brand

product_name: L'Oreal Paris Extraordinary Clay Shampoo
product_review: Love this, my daughters hair was getting oily really quickly this shampoo and matching conditioner has been a revelation perfectly cleans root whilst keeping ends hydrated

product_name: L'Oreal Paris Extraordinary Clay Shampoo
product_review: Dieses Shampoo benutze ich bereits seit geraumer Zeit und ich bin sehr zufrieden. Meine Haare sind fein und fetten schnell. Daher ist dieses Shampoo ideal. Es reinigt die fettige Kopfhaut und schont die trockenen Längen. Ich bin mit den Ergebnissen sehr zufrieden und kaufe das Produkt daher regelmäßig.

product_name: L'Oreal Paris Extraordinary Clay Shampoo
product_review: Is the best shampoo for greasy scalp/ hair. It is the only product that works for me. It leaves my hair snd scalp so clean with no build up. It is the only shampoo I will use.

product_name: L'Oreal Paris Extraordinary Clay Shampoo
product_review: I bought it for my oily hair. It is good but not as much effective. It made my hair little dry. The fragnance is nice thats a plus point. It has nice packaging

product_name: L'Oreal Paris Extraordinary Clay Shampoo
product_review: Packaging is nice, great for all types of hair, but my curls do very well with this brand. It smells amazing & don't leave an oily feeling on your hair! I would highly recommend, usually there are coupons as well for this brand at your local family dollar, dollar general, stop & shop, Walgreens.

product_name: L'Oreal Paris Extraordinary Clay Shampoo
product_review: Shampoing efficace pour le cuir chevelu gras mais sans assécher trop non plus. Il nettoie bien les cheveux et je sentais mes cheveux plus légers après l’avoir utilisé.

product_name: L'Oreal Paris Extraordinary Clay Shampoo
product_review: Great shampoo for greasy hair. Helps to keep hair smooth and sleek. Doesn’t have a particularly memorable scent to it. Good packaging for keeping in the shower or side of the bath as it stands up.

product_name: L'Oreal Paris Extraordinary Clay Shampoo
product_review: This product is my all time favourite it really makes my hair feel and look clean. Smells great too the smell of the shampoo stays in my hair until my next hair wash day

product_name: L'Oreal Paris Extraordinary Clay Shampoo
product_review: Te da mucho buena limpieza a tu cuero cabelludo con una textura fascinante tiene buenos ingredientes su aroma me encanta.... Efectividad 100%

product_name: L'Oreal Paris Extraordinary Clay Shampoo
product_review: Éste champú deja mi pelo completamente hidratado, mi pelo queda limpio durante días ,su olor y aroma me encanta ya que queda impregnado en mi cabello

product_name: L'Oreal Paris Extraordinary Clay Shampoo
product_review: Hair texture becomes softer with regular use, also controls oil, the packaging is good too no leakage and dripping. The scent is so soothing and mild.

product_name: L'Oreal Paris Extraordinary Clay Shampoo
product_review: really great for oily scalp left my hair super glossy and soft excellent smell works great with conditioner as a combo superb product to use must try

product_name: L'Oreal Paris Extraordinary Clay Shampoo
product_review: Haar fühlt sich nachdem waschen richtig frisch und es hat einen schönen Duft. Kopfhaut danach sehr angenehm, Haare sehen nicht porös aus.. Haar fällt sehr schön gibt ein schönes Volumen. Fettet nicht so schnell kann mann gerne weiter empfehlen.

product_name: L'Oreal Paris Extraordinary Clay Shampoo
product_review: Great for all hair types! Have oily hair and this did not make my hair oilier. I like the smell and the price of this shampoo and loreal never disappoints.

product_name: L'Oreal Paris Extraordinary Clay Shampoo
product_review: As someone who struggles with oily roots and dry ends, I've been on the hunt for the perfect shampoo to balance my hair. Enter the L'Oreal Paris Extraordinary Clay Shampoo, and let me tell you, it's been a game-changer! 💧✨ What makes this shampoo stand out is its unique formula, enriched with the power of clay. This innovative blend helps to purify my scalp, absorbing excess oil and impurities without stripping away essential moisture from my ends. The result? Hair that feels clean, fresh, and perfectly balanced from root to tip. 🌿💦 One of the things I love most about this shampoo is its lightweight texture. It lathers up beautifully, effortlessly removing buildup and leaving my hair feeling revitalized without any heavy residue. Plus, it has a refreshing scent that lingers long after I've rinsed it out, giving me that salon-fresh feeling every time I wash my hair. 🚿🌸 Since using the L'Oreal Paris Extraordinary Clay Shampoo, I've noticed a significant improvement in the overall health of my hair. My roots stay oil-free for longer, and my ends feel softer and more hydrated than ever before. It's become an essential part of my hair care routine, helping me achieve that perfect balance I've been searching for.

product_name: No. 4 Bond Maintenance™ Shampoo
product_review: This shampoo makes my hair soft and healthy after each use. It has a clean sent that is not overbearing. Packing is easy to use with a clean look. The price is expensive, but worth the extra cost for healthy hair.

product_name: No. 4 Bond Maintenance™ Shampoo
product_review: I have been using this for months now. I really enjoy this shampoo, my hair was very dry and brittle from bleaching it and this has helped tremendously with getting my hair healthy again. On the pricier side but worth it.

product_name: No. 4 Bond Maintenance™ Shampoo
product_review: Hi. OLAPLEX was a great gift for me. I have long hair and this shampoo does the job perfectly. The shampoo does not have a strong odor and foams very easily. To my great surprise, my long hair requires very little shampoo and my hair is clean. The packaging of the shampoo is simple and convenient.

product_name: No. 4 Bond Maintenance™ Shampoo
product_review: Olaplex No.4 Bond Maintenance Shampoo is a must-have for those seeking healthy, shiny hair. Its effectiveness in repairing and strengthening damaged hair is unmatched, leaving it smooth and manageable. The subtle, pleasant scent adds a touch of luxury to your shower routine. The sleek packaging is not only stylish but also practical with its easy-to-use flip-top cap. The texture is rich and lathers well, ensuring a thorough cleanse. At 250ml, it offers great value for money, making it an investment in your hair’s health.

product_name: No. 4 Bond Maintenance™ Shampoo
product_review: I’ve got some pros and cons, because I haven’t been convinced Olaplex is worth the price yet. Pros- A little goes a longggg way. I’ve been guilty of thinking I need more than I do and end up with all the suds. Definitely seems concentrated. Cons- My hair always feels so heavy after I use it. Like I need a good cleanse.

product_name: No. 4 Bond Maintenance™ Shampoo
product_review: Very soft great for frizzy hair very moisturizing strengthens hair bought at Sephora looks like something at a hotel super strong material for this container smells minty.

product_name: No. 4 Bond Maintenance™ Shampoo
product_review: Los productos de Olaplex tienen mucho prestigio y no es por gusto, ayudan mucho a mantener un cabello sano y a que crezca fuerte. Lo ideal es usar la línea entera de productos para que sea más efectivo

product_name: No. 4 Bond Maintenance™ Shampoo
product_review: I've been using the Olaplex No. 4 Bond Maintenance Shampoo as part of my hair recovery journey. I have very non porous hair that was dull and weak, but thanks to this No 4 shampoo and it's recommended conditioner my hair has renewed it's shine and feels more nourished. I've definitely seen less breakage than usual. This shampoo is lasting me much longer than usual as well because it suds up so much. I'm only using about 1/3rd of my usual amount of shampoo and it's plenty enough. Love it, will be a staple for me.

product_name: No. 4 Bond Maintenance™ Shampoo
product_review: We’ve all heard the good and bad of olaplex, but I do believe it’s all about hair type and luckily I had a really good experience using this product!! I have stray fly always and frizz and really wanted a shampoo that not only cleanser my oily scalp but also tamed my hair a bit in process. This did exactly that! Which makes this an absolute WIN in my book!!!

product_name: No. 4 Bond Maintenance™ Shampoo
product_review: I received Olaplex Bond Maintenance No.4 Shampoo gifted by Olaplex from Skeeper in exchange for an honest review, and I just had to share my thoughts with you. I have long, straight hair that tends to get frizzy because of dryness and an oily scalp. So, taking care of my hair is one of my favorite routines. I had heard many good things about Olaplex and was excited to try it. I loved it! When I rinsed the shampoo, my hair felt so smooth and soft. It added a beautiful shine to my hair and reduced the frizz significantly. My hair looked and felt much healthier, and it smelled amazing, too! It's a bit pricey, but I think it's worth the money, especially for my long, thick hair. I'm a big fan of Olaplex shampoo and will add it to my hair care collection.

product_name: No. 4 Bond Maintenance™ Shampoo
product_review: El mejor champú Si tienes el tratamiento de Olaplex hecho este es tu champú. Me mantiene el pelo limpio con brillo y sin grasa. Tranquilamente 4 días sin lavarme el pelo y sin apariencia de suciedad. Cunde lo que cuesta porque yo solo compro dos champús al año, con poca cantidad llegas a todo el cuero cabelludo

product_name: No. 4 Bond Maintenance™ Shampoo
product_review: Shampoing qui nettoie en profondeur les cheveux et le cuir chevelu, texture plutôt épaisse, à laisser poser 5min avant de rincer, l'odeur est discrète et agréable, les ingrédients ont l'air correct je ne me suis pas trop penchée sur la composition, les cheveux ressortent propre sur ça il est efficace. Faire quand même un bon soin hydratant juste après.

product_name: No. 4 Bond Maintenance™ Shampoo
product_review: I wants to loved this but didn’t find a good benefit towards my hair- product was thick lathered nicely but ultimately seemed to dry my hair out much more than other products. I didn’t find the results to make me happy or something I’ll be purchasing often

product_name: No. 4 Bond Maintenance™ Shampoo
product_review: doesn’t leave any product stuck on my hair and makes my hair so soft! it has really helped my hair since I dye it occasionally and is the best shampoo and conditioner that I have found

product_name: No. 4 Bond Maintenance™ Shampoo
product_review: This shampoo may seem pricey, but you honestly get way more out of it than typical shampoo. My hair is just above hip length, and I only use a quarter sized amount because it lathers up so well! My hair only has a small section that’s been bleached so it’s not super damaged, but I do think it really helps smooth the bleached parts whenever it’s starting to look a little dry and frazzled! I use this shampoo every other wash and use a clarifying shampoo in between. If you have flawless hair this shampoo isn’t going to do anything for you, but it’s great if you have any damage! I also really like the scent of this product. It’s light and smells clean. The packaging is nice and simple and the texture of the shampoo is creamy smooth.

product_name: No. 4 Bond Maintenance™ Shampoo
product_review: I buy like a pro with large bottles as I work with it and my blonde hair! It really works well and restores bleached hair. soft with a pleasant smell and you only need a little of it to thoroughly wash your hair, economical to use but very effective for restoring and strengthening hair! For anyone with porous, damaged or blonde hair, I recommend it! its price is worth it

product_name: No. 4 Bond Maintenance™ Shampoo
product_review: Olaplex No. 4 shampoo is designed to restore, strengthen and moisturize hair, especially damaged or chemically treated hair. It helps restore hair health by restoring broken bonds and reducing frizz. The shampoo is known for its ability to improve hair texture, shine and manageability, and also provides gentle cleansing. Its formula is sulfate-free, paraben-free and vegan-friendly, making it suitable for a wide range of hair types. The result of manageable hair is noticeable after the first use.

product_name: No. 4 Bond Maintenance™ Shampoo
product_review: OLAPLEX No 4 Bond Maintenance 100ml shampoo is an excellent choice for colored and bleached hair. It effectively cleanses the roots without drying out the length and is economical to use. A major plus is its good lather, making the hair care process more enjoyable. I recommend it for those seeking quality hair care after coloring and bleaching. The packaging is convenient and sturdy, yet easy to squeeze for product dosing. The cost corresponds to its quality, as this volume lasts for several months when using the shampoo 3-4 times a week. The scent is pleasant and not overpowering, creating an enjoyable experience without overwhelming other smells. Shampoo boasts a luxurious texture that glides smoothly onto the hair, providing a rich lather for a thorough cleanse. Despite its rich consistency, it rinses off easily, leaving the hair feeling refreshed and revitalized.

product_name: No. 4 Bond Maintenance™ Shampoo
product_review: As someone who has struggled with dry, damaged hair for years, discovering Olaplex No.4 Shampoo has been nothing short of a game-changer. From the first wash, I could feel the difference in my hair texture, and after consistent use, the results have been truly remarkable. First and foremost, let's talk about the formula. Olaplex's patented Bond Building technology sets it apart from any other shampoo on the market. This revolutionary formula not only cleanses the hair but also repairs and strengthens each strand from within. My hair feels noticeably healthier, smoother, and more resilient after just a few uses. Another standout feature is its ability to protect color-treated hair. As someone who regularly dyes their hair, finding a shampoo that preserves color while simultaneously nourishing and repairing is like hitting the jackpot. With Olaplex No.4, my color looks vibrant and lasts longer than ever before. Furthermore, the shampoo lathers beautifully, providing a luxurious and indulgent shower experience. Despite its powerful reparative properties, it doesn't weigh my hair down or leave any residue. Instead, it leaves my locks feeling clean, soft, and incredibly manageable. I also appreciate that it's free from sulfates, parabens, and other harsh chemicals, making it suitable for all hair types, including those with sensitive scalps. Knowing that I'm using a product that prioritizes the health and integrity of my hair gives me peace of mind. In terms of scent, Olaplex No.4 has a subtle and pleasant fragrance that lingers throughout the day without being overpowering. It's the perfect balance of freshness and sophistication. In conclusion, Olaplex No.4 Shampoo has exceeded all my expectations and has become an essential part of my hair care routine. If you're looking to revive and rejuvenate your hair, look no further than this transformative shampoo. Trust me, your hair will thank you!

product_name: No. 4 Bond Maintenance™ Shampoo
product_review: I have thick, straight hair and this really irritated my scalp. When I finally realized what was causing the problem I stopped using it. This was a waste of money.

product_name: No. 4 Bond Maintenance™ Shampoo
product_review: Love it so good makes my hair so soft and lovely, scent isn’t bad and texture is nice, leaves my damaged hair AMAGZIN I recommend it so much to everyone with bad hair

product_name: No. 4 Bond Maintenance™ Shampoo
product_review: This shampoo plus the No.5 conditioner are a staple in my hair routine. My hair has become much healthier and stronger after using them. I would recommend to anyone with dry and fine hair.

product_name: No. 4 Bond Maintenance™ Shampoo
product_review: Olaplex No. 4 shampoo rocks! It cleans well, makes my hair super soft! Totally recommend! Smell is clean and not super strong. Pricey, but totally worth it!

product_name: No. 4 Bond Maintenance™ Shampoo
product_review: I don't really like the shampoo. effectively washes hair. The smell is pleasant and not intrusive. The texture is very dense and difficult to apply to the hair roots. the packaging is convenient. I don’t like the quality of my hair after use - it becomes very hard and doesn’t feel natural to the touch. the price is average.

product_name: No. 4 Bond Maintenance™ Shampoo
product_review: It claims to repair strengthen and nourish all hair types. Lower part of my hair is bleached and dyed so it’s very dry. This shampoo made my hair feel very smooth afterwards when I first tried it. I’m so excited to use it in the long run and see the results!

product_name: No. 4 Bond Maintenance™ Shampoo
product_review: I was gifted this by Olaplex in exchange for an honest review. I have long, wavy hair and it has recently started to become dry. It’s slightly damaged from coloring, as well. I received this, and after the first wash my hair felt lighter and more smooth. Instantly it made my hair feel revitalized! I’ve used it a handful of times since receiving this, and there is a noticeable difference in my hair’s quality. My husband even noticed, saying it looks more healthy. I have the conditioner as well, and though they are a bit pricey, you are getting salon quality product with these. And it smells amazing! Highly recommend!

product_name: No. 4 Bond Maintenance™ Shampoo
product_review: The shampoo smells nice and creates a thick rich lather. But unfortunately for me it caused my scalp to become flaky and feel itchy. I clarify regularly so it was not product build up, I have never experienced anything like this with a hair product before. So I would try a sample before investing into this shampoo and do a little research.

product_name: No. 4 Bond Maintenance™ Shampoo
product_review: This is exactly how a luxury shampoo should be! It creates a luxuriously rich and foamy lather, accompanied by a refreshing and pleasant scent. After using it, my hair feels incredibly silky, and I can’t resist running my fingers through it. The scent is delightfully light, which I appreciate. One of the best features is that it’s sulfate-free, which is perfect for my bright red hair as it doesn’t strip away the color. I’ve also noticed a significant improvement in my hair’s overall condition. It effectively eliminates frizz and dryness, leaving my hair looking and feeling fabulous. It’s a top-notch shampoo!

product_name: No. 4 Bond Maintenance™ Shampoo
product_review: Adoro questo shampo perchè i tuoi capelli diventano molto lisci e luminosi..adatto a capelli grassi e con forfora...pulisce in profondità,già dopo 1 settimana si vede il risultato...

product_name: No. 4 Bond Maintenance™ Shampoo
product_review: ABSOLUTELY love the shampoo and conditioner! It’s a must for color treated hair. Very moisturizing, and safe. It smells great. My hair usually gets greasy after a day but I literally can go to 2-3 days without washing my hair and not feel greasy nor have to use a dry shampoo or conditioner. Super cute packaging too

product_name: No. 4 Bond Maintenance™ Shampoo
product_review: I feel like this product does not clean at all. I also think it is too thick and leaves my hair greasy, not clean at all. I do think it strengthen my hair a little bit, but I also want my shampoos to clean my hair. I also think it is too expensive for what it does.

product_name: No. 4 Bond Maintenance™ Shampoo
product_review: Really enjoyed using olaplex shampoo. I felt it made my hair softer, easier to brush through and stronger due to the bonding technology they use.

product_name: No. 4 Bond Maintenance™ Shampoo
product_review: I happen to try out at a hotel, I loved it so much I purchased the full size one. Definitely worth the cost, I feel my hair is healthier looking and has strengthened it as well from the damage of coloring it.

product_name: No. 4 Bond Maintenance™ Shampoo
product_review: Wow this shampoo is by far my favorite! It’s like liquid gold! It leaves my hair so cleaner and scalp shiny. It is more expensive at $30 8.5oz but works! Most shampoos I need to wash every day or other. I can shampoo every 3 days. By far my favorite!!!

product_name: No. 4 Bond Maintenance™ Shampoo
product_review: This shampoo really works well clean my hairs without drying. After washing my hairs with this shampoo my hairs feels becomes so shiny and healthier. I love their conditioner as well. Love it

product_name: No. 4 Bond Maintenance™ Shampoo
product_review: To my surprise Olaplex Nº.4 is probably the best shampoos I've ever tried. I use it daily and it leaves my hair feeling soft and silky. It's worth the price.

product_name: No. 4 Bond Maintenance™ Shampoo
product_review: Olaplex shampoo has been a game-changer for my hair. It's the first shampoo that has truly worked wonders. Despite the higher price, it's worth every penny. I can now go several days between washes, allowing my hair to maintain its natural oils and moisture. Olaplex has repaired and strengthened my hair, making it healthier and more manageable. It's an essential part of my routine and I highly recommend it to anyone facing similar hair concerns.

product_name: No. 4 Bond Maintenance™ Shampoo
product_review: It took me a while to finish this product because you only nees a lil bit at the time. The product has good smell and good lather. Cleans well. Will not repurchase due to lawsuit. I don't want my hair to fall out because if it.

product_name: No. 4 Bond Maintenance™ Shampoo
product_review: This shampoo and conditioner is okay, I purchased it from the salon awhile back. I've seen lots of people talk about this shampoo and some say good things and some negative, but it's all on how it's used.. its not meant to be used as an every day shampoo. But everyone's hair type is different and some people could probably get away with using it every day or at every hair washing day, and for some it might be to harsh it all just depends. For me personally I've never experienced any negative things about this shampoo. The only thing is that it doesn't lather very much and I've tried massaging it in my palms first before massaging it onto my scalp and hair. If you use it correctly and what's it meant for it can be a great product to have. The conditioner is like any other, nothing spectacular and keeps my ends moisturized enough

product_name: No. 4 Bond Maintenance™ Shampoo
product_review: I have the purple shampoo of this one but i can’t find that on here. this leaves my hair feeling so smooth and clean. I love this and will definitely be repurchasing

product_name: No. 4 Bond Maintenance™ Shampoo
product_review: I have been using this shampoo for about a year now. I love how good it lathers and yes, it is pricey, but a little goes a long way. I will say that I have NOT seen any results in the strength or repair of my hair. I would think after a year of use I would see some kind of change.

product_name: No. 4 Bond Maintenance™ Shampoo
product_review: I got this because my hairstylist recommended it get it after I did my hair a lava girl pink. Although the scent is amazing I do feel it is overrated and overpriced for the shampoo. I don’t feel like it made any difference just like my other shampoos I’ve tried.

product_name: No. 4 Bond Maintenance™ Shampoo
product_review: I don't recommend this hair product at all. My stepmother uses it a lot, but on blonde hair, I don't recommend it very much with black hair better use other brands

product_name: No. 4 Bond Maintenance™ Shampoo
product_review: Favorite shampoo. Wouldn’t buy anything else. I’ve been using the whole Olaplex system and I’ve been noticing my split ends are overall going away.

product_name: No. 4 Bond Maintenance™ Shampoo
product_review: The complete restoration for my dry and damaged hair, I have heat damaged hair and this product is great for helping to add nourishment and shine

product_name: No. 4 Bond Maintenance™ Shampoo
product_review: Olaplex shampoo is great to treat damaged hair. Since the ingredients in both the Olaplex shampoo and conditioner are so stronger, your really only need to do your hair washing every 1-1/2 weeks farther apart.

product_name: No. 4 Bond Maintenance™ Shampoo
product_review: I use this shampoo and it has really done wonders on my previously damaged hair. I had it bleached many times over the years and this is what has helped it grow and bring back my natural hair!

product_name: No. 4 Bond Maintenance™ Shampoo
product_review: I do not like this shampoo. I have long, thick and colored hair and this shampoo dried out my hair. Like my hair felt 'hard'. No, this is not for me while I love the other olaplex products.

product_name: No. 4 Bond Maintenance™ Shampoo
product_review: Visually, the hair is more shiny, dense. Seal is felt at the roots of the hair, and along the length. The protruding hair is smoothed along the length. But is it worth paying more? In my opinion, no. As such, I did not notice hair restoration. Perhaps my hair is not damaged enough, and on a long-term blond, the difference would be obvious. But for myself, it’s better to buy shampoo cheaper, if there is no difference, then why overpay?

product_name: No. 4 Bond Maintenance™ Shampoo
product_review: This shampoo is decent but I don’t think I would repurchase. It lathers well and has a light floral scent, however I find that I need to wash my hair every ~2 days after washing with this. I prefer a stronger shampoo.

product_name: Head & Shoulders Dry Scalp Care with Almond Oil Anti-Dandruff 2-in-1
product_review: Perfect for the winter when you are struggling with dry scalp. The scent of this is amazing too! It doesn’t smell like your traditional dandruff shampoo which I like

product_name: Head & Shoulders Dry Scalp Care with Almond Oil Anti-Dandruff 2-in-1
product_review: My husband uses this daily, & I tend to sneak it in at least once a week to try to keep any flakes away. It really works, & I love the almond scent. Sometimes, the tried and true products are just what you need.

product_name: Head & Shoulders Dry Scalp Care with Almond Oil Anti-Dandruff 2-in-1
product_review: Does a great job soothing my scalp, I have a severely dry scalp and lots of dandruff and this product has been one of the most effective things I have tried!

product_name: Head & Shoulders Dry Scalp Care with Almond Oil Anti-Dandruff 2-in-1
product_review: Smells good & leaves hair feeling clean! If my hair is feeling dirty or build up on it I use this and it does the job great. The price is very affordable! I don’t use it all the time but here and there for a deeper clean.

product_name: Head & Shoulders Dry Scalp Care with Almond Oil Anti-Dandruff 2-in-1

product_name: Head & Shoulders Dry Scalp Care with Almond Oil Anti-Dandruff 2-in-1
product_review: My daughter had a dry scalp , I bought Head & Shoulder for her . After few days , it’s got better , I like the smell almond , soft and fresh , she still keep using .

product_name: Head & Shoulders Dry Scalp Care with Almond Oil Anti-Dandruff 2-in-1
product_review: smells so so good!!! super cheap, and makes my hair soft as hell. super effective, but packaging is bland. i would definitely buy again. i heard products in this aren’t great though for the hair

product_name: Head & Shoulders Dry Scalp Care with Almond Oil Anti-Dandruff 2-in-1
product_review: My husband and I really like this shampoo, it helps clean and doesn't dry our hair, it smells very good and lasts a long time. The price is also just right to buy!

product_name: Head & Shoulders Dry Scalp Care with Almond Oil Anti-Dandruff 2-in-1
product_review: This product’s effectiveness is phenomenal for all hair textures. The packaging is simple and easy to read. The scent is great for a product that does more.

product_name: Head & Shoulders Dry Scalp Care with Almond Oil Anti-Dandruff 2-in-1
product_review: Help keep scalp and hair hydrated with the addition of the almond oil! Perfect all in one product for a everyday dandruff shampoo! Great value for the price!

product_name: Head & Shoulders Dry Scalp Care with Almond Oil Anti-Dandruff 2-in-1
product_review: Excellent product that convinces. There is no need to pay extra for hair conditioner. It has a variety of scents. I personally prefer almond oil and aloe vera. We have other scents on the shelves for other family members to try.

product_name: Head & Shoulders Dry Scalp Care with Almond Oil Anti-Dandruff 2-in-1
product_review: This shampoo did great when my hair was so dry. The dandruff and dryness went away after just a few uses. I continued to use it until the bottle was gone. It saved my hair.

product_name: Head & Shoulders Dry Scalp Care with Almond Oil Anti-Dandruff 2-in-1
product_review: I like the smell. This product cleans your scalp really well, but somebody has oily scalp and might not like this product because it takes your hair dry and clean in a few days

product_name: Head & Shoulders Dry Scalp Care with Almond Oil Anti-Dandruff 2-in-1
product_review: I used to have bad problems with dandruff. I started using head and shoulders dry scalp care and haven’t had an issue since. product_name: Head & Shoulders Dry Scalp Care with Almond Oil Anti-Dandruff 2-in-1
product_review: I like the scent and the feel of my hair after using this product. My dandruff issue improved initially but returned to how it was before after a period of time using this product.

product_name: Head & Shoulders Dry Scalp Care with Almond Oil Anti-Dandruff 2-in-1
product_review: great 2 in 1 shampoo works great for all hair types smells amazing and contains almond oil good value for money compared to other brands definitely helps dry scalp

product_name: Head & Shoulders Dry Scalp Care with Almond Oil Anti-Dandruff 2-in-1
product_review: This has helped me so much with dandruff. It’s very effective! The texture after using it is soft and the packaging is good for using easier. It’s also very adorable.

product_name: Head & Shoulders Dry Scalp Care with Almond Oil Anti-Dandruff 2-in-1
product_review: I have been using this almond oil shampoo as well as the conditioner for awhile now. I really the scent and how my hair feels after using it. No dry scalp.

product_name: Head & Shoulders Dry Scalp Care with Almond Oil Anti-Dandruff 2-in-1
product_review: This Head & Shoulders product is highly effective and comfortable to use. The type I use, in addition to almond oil, also has aloe vera, which makes my hair softer and smoother. It has a mild, non-sticky scent and effectively reduces dandruff, itchy scalp, and strengthens hair with repeated use. The shampoo foams abundantly, providing a deep and thorough cleanse. Having tried various shampoos with different ingredients, this is the one I prefer the most. I tried using a smaller capacity bottle, and I really liked it so I bought the larger capacity product. I highly recommend everyone to try this excellent product.

product_name: Head & Shoulders Dry Scalp Care with Almond Oil Anti-Dandruff 2-in-1
product_review: Ein Abschied von Schuppen mit dem Head & Shoulders Apple Fresh 2in1 Shampoo. product_review: Head shoulders is a really good brand. Definitely helps dry scalp and is medicated. Many different kind some with sent in some without highly recommend.

product_name: Head & Shoulders Dry Scalp Care with Almond Oil Anti-Dandruff 2-in-1
product_review: As someone who struggles with dermatitis, this has helped my scalp tremendously. It feels rejuvenated EVERYTIME. I start with this and then also go back and use my other products!

product_name: Head & Shoulders Dry Scalp Care with Almond Oil Anti-Dandruff 2-in-1
product_review: I am a big fan of head and shoulders. I've been using head and shoulders since forever, and I love it. The almond scent it just right and give a fresh scent. It does control dandruff pretty well.

product_name: Head & Shoulders Dry Scalp Care with Almond Oil Anti-Dandruff 2-in-1
product_review: I dont usually use shampoos that say 2 ( or 5-1 ) but i got it at a discounted price. I suffer from seborrheic dermatitis which makes my head itchy and flaky. I used for two weeks and it didnt do much honestly. Im sticking to nizoral. It smells good tho

product_name: Head & Shoulders Dry Scalp Care with Almond Oil Anti-Dandruff 2-in-1
product_review: Head and Shoulders dry scalp care is a great option for anyone who is suffering from dry scalp or dandruff. Basic product, great scent and not too expensive!

product_name: Head & Shoulders Dry Scalp Care with Almond Oil Anti-Dandruff 2-in-1
product_review: I love the smell of the product. It smells amazing, and it gets the job done when it comes to dry scalp and dandruff. It’s also quite convenient since it’s 2 in 1 for a great price.

product_name: Head & Shoulders Dry Scalp Care with Almond Oil Anti-Dandruff 2-in-1
product_review: Great shampoo, helps keep the scalp clean and free of dandruff. If you have a problem with oily hair, this shampoo will certainly help you. Used and approved!

product_name: Head & Shoulders Dry Scalp Care with Almond Oil Anti-Dandruff 2-in-1

product_name: Head & Shoulders Dry Scalp Care with Almond Oil Anti-Dandruff 2-in-1
product_review: The scent of this shampoo is so nice and long lasting. My scalp seems so much better only after two uses. The packaging is very simple and easy to use and doesn’t leak.

product_name: Head & Shoulders Dry Scalp Care with Almond Oil Anti-Dandruff 2-in-1

product_name: Head & Shoulders Dry Scalp Care with Almond Oil Anti-Dandruff 2-in-1
product_review: I like this product because I can get bad dandruff and a bad flaky scalp. The active ingredient in this product really helps maintain the flakiness and helps my scalp.

product_name: Head & Shoulders Dry Scalp Care with Almond Oil Anti-Dandruff 2-in-1
product_review: Honestly, I didn’t use this product a lot. I really don’t think the twin ones were that well and that’s why I like to you separately. It was nice but I just prefer to use these products separately.

product_name: Head & Shoulders Dry Scalp Care with Almond Oil Anti-Dandruff 2-in-1
product_review: After about 2 shampoos my dry scalp and flaking from oils improves. It leaves my hair soft and manageable and itch/flake free. Highly reccommend.

product_name: Head & Shoulders Dry Scalp Care with Almond Oil Anti-Dandruff 2-in-1
product_review: Does exactly what it’s expected to, clear up dandruff. I’ve been using it for years and haven’t even thought about it for most of the time. It won’t help you if you don’t consistently use it.

product_name: Head & Shoulders Dry Scalp Care with Almond Oil Anti-Dandruff 2-in-1
product_review: Ive suffered from dandruff for the last 2 years. Ive tried multiple different shampoos from budget friendly to expensive but somehow i keep going back to this one. I really enjoy this scent out of all of them.

product_name: Head & Shoulders Dry Scalp Care with Almond Oil Anti-Dandruff 2-in-1
product_review: I have a dry scalp and if I only wash once a week, it does build up with dandruff. This shampoo really helped! It works very well for me and I recommend it! If you have dandruff, use this!

product_name: Head & Shoulders Dry Scalp Care with Almond Oil Anti-Dandruff 2-in-1
product_review: I'm using this shampoo senice I was a kid I don't have dandruff my hair feel shiny and soft my whole family us this shampoo and didn't try other flavors but love too.

product_name: Head & Shoulders Dry Scalp Care with Almond Oil Anti-Dandruff 2-in-1
product_review: I love this brand it's my favorite!! My favorite it's the classic shampoo,but try this twice and i also like it. Clean my dandruff really good...

product_review: [product:jamaican-black-castor-oil-bentonite-clay-shampoo-bar] ￼is one of my favorite things I’ve come across. I use it on my pits, legs and elsewhere to get a smooth, close and moisturized shave. 🪒 I did try this one time as a shampoo like it’s marketed and it left my hair feeling how you’d think a bar shampoo would feel. Dry and stripped. This may be a great eco friendly option for bathing while camping or backpacking or staying out in the woods for any reason and having to bathe. It does make it feel clean but a weird film on top of the hair. That’s not at all how this feels on the skin while shaving though. I’m not sure that this is something I’ll continue buying as a shave bar but it does last a while so if it’s on sale sometime at Ulta again then I may buy it again.

product_review: Leaves the hair very dry. It looks like you were washing your hair with detergent because it’s too heavy for the hair, I don’t recommend it. The packaging is fine, it smells like coconut, and it’s very economical. It has coconut in the ingredients.

product_name: Suave® Naturals Tropical Coconut Shampoo
product_review: Definitely love the scent. It’s cleans my scalp and helps remove oils easy. Love the packaging. Nothing too fancy but works great. The price range for this brand is very affordable

product_name: Suave® Naturals Tropical Coconut Shampoo
product_review: Package was nice. Great product. This shampoo is great and very effective. The price is good too. The ingredients are okay. It leave a refreshing scent.

product_name: Suave® Naturals Tropical Coconut Shampoo
product_review: Infused with Coconut Extract and vitamin E, this delightfully scented shampoo gently cleanses and nourishes your hair. Remove product build up and residue from your hair without drying it out. Hair feels refreshed and revitalized without feeling stripped of its existing, natural moisture. You'll love the way this shampoo for dry hair enhances your hair's natural beauty. You obtain the best results possible from this coconut shampoo with its exquisite scent of fresh coconut, tantalizing pineapple, and plush vanilla as you nourish your hair with an infusion that includes Coconut Extract and softening vitamin E. The Suave Essentials shampoo hair care range has a variety of options to suit everyone.

product_name: Suave® Naturals Tropical Coconut Shampoo
product_review: I used to use this all the time until I recently developed seborrheic dermatitis on my scalp - sadly I had to switch to a harsher, less pleasant fragranced shampoo. I really miss the tropical coconut and soft hair 🥰

product_name: Suave® Naturals Tropical Coconut Shampoo
product_review: Great shampoo. Very effective. Packaged great. Easy to use. Very good shampoo for the price. Great ingredients. Leaves a very pleasant scent.

product_name: Suave® Naturals Tropical Coconut Shampoo
product_review: I really like Suave Coconut Shampoo. It is easy to lather, easy to rinse and leaves my hair feeling fresh and clean. It smells great, reminds me of summer.

product_name: Suave® Naturals Tropical Coconut Shampoo

product_name: Suave® Naturals Tropical Coconut Shampoo
product_review: on the cheaper side, don’t rlly like it. but it’s effective for last minute needs. I bought on vacation cus I needed a cheap alternative to my usual stuff and it was watery but my hair felt clean and no oils after. Smells good.

product_name: Suave® Naturals Tropical Coconut Shampoo

product_name: Suave® Naturals Tropical Coconut Shampoo

product_name: Suave® Naturals Tropical Coconut Shampoo
product_review: Es un producto muy bueno para el bienestar del cabello, mi cabello simplemente lo amo al igual que yo, deja un agradable olor en el cabello que perdura y tiene muy buena densidad, es un buen producto tanto para pelo rizo como para pelo lacio; lo recomiendo sin lugar a dudas.

product_name: Suave® Naturals Tropical Coconut Shampoo
product_review: I can't stand the taste of coconut. It's stringy and weird and I've never found it appealing. That said, I love the smell of artificial coconut. Absolutely cannot get enough of it. When it came time then to buy some new shampoo, wouldn't you know, I bought the coconut smell because that's what I like. The shampoo seemingly works (I haven't developed any odd rashes, noticed my hair to be any more dry/oily or any other real changes) and I think Suave did a nice job with making the coconut smell sweet but not overbearing. Seeing as how I really like the scent, I'd probably continue to buy it again and again and again. I like it

product_name: Suave® Naturals Tropical Coconut Shampoo
product_review: ES SUAVE pero es lo mismo.que he estado opinando de otros champoo que he utilizado se te encrespa mucho pero el olor engaña huele bien pero la increspaciosn es inevitable.

product_name: Suave® Naturals Tropical Coconut Shampoo
product_review: This smells amazing, and it feels silky in the hair, but overall, you get what you pay for. As someone who has used a lot of heavy products in my hair, this one doesn't do anything but merely clean it and smell nice. If you have pretty healthy hair and just need a quick clean, this is great! If you've done any damage to your hair, spend the money for a heavy duty shampoo.

product_name: Suave® Naturals Tropical Coconut Shampoo
product_review: Great smelling conditioner thick lather that leaves your hair smooth and manageable. I would absolutelyrecommend for anyone with dry hard to manage hair.

product_name: Suave® Naturals Tropical Coconut Shampoo
product_review: Basic shampoo. Doesn’t help with anything but cleaning. The coconut smell is nice if you like coconut, the price is affordable. Good shampoo to have in a spare bathroom or air bnb if you’re on a budget.

product_name: Suave® Naturals Tropical Coconut Shampoo

product_name: Suave® Naturals Tropical Coconut Shampoo

product_name: Suave® Naturals Tropical Coconut Shampoo

product_name: Suave® Naturals Tropical Coconut Shampoo
