product_name: OGX Extra Strength Hydrate + Repair Argan Oil of Morocco Shampoo
product_review: I've been using the OGX Argan Oil and Morocco Shampoo for several weeks now, and I'm thrilled with the results. This shampoo not only smells amazing but also leaves my hair feeling incredibly soft and manageable. The argan oil in the formula adds a beautiful shine to my hair, and it has helped to reduce frizz significantly. I also appreciate that it's sulfate-free, which is gentle on my color-treated hair. Overall, it's become a staple in my haircare routine, and I highly recommend it to anyone looking for a quality shampoo that nourishes and revitalizes their hair

product_name: OGX Extra Strength Hydrate + Repair Argan Oil of Morocco Shampoo
product_review: It smells great, but the product itself didn’t do much for my hair. OGX shampoos are a mixed bag for me. On the positive side, they come in an array of delightful scents that make shower time enjoyable. They also offer a variety of formulations for different hair types and concerns, which is great for customization. However, I've found that their effectiveness varies. While some OGX shampoos leave my hair feeling clean and manageable, others seem to leave a residue or don't address specific hair issues as well as I'd hoped. It's a bit hit or miss in terms of performance. Overall, OGX shampoos are decent for the price, especially if you find a formula that suits your hair type, but it might take some trial and error to find the perfect match. I'd rate them as a 3 out of 5 for their affordability and fragrance variety, but inconsistency in performance keeps them from a higher rating.

product_name: OGX Extra Strength Hydrate + Repair Argan Oil of Morocco Shampoo
product_review: With these products, my hair does amazing, as long as it's deep conditioning. The bottles arent that big for the price. It always surprises me, the "healthier" "more all natural" the ingredients are, the more expensive. I had to stop buying this brand bc of the prices and how little the bottles were. And my girls even used the curl shampoo and conditioner

product_name: OGX Extra Strength Hydrate + Repair Argan Oil of Morocco Shampoo

product_name: OGX Extra Strength Hydrate + Repair Argan Oil of Morocco Shampoo

I have sensitive skin which is prone to flare ups and have had no trouble at all with this finishing powder. I will definitely be buying this again. Highly recommend! This is my own honest, unbiased review and I am not affiliated with the seller or the product in anyway. Hope this review helps, feel free to ask questions! :)

product_review: It’s so good and it smells just like summer!!! I used the conditioner as well and it was just amazing! It made my hair silky smooth. It’s 100% worth it , especially if you love the smell of coconut! It reminds me of the beach.

product_name: Garnier Smoothing Shampoo with Coconut Oil & Cocoa Butter Extracts
product_review: I used this for a while and I didn’t have any problems with it. Very nourishing and has a nice smell. Good value and would last me a long time. Decent product

product_name: Garnier Smoothing Shampoo with Coconut Oil & Cocoa Butter Extracts
product_review: Garnier Whole Blends Coconut Water & Vanilla Milk Shampoo is praised for its pleasant coconut-vanilla scent and ability to hydrate and smooth normal to dry hair. It's paraben-free, affordable, and offers good value for money, although it may not be ideal for very oily hair.

product_name: Garnier Smoothing Shampoo with Coconut Oil & Cocoa Butter Extracts
product_review: Even in a hard water area it's easy to get a good lather with this shampoo. Smells good and leaves my hair clean after a single wash. A decent consistency aswell, hate runny shampoos! A recyclable bottle and no paper packaging so easy to clean and pop in the recycling bin. Well priced and does the job. Have used this for some time and I have no reason to change

product_name: Garnier Smoothing Shampoo with Coconut Oil & Cocoa Butter Extracts
product_review: The scent is a little bit fake.. but its really smoothing for your hair. It has lots of oil so it leaves your hair shiny and hydrated. I recommend for curly hair.

product_name: Garnier Smoothing Shampoo with Coconut Oil & Cocoa Butter Extracts
product_review: I've tried various versions of this shampoo and I love them all , this smells beautiful and leaves hair soft , shiny and smelling wonderful. Lathered well and was worth the price .

product_name: Garnier Smoothing Shampoo with Coconut Oil & Cocoa Butter Extracts
product_review: I really enjoyed using this shampoo for my curly hair. I loved the fragrance and the price. However this product became so hard to find which resulted in me switching.

product_name: Garnier Smoothing Shampoo with Coconut Oil & Cocoa Butter Extracts
product_review: I love the whole blends line and honey one but this coconut one is top tier as well. I love the coconut scent and the shampoo itself is great. Always leaves my hair soft and nourished feeling.

product_name: Garnier Smoothing Shampoo with Coconut Oil & Cocoa Butter Extracts
product_review: i’ve used this product for about a year now and my hair haven’t been dry or oily in any way and i’ve struggled with oily and dry hair before. the smell is very strong and i’m always getting compliments because of it. the bottle is very regular to others bottles lol. but over all 9.8/10

product_name: Garnier Smoothing Shampoo with Coconut Oil & Cocoa Butter Extracts
product_review: Muy nutritivo. Tengo el pelo seco y este champú me ha ayudado bastante. Sobretodo, gracias a su aceite de coco. Tiene un precio muy competitivo. Es un básico para pelo dañado o rizado

product_name: Garnier Smoothing Shampoo with Coconut Oil & Cocoa Butter Extracts
product_review: Out of all the garnier shampoos, I feel like this one actually moisturized my hair the best, smelled the best, and was worth the price. I would happily buy this again.

product_name: Garnier Smoothing Shampoo with Coconut Oil & Cocoa Butter Extracts
product_review: Un shampoing qui rend les cheveux extra doux ! Le produit est agréable à appliquer, la crème est douce et la mousse est soyeuse il sent superbement bon la coco ! Les cheveux sont lisses et doux !

product_name: Garnier Smoothing Shampoo with Coconut Oil & Cocoa Butter Extracts
product_review: Ho utilizzato questo prodotto per molti mesi e devo un buon Shampoo soprattutto perché i capelli scuri. Mi piace la profumazione e la sua delicatezza. A ho deciso poi di cambiarlo perché volevo provare delle fragranze più fruttate in vista dell’estate ma devo dire che questo è un validissimo prodotto.

product_name: Garnier Smoothing Shampoo with Coconut Oil & Cocoa Butter Extracts
product_review: The smell and lather of this product are amazing! The amount of product you get is well worth the price! Cute and modern packaging is also a plus!! My hair is definitely less frizzy!

product_name: Garnier Smoothing Shampoo with Coconut Oil & Cocoa Butter Extracts
product_review: Buon prodotto per i capelli. Consigliato Lascia i miei capelli morbidi e profumati. Buon rapporto qualità prezzo. Packaging semplice. Lo consiglio!

product_name: Garnier Smoothing Shampoo with Coconut Oil & Cocoa Butter Extracts
product_review: El champú es de excelente calidad, el bonito embalaje es cómodo de sostener en las manos. Indicado para cuero cabelludo sensible. El cabello queda suave, manejable e hidratado. Composición segura rica en aceites naturales.

product_name: Garnier Smoothing Shampoo with Coconut Oil & Cocoa Butter Extracts
product_review: Uno shampoo che ha un odore pazzesco riesce a la lasciare sia il profumo che i capelli lisci fino a 3 giorni molto delicato davvero stupendo il mio preferito

product_name: Garnier Smoothing Shampoo with Coconut Oil & Cocoa Butter Extracts
product_review: having curly hair I struggle a lot with frizzy hair and this shampoo does wonders, since i started using it the frizz vanished and my hair never smelled better, the coconut scent is strong and gentle, the packaging is really nice representing the coconut, abd the texture of the shampoo is perfect extremely gentle on hands and hair. I recommend this product fully as its worth way more then your frizzy hair

product_name: Garnier Smoothing Shampoo with Coconut Oil & Cocoa Butter Extracts
product_review: this is one of my favorite drugstore shampoos ever. first off, it smells SO nice - like a coconut tropical vacation. it lathers really nicely and cleans my hair well. it’s not too expensive and i like that it has a pump. overall im just super impressed by whole blends and how good their stuff is. i definitely recommend this shampoo!!!

product_name: Garnier Smoothing Shampoo with Coconut Oil & Cocoa Butter Extracts
product_review: I really love the scent of this shampoo it made my hair super soft, as my hairs frizzy, I find that you have to shop around for the best value price as it can vary from price to price, you get a decent amount of value from the bottle,

product_name: Garnier Smoothing Shampoo with Coconut Oil & Cocoa Butter Extracts
product_review: Scent smells absolutely amazing and effectiveness is insane the packaging is also cool and attractive if seen in a shop the texture is thick an don’t need a lot foams up in the hair very well. Good value for money

product_name: Garnier Smoothing Shampoo with Coconut Oil & Cocoa Butter Extracts
product_review: Il garnier smoothing shampoo with coconut oil &cocoa butter e buonissimo lo uso sempre e i miei capelli profumano sempre di cocco lo adoro 💕💕💕

product_name: Garnier Smoothing Shampoo with Coconut Oil & Cocoa Butter Extracts
product_review: Tiene un olor riquísimo y le va muy bien a la textura de mi cabello lo deja súper suave, siento que es muy efectivo y su envase en muy práctica para poner en el ducha.

product_name: Garnier Smoothing Shampoo with Coconut Oil & Cocoa Butter Extracts
product_review: Effectiveness: The Garnier Repairing Shampoo Honey Treasures is super effective at nourishing and repairing damaged hair. It helps to strengthen and revitalize hair, leaving it feeling soft, smooth, and healthier with continued use. Scent: This shampoo has a delightful honey-infused scent that is sweet and refreshing. It leaves a lovely fragrance on the hair that lasts throughout the day, making it a pleasant experience every time you wash your hair. Packaging: The packaging of the Garnier Repairing Shampoo Honey Treasures is practical and convenient. The bottle design is easy to use in the shower, and the flip cap allows for effortless dispensing of the product. It's user-friendly and ideal for everyday use. Ingredients: This shampoo is enriched with natural ingredients like honey and propolis extract, known for their nourishing and repairing properties. These ingredients help to moisturize and strengthen the hair, promoting healthier-looking locks. Price: In terms of price, the Garnier Repairing Shampoo Honey Treasures offers great value for its quality. It is an affordable option compared to other repairing shampoos on the market, making it a budget-friendly choice for those looking to improve the condition of their hair without spending a fortune.

product_name: Garnier Smoothing Shampoo with Coconut Oil & Cocoa Butter Extracts
product_review: It smells really nice just like coconut and cocoa butter. Cleanse well and lathers up great. Make hair clean and refreshed after each wash. But I also experienced a hair loss while using this shampoo.

product_name: Garnier Smoothing Shampoo with Coconut Oil & Cocoa Butter Extracts
product_review: This scent is SO GOOD! Perfect for the clean coconut & vanilla lovers. Moisturizes your hair super nice! And the big bottle lasts a long time! Try it out

product_name: Garnier Smoothing Shampoo with Coconut Oil & Cocoa Butter Extracts
product_review: Love the whole blends shampoo and conditioner leaves your hair clean and shiney and love the coconut smells my coworkers can still smell it hours later

product_name: Garnier Smoothing Shampoo with Coconut Oil & Cocoa Butter Extracts
product_review: Love how it makes my hair feel and smell. It has really tamed a lot of the frizz. My hair hasn't been nearly as frizzy since I started using it. And the coconut smell is a bonus

product_name: Garnier Smoothing Shampoo with Coconut Oil & Cocoa Butter Extracts
product_review: Adoro provare diversi shampoo ma Garnier lo adoro! La profumazione è spettacolare, idrata i miei capelli e li rende morbidi. Lascia un effetto morbido e texture sana! I risultati sono soddisfacenti e rendono il mio animo appagato, sereno e solare.

product_name: Garnier Smoothing Shampoo with Coconut Oil & Cocoa Butter Extracts
product_review: Made my hair feel really soft I have dry hair usually. Worth the money, match with the hair mask and conditioner aswell for a, better softer look.

product_name: Garnier Smoothing Shampoo with Coconut Oil & Cocoa Butter Extracts
product_review: Excellent shampoo, leaves your heart very hydrated, this is my first time using this shampoo and won’t be the last. I have curly hair after a lot of chemicals process is hard to find a good shampoo but this one is a game changer.

product_name: Garnier Smoothing Shampoo with Coconut Oil & Cocoa Butter Extracts
product_review: It’s been a while since I have had this, BUT I ABSOLUTELY LOVE IT!! I have dry, thick, wavy hair, so it works nicely for me! It smells amazing, and the price is good for the quality of the product!

product_name: Garnier Smoothing Shampoo with Coconut Oil & Cocoa Butter Extracts
product_review: The shampoo does it’s job, not anything extraordinary. The smell is very pleasant I’m a fan of coconut smelling hair products so it was right in my alley. It made my hair soft. It’s a little hard to lather at first but once you get it worked in it’s fine but it’s a good value for its price. I would possibly buy again.

product_name: Garnier Smoothing Shampoo with Coconut Oil & Cocoa Butter Extracts
product_review: This is my all time favorite. I will choose it over and over. It’s such a great match for leaving my hair clean, soft, and smelling absolutely wonderful.

product_name: Garnier Smoothing Shampoo with Coconut Oil & Cocoa Butter Extracts
product_review: I love this Product. Infused with Coconut Oil and Cocoa butter. Leaves hair smelling great . Smooths and Controls frizzy hair. 100% Recycled Plastic. Great Product.

product_name: Garnier Smoothing Shampoo with Coconut Oil & Cocoa Butter Extracts
product_review: I am very pleased with this garnier ultimate blends smoothing shampoo with coconut oil and cocoa butter extracts . its silicone free and great shampoo for my dry and frizzy curly hair . It makes great lather with a small amount of shampoo and cleans hair really welI, smells great but its not too strong. My hair feels soft and smooth. It leaves my hair feels lovely, soft and well nourished just after 1st use, my hair looked much healthier , frizz free and the curls looked smoother and lasted for longer time.

product_name: Redken Color Extend Shampoo
product_review: LOVE this shampoo love this brand! It smells amazing! It is so smooth and works so well on your color treated hair!!! You don't need a lot at all it lathers SOOOOOo awesome on your hair! Love it!

product_name: Redken Color Extend Shampoo
product_review: Love this shampoo and conditioner duo. It smells incredible and leaves my hair manageable and soft. It keeps my hair colour vibrant. Lathers well and hair feels nice after using.

product_name: Redken Color Extend Shampoo
product_review: This product really helped with the frizziness of my hair and kept it moisturized compare to other products I have used. I would highly recommend for anyone who struggled with frizz.

product_name: Redken Color Extend Shampoo
product_review: Amazing! So great for color treated hair- smells great and you only need a little bit for a lather. This shampoo literally extends the time between hair appointments for me.

product_name: Redken Color Extend Shampoo
product_review: The shampoo has great scent . It only takes a small amount of shampoo to get a great lather. It came in a nice shaped bottle for easy handling and was at a great value.

product_name: Redken Color Extend Shampoo
product_review: I have been using this shampoo for years now and have tried other products in between and always come back. It leaves a great scent and doesn’t dry my hair our and protects my color

product_name: Redken Color Extend Shampoo
product_review: I absolutely love the color extend. Disappointed that it’s being discontinued. Smells great, my hair feels great. Price has gotten a bit much but it was always my staple.

product_name: Redken Color Extend Shampoo
product_review: Love the way this stuff smells. It worked wonders for making my color last longer, and was much more gentle on my hair than other products I tried.

product_name: Redken Color Extend Shampoo
product_review: Love the smell. Packaging is great. I love all redken products. My hair feels nice and soft. Very effective product for the price. Will definitely buy again!

product_name: Redken Color Extend Shampoo
product_review: As someone that’s has oily hair this makes hair soft and doesn’t make it oily and I don’t have to wash my hair my daily. It does hold the hair dye pretty well in your hair it doesn’t extract it that much. I really wish the way to get product would have a pump overall 10/10

product_name: Redken Color Extend Shampoo
product_review: Very good shampoo, smells amazing! Packaging is beautifully designed! Great value for money small amount goes a long way - Would definitely recommend

product_name: Redken Color Extend Shampoo
product_review: I have used this shampoo when I used to color my hair it is a great product to keep your hair shiny and color vibrant! I definitely recommend to those who regularly dye their hair:)

product_name: Redken Color Extend Shampoo
product_review: Redken’s Color Extend Shampoo is a true game-changer for anyone with color-treated hair. Since incorporating this shampoo into my hair care routine, I’ve noticed my hair color stays vibrant and fresh-looking for much longer than with any other product I’ve tried. It gently cleanses, removing impurities without stripping away the color, which is exactly what my hair needs. The formula also helps to protect against environmental aggressors and fade-inducing UV rays, ensuring my color remains bold and luminous. Additionally, it leaves my hair feeling soft, manageable, and with a beautiful shine that reflects its health. The scent is just right, not overpowering but pleasantly refreshing. It’s reassuring to know that I’m using a product specifically designed to extend the life of my hair color while also caring for my hair’s overall health. Redken Color Extend Shampoo has earned a permanent spot in my hair care regimen, and I highly recommend it to anyone looking to preserve their color-treated hair.

product_name: Redken Color Extend Shampoo
product_review: Started using this during my transition from blonde to brown (my natural hair color). Love that it’s travel size! Nice scent nothing to perfumy. I like that it doesn’t strip my hair too much of its natural oils, my hair feels light. Love Redken products.

product_name: Redken Color Extend Shampoo
product_review: It has a great smell, lasted a long time, wasn’t too expensive, and definitely extended how long my hair coloring lasted. I do wish the cap came off as to refill it rather than buying new bottles each time.

product_name: Redken Color Extend Shampoo
product_review: Absolutely fantastic shampoo, leaves your hair feeling and smelling amazing with great texture, it is more expensive but worth it. Nice packaging.

product_name: Redken Color Extend Shampoo
product_review: Redken is always a great brand with a consistent product, and their color extend line is no different. Always love the smell of their shampoos, it’s like a high end fragrance. I do think it works well and better than most to preserve color, and since I color mine red this is really important to me. Still use my Joico one more because it’s easy to grab and find at TJ Maxx but this one is good if I have Ulta points built up.

product_name: Redken Color Extend Shampoo
product_review: This is a great shampoo. It is in different packaging now. I bought this because I had just dyed my hair back to a normal color and wanted to keep that color for longer. It worked very well at that. It also smells really good. It is expensive though.

product_name: Redken Color Extend Shampoo
product_review: I have used about all of the redken products. Love everything about it. The effectiveness of the product is beyond good.the scent last until you wash it out , my hair is stronger and healthier using it.You only need a small amount

product_name: Redken Color Extend Shampoo
product_review: Used when i had vivid colors in my hair. Purples & pinks. It kept my color lasting longer than others. It smells great and is a a concentrated product. That’s always something I’m looking for.

product_name: Redken Color Extend Shampoo
product_review: I absolutely love the smell of this shampoo and equally conditioner. Definitely helped to preserve the color of my dyed hair! The price is also worth it for this.

product_name: Redken Color Extend Shampoo
product_review: Redken Color Extend Shampoo is a gentle cleanser that is specifically designed to protect color-treated hair from fading. It is formulated with a unique Color Care Complex that features cranberry oil and ceramides, which help to lock in color vibrancy and strengthen hair. The shampoo also has a pH-balanced formula that is ideal for all types of color-treated hair.

product_name: Redken Color Extend Shampoo
product_review: This product is great for color treated hair . It works well for cleaning the hair and conditioning it .the smell is a good scent. The price for this is good .

product_name: Redken Color Extend Shampoo
product_review: La marca è di per se una garanzia. Ottima fragranza, pulisce bene il cuoio capelluto ed i cappelli rimangono morbidi al tatto ed il colore bello e luminoso

product_name: Redken Color Extend Shampoo
product_review: I’ve used this product for years. My hair is colored red and super fine. It can be a struggle to retain this color. I use this product and can keep the vibrancy of my color for months. A little product goes a long way with a nice lather. Rinses clean. Smells great. Is a great value as I buy in a liter bottle and that lasts me for almost a year. I highly recommend it.

product_name: Redken Color Extend Shampoo
product_review: I really enjoyed this product. It made my hair feel soft and easy to manage. I wasn’t a fan of the strong smell though. It was a good price for what I received.

product_name: Redken Color Extend Shampoo
product_review: I love this product. It's pricey but worth it for maintaining hair color. Nice clean scent and sleek modern packaging. Really improved my hair texture.

product_name: Redken Color Extend Shampoo
product_review: Good value product, a little goes a long way. Helped my colour last longer. It had little scent which I like. Very lightweight formula that was easy to rinse out.

product_name: Redken Color Extend Shampoo
product_review: The best starter shampoo if you’re someone switching from drugstore to salon grade! Very promising results and smells great! My hair is always soft and healthy, and I wash my hair every 2-3 days.

product_name: Redken Color Extend Shampoo
product_review: Kept my auburn salon color going strong for weeks until my next appointment. Light and pleasant scent, and perfect to keep that tricky red from fading!

product_name: Redken Color Extend Shampoo
product_review: I have been using this shampoo for years after my stylist used it on me. I love everything from the scent of the shampoo to the texture. Redkin makes my hair shiny and smooth and is so easy to rinse out. Highly recommend

product_name: Redken Color Extend Shampoo
product_review: Using Redken color extend shampoo every wash in cold water helps my Color last for 3-4 months which is longer than hair stylist think color will last! It is actually recommended by professional hairstylist as well if you cannot afford salon quality products so Redken is also affordable!

product_name: Redken Color Extend Shampoo
product_review: Makes the hair beautiful and soft! Didn’t really see the effect of making the color last longer, but definitely a nice shampoo. Also adds gloss!

product_name: Redken Color Extend Shampoo
product_review: I’ve always had a great experience with redken, especially the ones for color. i get my hair bleached once every few months and this makes my hair feel soft and not so damaged!

product_name: Redken Color Extend Shampoo
product_review: I have used this hair coloring shampoo for coloured hair. It kept my hair colour longer and moisturized but does not weight my hair down. Price point is great for a salon quality shampoo. Definitely recommend.

product_name: Redken Color Extend Shampoo
product_review: Redken color extend is one of my favorite shampoos to extend my ginger colored hair. I love the smell of it and how my hair feels after washing it and using the conditioner.

product_name: Redken Color Extend Shampoo
product_review: this product is the great every wash shampoo. leaves hair feeling fresh and clean. pairs perfect with any conditioner. great for color treated hairs as well

product_name: Redken Color Extend Shampoo
product_review: Hair-transforming luxury! Nourishing, adds shine & silkiness. Restores dry, brittle hair. A must-try for soft, manageable locks. Adore the results! 💁🚿✨

product_name: Redken Color Extend Shampoo
product_review: I’ve never personally been able to afford Redken, however, my friend Skotia🌿☕️🖤 always uses this because she colour treats her hair often and you can tell this is her favourite shampoo. The smell differs a lot from other shampoos because it is clearly a salon level shampoo. I find a lot of shampoos strip your scalp, but this one didn’t and I didn’t have any fall out when I brush my hair afterwards. If you can afford Redken, I definitely recommend it, but it is quite pricey.

product_name: Redken Color Extend Shampoo
product_review: My hair stylist started me on this at her salon. This is the one I use. It seems to extend the time before I need to colour my hair again. Great shampoo and conditioner.

product_name: Redken Color Extend Shampoo
product_review: Redken has been a trusted presence in salons for many years. Their All Soft shampoo is particularly remarkable as it helps maintain the integrity of colored strands, ensuring they stay vibrant for longer. The shampoo effectively cleanses without causing any damage or stripping the color. Additionally, its pleasant and long-lasting nonoffensive fragrance enhances the overall experience. It's important to note that authentic Redken products should be purchased exclusively from reputable salons, as products sold on other online retailers may not be genuine.

product_name: Redken Color Extend Shampoo
product_review: I have a viral color in my hair (purple) and I used this shampoo. I didn’t get any kind of longevity out of my color with this shampoo compared to other brands BUT my hair did feel healthy which says a lot considering all of the bleach damage my hair has gone through. If you have a less finicky hair color or you don’t mind reupping your color regularly like I do, then this is a great option!

product_name: Redken Color Extend Shampoo
product_review: Ne ho sentito parlare, ma non lo conosco. Mi piacerebbe tanto poterlo testare per dare conseguentemente una recensione appropriata al prodotto

product_name: Redken Color Extend Shampoo
product_review: It doesn’t do as good as a job as I thought it would. There’s other red color extend shampoo and conditioners that do a-whole lot better then this product.

product_name: Redken Color Extend Shampoo
product_review: Redken has been around for years in salons. This shampoo extends the integrity of your colored strands. Cleans without stripping. It has a nice nonoffensive fragrance that lasts. Only purchase from salons! Products sold on other online retailers are not real.

product_name: Redken Color Extend Shampoo
product_review: Redken never disappoints, their products are all high quality. The 33.8oz bottles last a long time and are worth the price. When spending money on getting your hair color treated, I definitely recommend investing in this shampoo.

product_name: Redken Color Extend Shampoo
product_review: This stuff makes my color last for ages. I do fashion colors, and this in combo with cold water keeps me vibrant for months. Additionally, I LOVE the smell. It smells like I just got my hair done at the salon!

product_name: Redken Color Extend Shampoo
product_review: The brand redken is so amazing the price and the quality is amazing we use this in my salon and the clients are obsessed with it and they love it so we use it a lot

product_name: Redken Color Extend Shampoo
product_review: Redkens color extend shampoo is nothing more than mediocre in my opinion. For me, it didn’t necessarily keep the color in my hair longer. It pretty much had the same effect as using a shampoo that didn’t have conditioner.

product_name: Redken Color Extend Shampoo
product_review: I colored my hair red in February for the first time ever, I began using Biolage as it was recommended to me. Unfortunately I had to get a retouch 4-5 weeks later. I switched over to Redken and it was the best decision. I can go up to 10-12 weeks until my retouch and it leaves my hair felling soft and nourished

product_name: Biolage Ultra HydraSource Shampoo for Dry Hair
product_review: So far no complaints. I still believe it’s too soon to write a honest review but after 3 washes my hair does feel better. I do love the smell of this line!

product_name: Biolage Ultra HydraSource Shampoo for Dry Hair
product_review: I absolutely love Biolage. The lather is thick and luxurious, yet rinses very clean. The fragrance is amazing. I get compliments on how my hair smells often. This shampoo helps keep your hair well hydrated and looking healthy. The packaging is simple and recyclable. I would recommend this to anyone with dry hair.

product_name: Biolage Ultra HydraSource Shampoo for Dry Hair
product_review: This formula is paraben free and vegan with no animal derived ingredients. Hydra source , infused with aloe, helps optimize moisture balance. Hydra source shampoo gently cleanses as it quenches dry hair and attracts moisture.Suitable for color treatment hair.

product_name: Biolage Ultra HydraSource Shampoo for Dry Hair
product_review: Biolage ultra hydraSource shampoo is amazing. It smells so good and it lathers well. I wash my hair twice with this and follow with the conditioner. It works well and lasts a long time. I highly recommend this product.

product_name: Biolage Ultra HydraSource Shampoo for Dry Hair
product_review: I used this product and I really liked it. It was hydrating and felt nice on my hair. However, I did stop using this product because I decided to switch over to non-toxic products

product_name: Biolage Ultra HydraSource Shampoo for Dry Hair
product_review: I love the Hydro shampoo. The smell is amazing and the way it makes your hair so soft it lathers up so good with just a small amount of product. I have being using Biolage for several years. Just remember after a few weeks of using it is good to change up just for a week then go back is what I have always been told.

product_name: Biolage Ultra HydraSource Shampoo for Dry Hair
product_review: I loveee Biolage! This ultra HydraSource Shampoo works great with helping my dry hair and it smells soooo good! Packaging is always good too worth the buy!

product_name: Biolage Ultra HydraSource Shampoo for Dry Hair
product_review: Very good product very nurturing for the hair no problem with anything the packing is very good oh tho it will be nice if they add ah pump to even this sizes it will give ah advantages for the consumer and it will help when you in the shower the ingredients are ah help for the dry hair the sent is very pleasing

product_name: Biolage Ultra HydraSource Shampoo for Dry Hair
product_review: My hair totally transformed using this shampoo and conditioner! I have color treated hair that used to be a little dry and damaged. I’ve been using this for about 3 years and my hair is so soft and healthy even though I bleach it often.

product_name: Biolage Ultra HydraSource Shampoo for Dry Hair
product_review: Excellent price for the quality of the product. It is very effective. I no longer have dry split ends. The scent is very complemented by others which is great. I mean, who wouldn’t like to received comments about the smell of your hair. The ingredients are all the BEN’s free. Hahah. You know what I mean by that.

product_name: Biolage Ultra HydraSource Shampoo for Dry Hair
product_review: I loveeee this shampoo, it makes my hair so soft and smells so good. All ingredients are very good for your hair and the packaging is effective for getting all the shampoo out of the bottle. Pricing is a little steep but definitely worth it!

product_name: Biolage Ultra HydraSource Shampoo for Dry Hair
product_review: I started using this shampoo and condition recently after 15+ years of highlighting and dry hair. It’s completely revitalized my hair and especially helped with regroup after some postpartum hair loss. Never going back to cheap shampoo again!

product_name: Biolage Ultra HydraSource Shampoo for Dry Hair
product_review: I love using this shampoo. It has helped revive my dry damaged hair. I even started using it on my kids' hair to help restore it from the sun and chlorine from swimming often. Would recommend despite the price tag.

product_name: Biolage Ultra HydraSource Shampoo for Dry Hair
product_review: Love this shampoo! Amazing for a dry scalp! Pairs best with the conditioner and spray! It’s also great for color treated hair. …………………………………….

product_name: Biolage Ultra HydraSource Shampoo for Dry Hair
product_review: I used to love this product and used it regularly. For a while it made me feel as though my hair was more hydrated and soft; until it didn't. I am not sure what might have change. I have since switched to another brand and have no intention of going back.

product_name: Biolage Ultra HydraSource Shampoo for Dry Hair
product_review: Este shampoo tiene una textura cremosa, suave y un aroma muy rico. Es perfecto para quitar lo seco de tu cabello. No es muy económico, pero su precio lo vale.

product_name: Biolage Ultra HydraSource Shampoo for Dry Hair
product_review: Biolage Ultra HydraSource Shampoo is great for dry damaged hair. I personally found myself trying this product after having moved to a home without a water softener. It really helped keep my hair from getting to brittle and frizzy due to the damaging hard water.

product_name: Biolage Ultra HydraSource Shampoo for Dry Hair
product_review: I love the smell but I really noticed that my hair was much driver after using even though it’s a hydrating formula. I definitely wouldn’t recommend because it is a little pricey and doesn’t really do what it says it does. I’d go with a different brand.

product_name: Biolage Ultra HydraSource Shampoo for Dry Hair
product_review: my favorite shampoo and conditioner! if you get the big bottles they last forever and my hair loves them. smells good too! makes my hair so soft and shiny and strong!

product_name: Biolage Ultra HydraSource Shampoo for Dry Hair
product_review: I bought Biolage ultra hydraspur e shampoo because my hair so dry so i try with this and the result didn’t make me disaponted. Its make my hair really soft and smell good too

product_name: Biolage Ultra HydraSource Shampoo for Dry Hair
product_review: Biolage is a great shampoo. This particular formula leaves my hair soft, hydrated and smelling great. It has a spa like/clean feeling, which I love. Good price for a professional product.

product_name: Biolage Ultra HydraSource Shampoo for Dry Hair
product_review: The only shampoo and conditioner combo I will use on my hair! I bleach my hair and it is naturally dry, but this helps SO much. Not to mention it smells good!

product_name: Biolage Ultra HydraSource Shampoo for Dry Hair
product_review: My dry hair has been a problem for a long time and this shampoo really helped restore moisture. It had ingredients that truly help with dried out hair and the scent was lovely. Overall I think the price is decent for a shampoo that does it’s job.

product_name: Biolage Ultra HydraSource Shampoo for Dry Hair
product_review: Por siempre y por mucho mi shampoo favorito. A la segunda lavada ya podía notar como mi cabello se veía más hidratado y brillante. El precio lo vale definitivamente.

product_name: Biolage Ultra HydraSource Shampoo for Dry Hair
product_review: I used to use this product in high school back when my parents still paid for my hair care lol. It’s a nice product, and I do feel that you get what you pay for with hair care. It’s not my favorite but it’s a good choice!

product_name: Biolage Ultra HydraSource Shampoo for Dry Hair
product_review: I have found a daily shampoo that isn't weighing my fine hair down while leaving it nice and clean! Smell is great too. Only been using for about a week, but overall VERY HAPPY with this shampoo. So many shampoos I've tried lately just aren't cleaning my hair very well, or if they are, they're still leaving some residue where it looks like my hair is greasy. I can confidently say this shampoo hits the mark on all counts.

product_name: Biolage Ultra HydraSource Shampoo for Dry Hair
product_review: I normally have pretty normal hair not too dry or oily. But this winter has really got to my hair! So my hair stylist recommended Biolage which i have used this brand plenty times before just not the HydraSource. It worked great on bringing my hair back to life ! Not to mention i love the smell of it! if you have dry hair i definitely recommend!

product_name: Biolage Ultra HydraSource Shampoo for Dry Hair
product_review: I have curly hair that can be dry and this has become my go to for my familes shampoo and conditioner. It smells good and the price isnt too bad either. ￼

product_name: Biolage Ultra HydraSource Shampoo for Dry Hair
product_review: My dry, fine hair loves this shampoo. It’s not too heavy, cleans really well and leaves my hair feeling hydrated and shiny. The smell is really pleasant too.

product_name: Biolage Ultra HydraSource Shampoo for Dry Hair
product_review: This is what i use in the salon & it’s the best!! Makes the hair so soft and moisturized. Can forget the smell, my clients always complement the smell!

product_name: Biolage Ultra HydraSource Shampoo for Dry Hair
product_review: My new favorite color safe shampoo that moisturizes my hair without the greasy feeling. My stylist used this on me and I loved the smell. He said it was great for processed hair. I bought this at Ulta and now I’m hooked! My hair not only looks and feels clean, but it’s so much softer.

product_name: Biolage Ultra HydraSource Shampoo for Dry Hair
product_review: I have used this shampoo for a out a year or so. It does make my hair feel clean and soft but I feel like it doesn't lather up very good on the first try. I usually do it twice.

product_name: Biolage Ultra HydraSource Shampoo for Dry Hair
product_review: I really like this shampoo. It leaves my head and hair feeling so clean. It smells very good and doesn’t leave any residue. I would recommend this.

product_name: Biolage Ultra HydraSource Shampoo for Dry Hair
product_review: I am someone who is constantly changing their hair colour so to have the ultra Hydrasource Shampoo and conditioner for when my hair is feeling extremely dry inbetween colours it does and amazing job they also don't have to much of a fragrance which I really enjoy because I have extremely sensitive skin. The packaging is great too its easy to store and doesn't get in the way like some shampoo and conditioner bottles do.

product_name: Biolage Ultra HydraSource Shampoo for Dry Hair
product_review: Very hydrating! It helped my frizzy, dry hair become a bit more soft and shiny. It has a pleasant soft fragrance and foams up relatively well enough to cleanse a more oily scalp! I suffer from a lot of scalp irritation, and this shampoo did not make my scalp sensitive!

product_name: Biolage Ultra HydraSource Shampoo for Dry Hair
product_review: I have extremely dry hair and have been using this for years. By far, my favorite shampoo. Highly recommend to anyone in need of a new shampoo. It's amazing

product_name: Biolage Ultra HydraSource Shampoo for Dry Hair
product_review: Still need to use additional products but this is a good start. I use the conditioner as well from this line and have for years so I definitely recommend.

product_name: Biolage Ultra HydraSource Shampoo for Dry Hair
product_review: I love this shampoo and conditioner! It has a really good salon smell and it has helped put moisture back in my hair! I have been suffering from really dry and tangled hair the last 6+ months and this stuff has helped restore my hair tremendously. It is smooth and silky when I get out of the shower now and easy to brush through.

product_name: Biolage Ultra HydraSource Shampoo for Dry Hair
product_review: This is a lovely shampoo and conditioner to use. My hair is fine and very dry and the shampoo and conditioner did show a visible difference. The products come in easy to use bottles and I didn’t need much shampoo or conditioner to lather up in my hair. They both smell amazing too but not a strong scent. Once my hair was dry I did think my hair felt a lot less dryer and less frizzy too along with a nice shine .

product_name: Biolage Ultra HydraSource Shampoo for Dry Hair
product_review: this is the only shampoo that saved my hair!!!! on top of the amazing smell it works incredibly well. my hair is super soft and so much stronger. i use it alongside the conditioner it’s literally heavenly!

product_name: Biolage Ultra HydraSource Shampoo for Dry Hair
product_review: This is the first time I use Biolage Shampoo I was disappointed because I felt my hair became really dry . Even after using the conditioner. It’s a really expensive shampoo and conditioner I thought it would be great because some people say it’s good but for me it isn’t . I definitely won’t be repurchasing it . I say this be because I have purchased other brands that are a fraction of the price that leave my hair feeling great after it is washed . My hair is color treated and this just made my hair feel extremely dry . Please let me know if anyone had the same experience

product_name: Biolage Ultra HydraSource Shampoo for Dry Hair
product_review: I love this shampoo. It smells divine, cleans without over stripping, and hydrates my curls￼. It has a super easy to use flip-top￼. Biolage Ultra Hydrasource shampoo and conditioner are my new favorites￼

product_name: Biolage Ultra HydraSource Shampoo for Dry Hair
product_review: Worked great! My hair felt brand new and smelt so good! I hog the largest size and if lasted me a couple months. I love that it came with a pump. Would recommend!

product_name: Biolage Ultra HydraSource Shampoo for Dry Hair
product_review: This shampoo is game changing…. My hair has never been healthier, shiner, or felt more amazing in my life. I am so glad I spent the extra buck on it because I am never turning back from it.

product_name: Biolage Ultra HydraSource Shampoo for Dry Hair
product_review: Love this with the conditioner! Has helped me with my damaged bleach hair which wasn’t growing and now is healthier then it has been! I definitely recommend!

product_name: Biolage Ultra HydraSource Shampoo for Dry Hair
product_review: I’ve been using this shampoo for over a year now and have noticed a huge difference, I have dry curly hair and this rehydrates my hair everytime I use this product. I’ve seen so much growth in my hair journey because of it!

product_name: Biolage Ultra HydraSource Shampoo for Dry Hair
product_review: I have a very sensitive scalp and this product doesn’t improve it, but it doesn’t send my scalp into a firey rage. Still haven’t found a shampoo that fixes my issue but it’s nice to have an option that doesn’t make it worse.

product_name: Biolage Ultra HydraSource Shampoo for Dry Hair
product_review: This shampoo hydrated my hair and left it feeling really clean. The scent is also very nice and not too overbearing. I feel as if this shampoo gives you the right amount of moisture that you need!

product_name: Biolage Ultra HydraSource Shampoo for Dry Hair
product_review: I am hooked on this shampoo! It works incredible at smoothing my hair out. And makes it easy to style my hair afterwards. I feel like my hair is clean after using this shampoo.

product_name: Biolage Ultra HydraSource Shampoo for Dry Hair
product_review: This shampoo is a reliable classic that not only smells great but also effectively hydrates your hair and scalp. It thoroughly cleanses your scalp, leaving your hair looking salon fresh, even if you haven't been to a salon in a while. The best part is that it's affordable, and the cute packaging is a bonus. A little goes a long way, so it lasts a long time.

product_name: Garnier Nourishing Treat 1 Minute Hair Mask + Coconut Extract
product_review: Masque nourrissant pour cheveux en manque d'hydratation. Peut utiliser sous la douche ou hors la douche . Agréable odeur . Matière épaisse. Prix de 7euros a 8euros environ.

product_name: Garnier Nourishing Treat 1 Minute Hair Mask + Coconut Extract
product_review: The Garnier Nourishing Treat 1 Minute Hair Mask with Coconut Extract is a delightful addition to my hair care routine! This mask works wonders in just one minute, providing intense hydration and nourishment. Infused with coconut extract, it leaves my hair feeling soft, smooth, and deeply conditioned without weighing it down. The creamy texture is easy to apply, and I love how it rinses out effortlessly. It’s perfect for those busy days when I need a quick treatment but still want my hair to look and feel fabulous. For anyone looking for a fast and effective hair mask, this one is a fantastic choice!

product_name: Garnier Nourishing Treat 1 Minute Hair Mask + Coconut Extract
product_review: I find this scent to be the best out of the line-up. It has a strong coconut smell that I just love in haircare products! The price point is also so good for the quality of the product - I struggle a lot with dry hair and this made it super soft. However my hair is also quite dull but this didn't help that aspect hence I knocked off one star.

product_name: Garnier Nourishing Treat 1 Minute Hair Mask + Coconut Extract
product_review: I really liked how it smelled. My kids have very curly hair and it does a good job moisturizing. The bigger container is a good value for the money. I wish there were more varieties.

product_name: Garnier Nourishing Treat 1 Minute Hair Mask + Coconut Extract
product_review: Garnier Ultimate Blends Smoothing Coconut Hair Food is a hair care product designed to nourish and smooth hair. It is part of Garnier's "Ultimate Blends Hair Food" range, which features various formulas targeted for different hair needs. The Smoothing Coconut Hair Food variant is enriched with coconut oil, known for its moisturizing and smoothing properties, making it particularly beneficial for dry and frizzy hair. ### Key Features: - **Main Ingredient**: Coconut oil, which is renowned for its ability to deeply hydrate and smooth hair, leaving it soft and manageable. - **Multi-use**: The product can be used in three different ways: 1. **Conditioner**: After shampooing, apply to wet hair to help detangle and smooth. 2. **Hair Mask**: Leave it on for a few minutes after application to deeply nourish and repair hair. 3. **Leave-in Treatment**: Apply a small amount to damp hair to tame frizz and add shine. - **Free from**: Silicone, parabens, and artificial colorants, making it suitable for those looking for a more natural hair care option. - **Vegan Formula**: The product is vegan and made with 98% natural ingredients. This product is generally well-suited for individuals with dry, frizzy, or unruly hair, looking for a multi-purpose solution to smooth and nourish their hair.

product_name: Garnier Nourishing Treat 1 Minute Hair Mask + Coconut Extract
product_review: The hair mask is so good for dry hair it hydrates well and gives a nice shine after wash it so it is effective for damage and dry hair about the scent is nice and the texture is good and packaging too it value the money I recommend it

product_name: Garnier Nourishing Treat 1 Minute Hair Mask + Coconut Extract
product_review: This hair mask does exactly what it advertised. It is highly moisturizing. It’s a super quick treatment so you can do it and move on with your day. My hair felt softer for days after using it.

product_name: Garnier Nourishing Treat 1 Minute Hair Mask + Coconut Extract
product_review: smell is so so good and it’s so hydrating on my hair! i’ve been using these products for years and they never fail to make my hair feel replenished. It’s definitely worth every penny

product_name: Garnier Nourishing Treat 1 Minute Hair Mask + Coconut Extract
product_review: Profumazione priprio di cocco e rimane a lungo. Confezione riciclabile quindi sostiene anche il pianeta. Textur molto morbida e mi piace l’effetto che lascia ai capelli. I risultati si vedono subito.

product_name: Garnier Nourishing Treat 1 Minute Hair Mask + Coconut Extract
product_review: maschera eccezionale. rende i capelli morbidissimi e molto profumati anche subito dopo il primo utilizzo (sono ossessionata dal cocco). Sono appena tornata dal mare e questo è il risultato, nonostante i miei capelli per via dell'acqua salata fossero molto secchi prima dell'utilizzo. Inoltre, considerando il prezzo, la consiglio vivamente, in quanto vi è una grande quantità di prodotto all’interno.

product_name: Garnier Nourishing Treat 1 Minute Hair Mask + Coconut Extract
product_review: This leaves my hair feeling so soft and looking fantastic shiny and extremely manageable also norishes my hair I can't do without it smells a amazing too😍

product_name: Garnier Nourishing Treat 1 Minute Hair Mask + Coconut Extract
product_review: Tengo esta mascarilla y me encanta como me deja el pelo. Tengo el pelo rizado y necesita mucha nutrición, y esta mascarilla me aporta mucho. Su envase es un útil. Y su textura y olor es perfecto.

product_name: Garnier Nourishing Treat 1 Minute Hair Mask + Coconut Extract
product_review: Ce masque, qui peut s utiliser en après shampooing aussi, sent très bon. La texture est épaisse, mais il nourrit profondément les cheveux secs sans alourdir, pour pas cher

product_name: Garnier Nourishing Treat 1 Minute Hair Mask + Coconut Extract
product_review: This product is like heavenly fragrance in a tub specially designed for your hair, this was my childhood hair mask from here to now I still use it! The scent last forever with notes of coconut, pistachio, vanilla all sorts of thing, but mainly the smoothness it leaves your hair with. When I wash it off my hair it leaves an amazing shine and detangles with less frizz and split ends!

product_name: Garnier Nourishing Treat 1 Minute Hair Mask + Coconut Extract
product_review: I bought this product expecting to love it because I already love their products but I hated this. This product made my hair so oily and just nasty feeling.

product_name: Garnier Nourishing Treat 1 Minute Hair Mask + Coconut Extract
product_review: Love this hair mask. It smells so good and makes your hair so soft. I use it weekly since I only wash my hair a couple times a week anyway. My hair gets really dry so this helps alot

product_name: Garnier Nourishing Treat 1 Minute Hair Mask + Coconut Extract
product_review: Garnier Nourishing Treat 1 Minute Hair Mask with Coconut Extract is a game-changer! The scent is divine, like a tropical vacation for your hair. The effectiveness is impressive; it leaves my hair feeling soft, nourished, and revitalized in just one minute. The packaging is convenient and easy to use, and the texture is rich and creamy. Plus, the value is fantastic for the quality you get. I can't recommend it enough for a quick hair pick-me-up!

product_name: Garnier Nourishing Treat 1 Minute Hair Mask + Coconut Extract
product_review: Tiene un olor rico Deja el cabello suave y con buena textura Fácil de poner Envase práctico Efectividad buena Ingredientes naturales Muy bueno

product_name: Garnier Nourishing Treat 1 Minute Hair Mask + Coconut Extract
product_review: This hair mask is amazing, has everything, good price, good quality, and works perfect in your hair, going to help you a lot, more soft, and shiny

product_name: Garnier Nourishing Treat 1 Minute Hair Mask + Coconut Extract
product_review: I love how this product makes my hair go from dry to moisturised in less than 5 minutes. The coconut scent really adds to it also as I can smell it in my hair for days!!

product_name: Garnier Nourishing Treat 1 Minute Hair Mask + Coconut Extract
product_review: I feel that it gives me too much hydration I loved it and you don’t have to invest much time in the process its fragrance is pleasant and its content gives shine and softness to the hair is something economical and feasible

product_name: Garnier Nourishing Treat 1 Minute Hair Mask + Coconut Extract
product_review: I liked this mask a lot! It’s affordable, but it packs a punch of hydration in every use! If you need a quick and effective hair mask without breaking the bank, check this out!

product_name: Garnier Nourishing Treat 1 Minute Hair Mask + Coconut Extract
product_review: Crema de tratamiento para el cabello exquisita por su fragancia, textura e ingredientes que lleva. Esta crema de reparación es efectiva y queda el cabello muy sedoso. En envase es de buen tamaño.

product_name: Garnier Nourishing Treat 1 Minute Hair Mask + Coconut Extract
product_review: Este producto da una sensación de un cabello muy suave, además de dejarlo hidratado, con más firmeza, brillo, es un producto realmente recomendable

product_name: Garnier Nourishing Treat 1 Minute Hair Mask + Coconut Extract
product_review: This product saved my life from frizz and damaged. I love how you can leave it on before showering and rinse it off. Leaves hair moisturised without greasy residue and healthy.

product_name: Garnier Nourishing Treat 1 Minute Hair Mask + Coconut Extract
product_review: Was amazing my favourite hair mask,smells incredible,will definitely be purchasing again and again,it makes my hair less greasy.donr have to wash everyday

product_name: Garnier Nourishing Treat 1 Minute Hair Mask + Coconut Extract
product_review: Ayant les cheveux bouclés j’adore ce produit, il peux être utiliser de plusieurs façon différentes, je l’utilise en masque ou en soins sans rinçage pour définir les boucles, laisse une petite odeur très agréable sur les cheveux, c’est un pot qui dur assez longtemps il n’y a pas besoin d’en utiliser beaucoup

product_name: Garnier Nourishing Treat 1 Minute Hair Mask + Coconut Extract
product_review: The scent is amazing so nice. The packaging is great. The texture is so smooth. Great value for money it left my hair feeling and looking amazing its so effective!!!

product_name: Garnier Nourishing Treat 1 Minute Hair Mask + Coconut Extract
product_review: This product is easy to use, it leaves your hair feeling incredibly soft & smelling amazing, and it’s a decent price too! I highly recommend this hair mask.

product_name: Garnier Nourishing Treat 1 Minute Hair Mask + Coconut Extract
product_review: Lo mejor también amooo los resultados junto con la eficacia la fragancia de coco 🥥 lo mejoorrr y esos ingredientes que hacen tener unos increíbles resultados en tu cabello y esa Textura tan cremosa de coco amooo

product_name: Garnier Nourishing Treat 1 Minute Hair Mask + Coconut Extract
product_review: The best thing about this product is the scent. Although it is effective it does take a while for results to be felt and seen on hair texture. Decent value if bought for the right price.

product_name: Garnier Nourishing Treat 1 Minute Hair Mask + Coconut Extract
product_review: Está mascarilla deja el pelo increíble. Huele genial, hidrata en profundidad y deja el pelo suelto. La textura es muy gustosa. El envase trae bastante cantidad y dura muchísimo porque hay que aplicar poco.

product_name: Garnier Nourishing Treat 1 Minute Hair Mask + Coconut Extract
product_review: Oro en ponte 🤩😍 especializado en chicas rizadas por sus ingredientes naturales como el coco 🥥 y el aguacate 🥑 con una eficacia y textura. No se olviden de la fragancias amarán los resultados

product_name: Garnier Nourishing Treat 1 Minute Hair Mask + Coconut Extract
product_review: It is a nice concept, but do not be prepared to be surprised. This hair mask is good, but nothing special. I think you get a good value for your money, as you will get a good amount of product for nice price. The list of ingredients is nice, the texture is good and the smell is great. However, I did not see any remarkable difference on my hair, it was a good conditioner overall, but as a hair mask it did not have as much effect as I expected.

product_name: Garnier Nourishing Treat 1 Minute Hair Mask + Coconut Extract
product_review: Love the smell and texture of this. Have been used for a long time now cause I always stock up when find them half price which is totally worth it no doubt .

product_name: Garnier Nourishing Treat 1 Minute Hair Mask + Coconut Extract
product_review: Smells great. Leaves hair feeling smooth and frizz free. Found it very Effective on dry hair. Product is great Value for money. Doesn't leave hair feeling greasy.

product_name: Garnier Nourishing Treat 1 Minute Hair Mask + Coconut Extract
product_review: Me encanta la fragancia , al ponerla tiene una textura muy agradable , la hidratación es instantánea , la efectividad del el producto esta clara , con los resultados increíbles que obtienes .

product_name: Garnier Nourishing Treat 1 Minute Hair Mask + Coconut Extract
product_review: Maschera da posa breve per un risultato sorprendente in pochi attimi sui capelli che sembrano rinnovati e ricostruiti ad ogni utilizzo ottimo prodotto

product_review: Masque très crémeux, à la bonne odeur de noix de coco il nourrit en profondeur la chevelure, mais il est indispensable de le laisser poser au moins 10 minutes sur cheveux essorée, sinon, il est moins efficace

product_name: Garnier Nourishing Treat 1 Minute Hair Mask + Coconut Extract
product_review: Questa maschera per capelli di Garnier contiene ingredienti naturali al 97% non contiene siliconi ne coloranti artificiali ed è adatta ai vegani. product_name: Garnier Nourishing Treat 1 Minute Hair Mask + Coconut Extract
product_review: Lovely this range have tried all the hair mask range and they all smell gorgeous and they all work brilliantly price is great also I use this with the shampoo and conditioner

product_name: Garnier Nourishing Treat 1 Minute Hair Mask + Coconut Extract
product_review: La maschera migliore mai provata! Lascia i capelli morbidi, profumati anche nel corso dei giorni. Agisce anche in pochi minuti per chi ha poco tempo

product_name: Garnier Nourishing Treat 1 Minute Hair Mask + Coconut Extract
product_review: Selon moi l’une des meilleurs gamme de masque cheveux. Très efficace, petit budget et un résultat incroyable. J’adore cette gamme et avec des senteurs tellement agréable et adapté en fonction des problématiques concerné (hydratation, cassant…etc)

product_name: Garnier Nourishing Treat 1 Minute Hair Mask + Coconut Extract
product_review: Smells absolutely beautiful! Leaves your hair feeling so soft. Pot stretches further than you think making it excellent value. Highly recommend

product_name: Garnier Nourishing Treat 1 Minute Hair Mask + Coconut Extract
product_review: Odeur agréable, texture douce, l’efficacité satisfaisante, ingrédients assez naturel, résultat pas encore vu. Je recommande le produit!!!

product_name: Garnier Nourishing Treat 1 Minute Hair Mask + Coconut Extract
product_review: I absolutely love the scent of this product and found it super moisturising for my dry hair, but I don't love the packaging because I found it's easy to get water in it while in the shower, also I found it was a small amount for the money.

product_name: Garnier Nourishing Treat 1 Minute Hair Mask + Coconut Extract
product_review: It is so good and effective . It is also so cheap but scent is amazing. The packaging is so beautiful and the texture is the best,it is so creamy and buttery at the same time

product_name: Garnier Nourishing Treat 1 Minute Hair Mask + Coconut Extract
product_review: Ondanks ik heel graag kokos ruik, is deze echt een must in je badkamer! Je haar ruikt zalig naar kokos, effectief product want je kan er heel lang met doen!

product_name: Garnier Nourishing Treat 1 Minute Hair Mask + Coconut Extract
product_review: Love how shiny and manageable this makes my wavy hair. The product lasts forever and I was able to use it as a conditioner, leave in and hair mask. Havent tried any of the different scents that I haven't liked.

product_name: Garnier Nourishing Treat 1 Minute Hair Mask + Coconut Extract
product_review: Lo puedes usar como crema para peinar, acondicionador y mascarilla, las indicaciones generadas son perfectas y acorde a su uso, tiene un aroma delicioso

product_name: Biolage ColorLast Shampoo
product_review: I love the light fragrance. It is nice and clean. Also it lathers well and I like it better than any shampoo I’ve tried previously. The bottle it comes in is each to open and hold. The ingredients seem to be nice and help my color last longer :) love this shampoo

product_name: Biolage ColorLast Shampoo
product_review: Great for my hair which I get colored regularly. I wish it was less expensive. It works well and my hair feels great after a wash especially since its so frizzy

product_name: Biolage ColorLast Shampoo
product_review: Very floral scent . The color in my hair will last not leaving my hair dry . I make sure to always buy the big bottle that’s how much I trust this brand.

product_name: Biolage ColorLast Shampoo
product_review: This is NOT safe for colored hair! I have my hair dyed pink and everytime I use this shampoo my hair loses so much more color than the other shampoos. And it smells so awful!

product_name: Biolage ColorLast Shampoo
product_review: I love the smell, it is very sudsy for shampoo but it leaves my hair and scalp clean and fresh. I purchased this on sale so at the time it was marked at a decent price. It’s not too thin which I like too. Easy to use and adds a little volume to my thin hair. The shampoo makes my hair a little dry but once I get the conditioner on it’s silky soft. I love this product!

product_name: Biolage ColorLast Shampoo
product_review: Shampoo lathers and rinses well. It has a light scent. It is a little thick sometimes I cut it down with some water. Sometimes it dries my hair out ever so slightly but overall I would recommend

product_name: Biolage ColorLast Shampoo
product_review: I have been a hairstylist for years. I've also tried numerous different products but Biolage/Matrix is ALWAYS my go to. It smells good & it's not too heavy for my hair.

product_name: Biolage ColorLast Shampoo
product_review: Love this shampoo for color treated hair. I’m almost platinum and this keeps my hair healthy. Not a crazy scent which i like, mid range in price but totally worth it!

product_name: Biolage ColorLast Shampoo
product_review: I’ve always loved this shampoo paired with the conditioner. Such a light beautiful scent, and it truly leaves my fine hair feeling hydrated, yet not weighed down at all. It lathers amazingly and I really feel like my hair is clean after.

product_name: Biolage ColorLast Shampoo
product_review: I love Biolage! This ColorLast Shampoo works great! I switch around with my shampoos and conditioner after awhile but when I come back to this it never disappoints! Love the Scent as well.

product_name: Biolage ColorLast Shampoo
product_review: The Biolage color last line has been my go-to shampoo for the last 10+ years. I have not found any other product that makes my hair feel so soft and clean while protecting my color treated hair. The scent is subtle but pleasant. Packaging is high quality. It is simply the best!!

product_name: Biolage ColorLast Shampoo
product_review: I love the smell of this shampoo. It works wonderfully. Packaging is pretty. Ingredients aren't too bad. I think you get a good amount for the price.

product_name: Biolage ColorLast Shampoo
product_review: The bottle and cap are 💯 recyclable. The shampoo is infused with a light fragrance of Orchid. It helps color from fading with each shampoo allowing your hair to keep its shine . It is Vegan and Paraben free!

product_name: Biolage ColorLast Shampoo
product_review: Biolage ColorLast Shampoo was highly recommended for my hair after an appointment. I purchased it, used it and it worked great. It was reasonably priced and it left my hair feeling amazing and prolonged my color.

product_name: Biolage ColorLast Shampoo
product_review: I love all biolage products! This is my go to shampoo. I have been coloring my hair since age 25 due to early graying. This is very effective and your hair feels super soft and shiny.

product_name: Biolage ColorLast Shampoo
product_review: Biolage Colorlast Shampoo is expertly crafted to protect color-treated hair and maintain its vibrancy. Utilizing a low-pH formula, it gently cleanses to prevent unnecessary stripping of color while conditioning deeply to keep hair looking salon-fresh. Infused with orchid extract, this shampoo helps maintain the depth, tone, and shine of colored hair, ensuring your color stays vibrant for up to 9 weeks. Ideal for those seeking a professional quality product to extend the life of their color treatment.

product_name: Biolage ColorLast Shampoo
product_review: Ive tried almost every hair brand and this one is my favorite!!! it keeps my hair so healthy and the scent is amazing. The price is very reasonable. I have highlights in my hair and when I use this shampoo it looks like I just went to do my hair at the salon.. I fully recommend this product its incredible😍

product_name: Biolage ColorLast Shampoo
product_review: Oh my god this is the best shampoo ever.￼ makes my hair, so soft and shiny and healthy looking, and it smells amazing Price is a little bit too high, but it’s worth it for the good result. I highly recommend. Good ingredient.

product_name: Biolage ColorLast Shampoo
product_review: Biolage ColorLast is a great, salon-quality shampoo. The price is affordable for the quality. I love that it is free of parabens and 100% vegan. Being in a 100% recycled bottle is another win for Biolage! We love the smell and how smooth our hair is after using the set.

product_name: Biolage ColorLast Shampoo
product_review: The shampoo leaves your hair, super soft and smelling amazing the snow last for so long and so does a bottle for the price point. I love the shampoo.

product_name: Biolage ColorLast Shampoo
product_review: This shampoo makes my hair so shiny and silky feeling. I use it in combination with the Biolage colorlast conditioner and they both smell heavenly. I think the price is right compared to similar brands and effectiveness.

product_name: Biolage ColorLast Shampoo
product_review: I love this shampoo. The scent smells amazing, like flowers. It leaves my hair smelling good and my hair feels nice and soft. I am someone with fine oily hair and this one washes the oils right out. Highly recommend.

product_name: Biolage ColorLast Shampoo
product_review: I really like it! It has a really good smell! My color doesn’t face half as fast, and the price is better than other brands. It’s sulfur free so it will not harm ur color.

product_name: Biolage ColorLast Shampoo
product_review: I loved this shampoo it made my hair feel incredible. I have coloured hair so it can be quite dry This makes it so soft and easy to brush after using. Will definitely be purchasing again it was the first professional grade shampoo I ever bought and I loved it. I don't have a picture because my next bottle is in the mail already. It can be pricey I guess but totally worth it.

product_name: Biolage ColorLast Shampoo
product_review: This shampoo kept my hair so soft & shiny while preserving my color. The tiniest bit goes such a long way which is extra helpful if you have long hair!

product_name: Biolage ColorLast Shampoo
product_review: Biolage is easily one of the absolute best brands that you could ever allow to touch your hair. If not, THE best. They are leaping bunny certified which means they are 110% COMPLETELY cruelty free and they have everything tested each and every year. Biolage products have such a clean beautiful scent to them, without having any harsh ingredients added. But best of all, they do the damn thing! Their products truly work and do wonderful things for you hair, there’s a reason why SO many salons make Biolage their official product line.

product_name: Biolage ColorLast Shampoo
product_review: When I used to color my hair this was go-to. It’s soooooo soft and smells great. Really good at keeping color and helped from keep moisturized and soft. Loved it.

product_name: Biolage ColorLast Shampoo
product_review: Very good at keeping color the only issue I have is that it tends to dry my hair out compared to redken . Smells good and all but the price isn’t there for what the product is. Redken is better for alittle more.

product_name: Biolage ColorLast Shampoo
product_review: I love this shampoo so much. It gets my hair clean and shines. I love the scent. The price is a bit high but I feel it’s worth it. It has healthy ingredients for your hair.

product_name: Biolage ColorLast Shampoo
product_review: I love the Biolage color lasting shampoo set. It helps keep my dyed light blonde streaks from turning brassy and fading as quick. The scent is a light scent as your typical biolage smell. I personally love it. The pop top is perfect and easy to pour out of. Definitely recommend.

product_name: Biolage ColorLast Shampoo
product_review: The Biolage colorLast Shampoo is a great shampoo to help with maintaining great colored hair/highlighted. It’s effective in my opinion and feels great in the hair. Smells fresh and clean, the packaging on the label is attractive and inviting. The matching condition is also great!

product_name: Biolage ColorLast Shampoo
product_review: when a client asks me for shampoo recommendations i always recommend this one. this shampoo leaves my hair feeling so clean which i feel is hard to find when looking at color safe shampoos. it helps my color last longer and leaves my hair so soft! bonus for the best smell!

product_name: Biolage ColorLast Shampoo
product_review: I used this for years! I love love love the smell and my hair always felt great. I have recently switched to Kenra as I have been coloring my hair ALOT more and Kenra makes it softer.

product_name: Biolage ColorLast Shampoo
product_review: I used this as a hairdresser on my clients and it is amazing! The smell is amazing, it lathers up perfectly, doesn’t break the bank and the packaging is ethically pleasing!

product_name: Biolage ColorLast Shampoo
product_review: This is a great product for people who dye their hair at home. it does well with people with long hair then it gets tangled. It makes my hair very soft.

product_name: Biolage ColorLast Shampoo
product_review: I have used this shampoo for years and it pays to use good product. My hair is healthy, shines and I do color and my color last longer using this. I also use their deep conditioner in the jar. This shampoo makes my hair feel really soft and it doesn’t irritate the seborrheic dermatitis on my scalp like a lot of other brands. Would definitely recommend and purchase again and again!

product_name: Biolage ColorLast Shampoo
product_review: I have been using Biolage for couple years now. I love the texture and it does helps my hair smooth and smell good. Some other hair product has silicone but Biolage does not has it.

product_name: Biolage ColorLast Shampoo
product_review: This product is great, I love it. It leaves your hair nice and soft and if you use color on your hair, it doesn't fade away so quickly. I will recommend this product.

product_name: Biolage ColorLast Shampoo
product_review: This is my all time favorite smelling shampoo! The smell is just amazing! It lathers great and I really feel like it protects my highlights and I don’t worry about my color fading fast!

product_name: Biolage ColorLast Shampoo
product_review: Non conosco questo prodotto e i suoi ingredienti,mi piacerebbe provarlo per capire la qualita e il rapporto con il.prezzo.. Mi piacerebbe capire la.sua efficienza

product_name: Biolage ColorLast Shampoo
product_review: One of the better colour last shampoos I've used over the years. It helps keep your fresh new colour last longer than some other brands. Smell nice without being over scented

product_name: Biolage ColorLast Shampoo
product_review: I always kept the biggest bottles they had of the Biolage Colorlast shampoo and conditioner on hand back when I had my hair routinely colored because it REALLY seemed to help not only keep my hair from turning brassy, but also it kept it gloriously shiny! I would often compliments on how great my hair￼ looked. I also love the scent, it's very clean and fresh smelling￼. Since I am naturally blonde, but rapidly going gray, I no longer color my hair, I have just let nature take its course. But I think this is a definite great product to have on hand if you do actively color your hair.￼

product_name: Biolage ColorLast Shampoo
product_review: Biolage was recommended by my hairdresser as an all around great product. They also have one for color treated hair and it definitely helps the color last longer

product_name: Biolage ColorLast Shampoo
product_review: Biology colorfast shampoo and conditioner have been my favorite for over 20 years now. It definitely helps my color from fading (copper red, bright auburn ect...)as I do give it a break and use several other shampoo and conditioners. Although it is my go to. They do tend to build up so I have to clarify about every ten days. The conditioner is an excellent detailer and the smell...it's amazing. It may be a little strong for some but I absolutely love it. You can almost always find the litter bottles on sale and they last long time.

product_name: Biolage ColorLast Shampoo
product_review: The scent is amazing and it makes my hair feel so smooth and moisturized. I tried other products, including Biolage line. This one always does the work for me.

product_name: Biolage ColorLast Shampoo
product_review: This shampoo smells great, often I shampoo twice because I won’t wash my hair for 3-4 days and it does a great job of not stripping my hair. The shampoo helps protect the color in my hair and cleans it well

product_name: Biolage ColorLast Shampoo
product_review: This shampoo leaves my hair and scalp feeling fresh and clean. It smells great and helps to maintain the color. I’ve used it for years and will continue.

product_name: Biolage ColorLast Shampoo
product_review: I love this shampoo. The smell of this is the greatest thing I’ve ever smelled and it lasts. I buy this over and over. Perfect for color treated hair.

product_name: Biolage ColorLast Shampoo
product_review: I use Biolage Colorlast Shampoo for my color treated hair. I highlight my brown hair with blonde coloring. This product keeps the blonde from turning yellow. My hair feels smooth and healthy.

product_name: Biolage ColorLast Shampoo

product_name: Suave Moroccan Infusion Shine Shampoo

product_name: Suave Moroccan Infusion Shine Shampoo

It has such a nice scent (similar to the MoroccanOil leave in conditioner) and my hair stays with the scent of the shampoo. I’ve noticed that when I air dry my hair and I go to brush it, it stays very smooth. It does leave my hair feeling dry like before. I used the keratin one before from suave but this one is way better. I’m also pairing it with the Moroccan conditioner from this line. Absolutely recommend!

product_name: Suave Moroccan Infusion Shine Shampoo
product_review: This product works very well for any hair type. It also has a very nice smell. The product is affordable and my go-to hair care product. This product is a good option when you are looking for affordable shampoo that cleans your hair.

product_name: Suave Moroccan Infusion Shine Shampoo
product_review: Smells like heaven! Leaves my hair very shiny and lush after each use, I always follow up with @Suave #morroccanoilinfusion conditioner. This product is very inexpensive, but definitely does the job, I highly recommend, it's also cruelty free!

product_name: Suave Moroccan Infusion Shine Shampoo
product_review: I love this shampoo. It made my hair shiny and soft as well as moisturized it. The scent lasted for days making it so I didnt have to wash my hair as often.
